author: Arnim Zola and Red Skull
quote: "The energy we have just collected could power my designs, all my designs. This will change the war.""Doctor Zola, this will change the world."

author: Arnim Zola and Chester Phillips
quote: "I don't eat meat.""Why not?""It disagrees with me.""How about Cyanide? Does that give you the rumbly tummy, too?"

author: Arnim Zola
quote: "Science could not save my body. My mind, however that was worth saving."

author: Arnim Zola
quote: "Cut off one head, two more shall take its place."

author: Arnim Zola to Captain America
quote: "We are both of us out of time."

author: Black Widow about Zola's recruitment
quote: "It was Operation Paperclip after World War II, S.H.I.E.L.D. recruited German scientists with strategic value."

author: Captain America and Arnim Zola
quote: "Arnim Zola was a German scientist who worked for the Red Skull. He's been dead for years.""First correction, I am Swiss. Second, look around you I have never been more alive."

author: Howard Stark and Tony Stark
quote: "Arnim, you in there? Arnim? Hey! Door's this way, pal."Oh, yeah." I'm looking for Dr. Zola. Have you seen him?"Yeah, no, Dr. Zol– No, I haven't seen a soul. Pardon me."

author: Arnim Zola to Johann Fennhoff
quote: "I know things seem bleak but you're in fact a fortunate man. You're in prison yes, but it is an American prison. And America is the land of opportunities."

author: Maximus and Auran
quote: "We have no option. We have to move on. Do you understand what this means?""Fully... My King."

author: Auran to Crystal
quote: "The sooner you accept Maximus as your King, the happier you're gonna be."

author: Auran to Medusa
quote: "Not much without your hair, huh?"

author: Auran to Medusa
quote: "I prefer to bring you back alive. You tell me if that's possible."

author: Crystal and Medusa
quote: "I stole Auran's Com-Link.""What?""It fell off.""No, Auran's too smart for that. It was a setup. They wanted you to call me."

author: Crystal and Auran
quote: "You think that little gun matches what I can do?""If not, I've got nine more guards outside who'd love to take target practice on a princess."

author: Maximus and Auran
quote: "Gather up whatever you need, whoever you need. Then transport to Earth and take care of the Royal Family."""Take care of"?""Bring back or kill. Black Bolt, definitely kill. Gorgon, too.""All I need is myself. It's best to be discreet."

author: Auran and Eldrac
quote: "I need you to transport me here.""No.""I say yes.""I said no. It's painful.""I don't care if it's painful. If you don't, I will kill your entire family and bring all their pieces to you in a garbage bag. If you do anything that harms me, the guards will make you pay."

author: Mordis to Auran
quote: "I didn't want to be here any more than you wanted me here."

author: Maximus and Auran
quote: "What's taking so long?""This is Earth. It's a lot bigger than the Moon."

author: Auran and Maximus
quote: "Don't send Mordis. He's not a fighter. He's just death. We'll be better off without him.""Next to Black Bolt, he's the most powerful weapon in Attilan.""I have no control over him.""You need to trust yourself, Auran. Trust that you can handle anything and anyone. I do. I believe in you, and I'm sending you Mordis.""Understood, my King."

author: Auran and Maximus
quote: "I don't like the idea of consorting with this human. I don't understand.""You don't need to. Just keep him safe, find Black Bolt and the rest of the Royal Family, and finish your mission! I'll be sending you some help soon.""Who?""Whatever happened to, "Yes, my King"?""Yes, my King."

author: Mordis and Auran
quote: "I like your new clothes.""Another word, and I kill you."

author: Auran to Loyolis
quote: "Yeah, grass is green, the flowers are bright, the birds sing so pretty. You're soldiers, not tourists!"

author: Gorgon
quote: "Hey, this is Hawaii, and I know how people act here. We help our friends. Most importantly, I want to rip the head off of Auran."

author: Gorgon to Karnak
quote: "Auran and her people don't know that you're broken. And they think that the almighty Karnak is gonna be heading their way. So give them what they expect. Now, there is no flaw if they don't know there is one."

author: Auran and Medusa
quote: "Medusa. I'm curious if Black Bolt still has that frankly disgusting fondness for his human friends Declan and Sammy.""He wants to know what you've done with them.""Nothing yet. But if you and Black Bolt don't come back for them, they will die.""Using hostages is a new low for you, Auran.""Gorgon used to tell us there was nothing more important than the mission.""So you think we're just gonna walk right into your trap?""Up to you.""Say we wanted to meet up. How would we do that?""You have Locus.""I'm sorry. We don't. Locus is dead.""We haven't gone anywhere. We're still at the lab."

author: Evan Declan and Auran
quote: "You're the one who should be worried about living through this.""I have no worries.""Because you think you can keep healing yourself. Have you ever had a DNA test before?""Get to the point.""Your telomeres are growing shorter.""Meaning?""Meaning you may not be able to regenerate yourself forever. One day, you'll die and that's it.""You're lying."

author: Auran to Karnak
quote: "Maybe death has a purpose. Maybe we're meant to come to terms with that instead of trying to avoid it."

author: Karnak after killing Auran
quote: "She'll come back. She always does."

author: Auran and Maximus
quote: "You want to become Inhuman.That's your motivation behind this revolt.""Why do you care about my motivation if it gets you what you want?""Because the reason I followed you is because I saw someone who, even though he was simply human, overcame that and became King. That was someone I could admire.""So I'm really good for a human. Is that the story you fell in love with?"

author: Auran and Karnak
quote: "I'm not gonna let you kill me again.""I'm here to help you.""Who said I need help?""You know my power. I see the flaw in everything. And exploit it. I see the flaw in you. And I want to help you overcome it. I saw you across the courtyard today. I've been watching you closely since Earth. You backed the wrong man and you know it. I know you feel regret for Gorgon's death. His sacrifice saved your life.""That wasn't his intention.""What if it was? He could always be counted on to do the right thing at the right time, and he trained you to be the same. But you are not there yet, are you? Neither am I.""The great Karnak admitting to weakness?""My time on Earth changed me. Maybe. A little.""I don't understand how I can help.""I'm gonna need a bit of your DNA."

author: Auran and Karnak
quote: "Your cousins are sabotaging the city.""Who's to say? Maybe Maximus just underestimated what it takes to keep a kingdom running smoothly.""And maybe I'm talking to the one who might know every crack in that kingdom's infrastructure.""That's possible. Now comes your part. You're kidding. Captain of the Royal Guard's afraid of needles.""I thought that was the weakness you were talking about.""Your regeneration powers will adhere through the transfer process using nanogene technology.""There's something you should know. My powers they may not be so strong anymore.""How do you mean?""Something Declan said. Well, it was really more of a warning, and I don't know if it's true or not. But whatever makes me me may not work the way it used to."

author: Medusa
quote: "We find a go-between. Who would want to protect both Maximus and Attilan?"

author: Maximus and Auran
quote: "Attilan is mine, not yours!""It's ours.""If I can't have Attilan, no one will."

author: Maximus and Auran
quote: "I can stop the dome from collapsing anytime I like.""What if you can't?""Of course I can. Need I remind you of Bronaja's vision? I will be the true King of Attilan.""Open your eyes!""I see quite clearly.""What do you see?""A city in motion, evolving.""Our city is in ruins! We can't stay here.""No one goes to Earth until I say so. Perhaps you should stand guard outside my door.""I will take my leave of you."

author: Ayesha
quote: "Our concern is the slight against our people... We hire them and they steal from us. That is heresy of the highest order."

author: Yondu Udonta and Kraglin Obfonteri
quote: "What is it Kraglin?""Hey, remember that Ayesha chick?""Yeah, why?""Uh...""Oh, hell!"

author: Ayesha and Peter Quill
quote: "We thank you Guardians for putting your lives on the line. We could not risk the lives of our own Sovereign citizens. Every citizen is born exactly as designed by the community: impeccable both physically and mentally. We control the DNA of our progeny, germinating them in bating pods.""Guess I prefer to make people the old fashioned way.""Well, perhaps some day you could give me a history lesson in the archaic ways of our ancestors, for academic purposes.""I would be honored, yes, in the name of research. I think that could be pretty, uh, pretty repulsive.""

author: Ayesha and Gamora
quote: "I understand she is your sister.""She's worth no more to me than the bounty due for her on Xandar.""Our soldiers apprehended her attempting to steal the batteries. Do with her as you please."

author: Peter Quill and Ayesha
quote: "We thank you High Priestess Ayesha.""What is your heritage Mr. Quill?""My mother is from Earth.""And your father?""Came from Missouri. That's all I know.""I see it within you: an unorthodox genealogy. A hybrid that seems particularly...reckless.""

author: Sovereign Chambermaid and Ayesha
quote: "High Priestess, the council is waiting.""They are perturbed I've wasted our resources. When they see what I've created here, their wrath will dissipate.""It's a new type of birthing pod, ma'am?""That, my child, is the next step in our evolution. More powerful, more beautiful, more capable of destroying the Guardians of the Galaxy. I think I shall call him...Adam."

author: Ben Urich to Mitchell Ellison
quote: "There used to be a time when the people in this building wrote the hell outta the news."

author: Silvio and Ben Urich
quote: "Did you hear about Rigoletto?"I heard he retired.""Yeah, in pieces."

author: Silvio and Ben Urich
quote: "You know when I went away to do my ten, every newspaper in town dragged my name through the shit. You were the only one who did it without mentioning my kids, always grateful for that."Then give me something, a name, anything."Take a pass on this one Benny. Some fights will just get you bloody."

author: Mitchell Ellison and Ben Urich
quote: "Got a minute? Talk about next weeks spread.""Already working on it.""Another organized crime thing?""All of Hell's Kitchen. There's a new player on the scene. No one knows who it is, or what they want. Everybody's scrambling.""Your assignments the city desk, Ben.""This is the city. No one else is on this yet. I'm the only one who sees it.""It's not sexy.""We're a newspaper, Ellison. Not a girly mag.""You know that's not what I meant. And nobody calls them that anymore."

author: Ben Urich and Mitchell Ellison
quote: "It's not just the Russians, I think maybe the Union Allied scandal might tie into this.""Right, and you remember what that expose did for circulation, dick, with a side of who gives a shit.""This is a real story.""Yeah, and it’s gonna end the same as it always does right? A bunch of fat old guys in some white color prison with more fat old guys.""The cops aren’t even on this yet. We could be the ones to connect the dots.""It doesn’t sell papers, Ben! Not anymore."

author: Karen Page and Ben Urich
quote: "I read your article.""About the subway line?""About Union Allied Construction. I think there's more to the story, if you're interested."

author: Karen Page and Ben Urich
quote: "I read every big story with your byline. The VA kickbacks, toxic runoff, the Teachers Union scandal. Hell, you pretty much brought down the Italian mob back when I was in diapers. Whatever happened to that reporter, Mr. Urich?""He got old. And a hell of a lot less stupid."

author: Ben Urich and Christian Blake
quote: "How long have I been doing this?""Long enough to be a pain in the arse."

author: Ben Urich
quote: "My experience, there are no heroes, no villains. Just people with different agendas."

author: Ben Urich to Karen Page
quote: "What part of don't tell anyone about this didn't you understand?!"

author: Ben Urich and Karen Page
quote: "This is the job, researching, gathering facts. It's long and boring and complicated and half the time you still come up empty.""Well you're just a little ray of sunshine.""Just giving you the lay of the land. For every exposé I've had published there were a dozen that didn't pan out."

author: Masked Man and Ben Urich
quote: "Do you believe that, what they're saying about me?""You've been in an awful lot of wrong places at the wrong time lately, but I've heard the other stories, about the man in the mask, helping people. Sounds like there's more than one side to it."

author: Ben Urich
quote: "You seen the news? Everything's changed. Fisk has gotten out in front of being dragged into the spotlight. My editor thinks he's the second coming, hell the whole city does."

author: Doris Urich
quote: "Your name is Ben Urich and you're a reporter. It's not a job. It is who you are."

author: Ben Urich to Karen Page
quote: "I used to be like you back in the day, good at turning heads, getting people's attention, pissing them off, and that's half of it, but the other half is knowing when not to."

author: Ben Urich and Karen Page discuss Wilson Fisk
quote: "I've been writing about crime in this city since before you were born. The only thing I know without a doubt is you don't get to be the man at the top without making enemies looking to tear you down to the ground."

author: Ben Urich and Mitchell Ellison
quote: "Run the article, it'll sell papers, it's sexy.""You sound like a whore.""Well I learned how to be one from you. I get lucky sometimes sure, land a story that makes a difference like Union Allied, but most of the time, now, working for this paper, I might as well be wearing lipstick and a red dress."

author: Wilson Fisk and Ben Urich
quote: "I've made mistakes in the years since I was a boy. I tried to learn from them but it isn't always enough.""Get out of my house""I'll leave, but first I... I'd like to have a conversation with you, off the record of course.""You think I'd believe anything you have to say?""I... I promise that I'll be honest with you Mr. Urich. Whether you choose to believe or not, that's up to you.""Alright. Let's hear it."

author: Ben Urich and Wilson Fisk
quote: "I wrote a lot of stories in my days pushing ink, you know how many times people have threatened me, getting me to keep my mouth shut?""But that's my mother that you brought into this Mr. Urich! My Mother! So I am not here to threaten you! I'm here to kill you!"

author: Brigid O'Reilly
quote: "When I was undercover, I kept case notes on playing cards. I learned it from this reporter in New York."

author: Benjamin Poindexter to Craig
quote: "What kind of gun do you have, Craig? I'm familiar with the M11. Did a couple years in the army. Got real cozy with the M11. It's reliable."

author: Daredevil and Benjamin Poindexter
quote: "Who are you?""I'm Daredevil."

author: Benjamin Poindexter to Julie Barnes
quote: "I am so, so sorry about how things ended the other night. I'm sorry for scaring you. I just wanted to explain myself. When we worked together at the suicide hotline, I saw the way you were with other people. Patient, compassionate, and I really need that right now. My life is out of control. I have no family, and I'm about to lose my job. Please. I just want to talk. Anywhere you choose. And if you say no, I'll understand, and I'll never bother you again."

author: Benjamin Poindexter
quote: "FBI and the army before that, they helped keep me on the straight and narrow path. But now... without that it's all... I'm drowning in deep water and I don't know whether I'm swimming through the surface or the bottom."

author: Kingpin and Benjamin Poindexter
quote: "I want you to kill Karen Page.""Consider it done."

author: Thaddeus Ross
quote: "Now she'll see."

author: Thaddeus Ross and Leonard Samson
quote: "You did the right thing, calling us. I need to know where they're going. She'll be in incredible danger as long as she's with him.""From who?""He protected her. You almost killed her.""I give you my word, her safety is my main concern at this point.""You know, it's a point of professional pride with me that I can always tell when somebody's lying. And you are. I don't know where he's going. I know she'll help him, if she can.""Then she's aiding a fugitive. And I can't help either one of them.""I used to wonder why she never talked about you. Now I know!""Where does she meet these guys?"

author: Kathleen Sparr and Thaddeus Ross
quote: "Federal is already monitoring phones, plastic and Dr. Ross' web accounts, and local PD have been placed on alert. They'll pop up somewhere and when they do, it comes straight to us.""They're not gonna just pop up. He made it five years and got across borders without making any mistakes. He's not gonna use a damn credit card now. If he was trying to escape, he'd be long gone. He's not trying to escape this time. He's looking for help and that's how we're gonna get him. We know what they're after and we know he's been talking to somebody. You all have copies of the correspondence. The aliases 'Mr. Green' and 'Mr. Blue' have been added to the S.H.I.E.L.D. Operations Database. If he comes up for air, we'll be waiting. If he makes a peep, we'll hear him. And when he slips up, we'll be ready."

author: Bruce Banner and Betty Ross
quote: "You know, I know a few techniques that could help you manage that anger effectively.""You zip it. We're walking."

author: Betty Ross and Bruce Banner
quote: "What are you saying? You think you can control it?""No no no, not con-not control it, but, I don't know, maybe aim it."

author: Thaddeus Ross and Betty Ross
quote: "Betty.""I will never forgive what you've done to him.""He's a fugitive.""You made him a fugitive to cover your failures and to protect your career. Don't ever speak to me as your daughter again.""It's only because you're my daughter that you're not in handcuffs, too."

author: Leonard Samson and Betty Ross
quote: "Come home. Just come home.""Leonard, did you call someone the night Bruce was at our house? Is that why they came for him?""I... I was afraid. Please forgive me."

author: Hawley and Thaddeus Ross
quote: "Didn't he used to date your daughter?""Not really seeing the relevance of that question."

author: Bill Foster to Hank Pym
quote: "When S.H.I.E.L.D. collapsed, I took Ava in. I built the chamber to slow her decay, but her condition was progressive. I didn't know how to cure her. She wanted to kill you, Hank. But I told her, no. And that she should watch you instead. And sure enough, she discovered that you were building a Tunnel."

author: Scott Lang, Bill Foster and Hope van Dyne
quote: "How big did you get?""My record? Twenty-one feet. You?""Sixty-five feet.""Sixty-five?""If you two are finished comparing sizes.""Sixty-five."

author: Ghost and Bill Foster
quote: "I doubt Hank ever mentioned my father. Why would he? Elihas Starr. They were colleges at S.H.I.E.L.D.. Quantum research. Until my father dared disagree with the great Hank Pym. You had him fired. Oh, and discredited for good measure. My father tried to continue his research on his own, desperate to restore his name. So, he took risks. To many, until something went wrong. He told us to run. I could tell he was scared. I didn't want him to be alone. When I woke up, my parents were dead. I wasn't so lucky. They call it molecular disequilibrium. A rather dull name I think. Doesn't quite do justice to what it means. Every cell in my body is torn apart and stitched back together, over and over every day.""I was still at S.H.I.E.L.D. when I got a call about a quantum anomaly in Argentina.""Doctor Foster did his best to keep me safe. But others at S.H.I.E.L.D. saw an opportunity in my affliction they built me a containment suit so I could control my phasing. And trained me to be a stealth operative. They weaponised me. I stole for them, spied for them. I killed for them. And in exchange for my soul, they were going to cure me. They lied.""When S.H.I.E.L.D. collapsed, I took Ava in. I built a chamber to slow her decay, but her condition is progressing further without a cure. She wanted to kill you, Hank, but I told her no. That she should watch you instead."

author: Bill Foster and Hank Pym
quote: "For the last thirty years, she's been down there absorbing quantum energy. We can extract that energy. We can use it to repair Ava's molecular structure-""Extract it?""Yes!""Are you insane?! That would rip Janet apart!""You don't know that. I'm gonna fire up your Tunnel. When Janet's location pops into Lang's head, he's gonna give it to me or I'm gonna turn him over to the FBI."

author: Hank Pym and Bill Foster
quote: "I told you this was a waste of time. Come on, let's go.""Don't condescend, Hank. You're the one who's on the run from the FBI. All because you had to grow to a size that finally fit your ego.""That wasn't me in Germany. It was this idiot."

author: Ghost and Bill Foster
quote: "You said it yourself. I've hurt people. But you haven't. Go, please.""We can make it, Ava.""Bill-""I'm not leaving you."

author: Billy Keonig
quote: "So, the guy was bulletproof, huh? That's sweet."

author: Phil Coulson, Tilden and Billy Koenig
quote: "It's Private Tilden, isn't it?""Yes, sir.""Well, I don't care I about this register or that. I want General Jones and his friends sent directly to the ordnance depot to meet me.""Go bigger. Go bigger.""...Or I'll have you so deep in horse manure, son, you'll need a damn snorkel."

author: Billy Koenig
quote: "I'm Billy, Sam's the shorter one."

author: Sam Koenig
quote: "I'm Sam, Billy's the shorter one."

author: Antoine Triplett, Billy Koenig and Sam Koenig
quote: "I was just wondering, how many of you are there, any way? Brothers, I mean.""Thirteen.""Thirteen?""Look at him. He fell for it.""Yeah.""That gets people all the time.""Yeah, yeah, you, you got me. You got me good."

author: Antoine Triplett and Billy Koenig
quote: "Where's your brother been hiding?""Well, all this excitement fried his circuits. His cooling system kicked in and he's recharging his batteries.""I know what you're doing."

author: Sam Koenig
quote: "Agent Coulson, this is Agent Koenig. They've got Agent Koenig. I repeat they've got Agent Koenig!"

author: Tucker Shockley, Billy Koenig and Holden Radcliffe
quote: "You two will want to get acquainted. You're the last one the other's gonna see alive.""Yeah, well, we're ready to die!""No! No. No, no, no, no. I'm extremely not ready to die."

author: Tucker Shockley and Billy Koenig
quote: "The one who comes in this room next won't be me. The man who comes in here will do things to you that I can't even watch. He will break you.""Yeah, well, Koenigs don't break. All right? We're programmed to take pain, so bring it on! Bring it on! Oh, my God. I'm in so much pain. I don't think I can take this. That guy hits really hard."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Billy Koenig
quote: "I don't care what this is or what you guys do. I'm not gonna talk.""You won't have to. That's the beauty of it. This machine will allow me access to his mind. We'll get all the information we need without laying a hand on him.""Well, you're not gonna get anything out of me. Because my mind is a steel trap inside of a sealed box surrounded by quicksand and oh, is that a puppy?"

author: Black Bolt to Agon and Rynda
quote: "Why?"

author: Maximus to Black Bolt
quote: "We do nothing. Brother, that's your strategy for everything."

author: Medusa and Maximus
quote: "We are not going to Earth anytime soon. It would only lead to war.""I'm sorry, Medusa. Are you speaking for yourself or for our King?""I'm speaking for myself.""Excellent. Now, please, can you tell us what the King thinks?"

author: Medusa to Black Bolt
quote: "Hello. I'm Medusa. I know everyone's afraid of you, but I'm not."

author: Maximus and Medusa
quote: "This is difficult, I know. But I'm here for you.""Thank you. But there's not much in this life that I can't handle.""You mean that Bolt can't handle. The rest of us have no choice. We're just bounced around according to his will.""Careful.""I'm just telling the truth. I would never treat you the way he does if you were my Queen."

author: Maximus and Kitang
quote: "Black Bolt is afraid that if we return to Earth, we will get into a war with the humans, but fear is not the emotion that should be dictating our actions. We need to be bold.""Your brother thinks different. And he is King, Maximus."

author: Maximus to Black Bolt
quote: "Hello, brother. You should've known this day was coming. But you didn't, did you? You've so completely taken me for granted that you can hardly imagine that I have thoughts of my own that I can carry through. It's your arrogance that has destroyed you."

author: Maximus to Black Bolt
quote: "Are you going to speak? Are you going to use your voice? Kill your only brother? Just like you murdered our parents?"

author: Beach
quote: "Freak."

author: Maximus
quote: "The days of Black Bolt's rigid meritocracy are over."

author: Kalama to Black Bolt
quote: "Hey! Are you not speaking? Or you one of those smart-asses that's waiting for your lawyers to come and get you?"

author: Pena
quote: "Put him in gen pop, but stick it to him. If he gets rattled hard enough by our other guests, maybe he'll be more inclined to talk."

author: Sammy to Black Bolt
quote: "I get it. You can't talk. Were you experimented on? Did you get bit by a radioactive bug? Or maybe you woke up one morning covered in a funky, rock-like crust? Yeah. You know what I'm talking about. Look, I'm not your enemy. I just wanted to warn you. People like you are disappearing from all over. You got family? A wife? Me, too. If I were you, I'd get out any way I could, and find them before something bad happens to them, too."

author: Kitang, Rynda and Agon
quote: "According to our testing, Black Bolt's voice may very well be the most powerful and dangerous gift in all of Inhuman history. And I have every reason to believe that as your mature, your power will only grow stronger.""But what does it mean?""It means that your eldest son has the power to destroy all of Attilan, on purpose or accidentally. You will never again hear the voice of your oldest son. Perhaps we should consider placing the boy somewhere safe.""You mean lock him away?""For the safety of Attilan, my Queen, and himself.""No. Absolutely not. He will learn to control his gift.""But Your Highness...""He is my son. Someday, he will be King."

author: Agon, Black Bolt and Maximus
quote: "Being King isn't what you think it is. Requires sacrifice, responsibility.""I'm sorry, Dad, but from what I've seen, your job is pretty boring.""It's not boring. He's the King.""Of Attilan. All 1,400 people.""Black Bolt, the day you take the crown, you will inherit all of the power and all the weight of being the leader of a great people.""Honestly, I don't want that. I'd rather just be me.""I wish I could be King.""Sorry it doesn't work that way, Maximus.""Like, if I'm killed in battle?""We're not at war at the moment.""But if he does die, I'm King, right?""No one is going to die. I promise. Both my sons are destined for great things."

author: Evan Declan and Maximus
quote: "If I could replicate his genetic code, cancer could be cured, cystic fibrosis. Imagine a world where children don't die where you you could become anything you want.""You don't need him alive to obtain his DNA."

author: Louise Fisher and Medusa
quote: "Do you have a job on the Moon?""I'm their Queen.""No wonder you're so bossy.""Queen... Queen Medusa and King...""Black Bolt.""Ugh. Suddenly, "Louise" doesn't sound so bad."

author: Evan Declan and Sammy to Black Bolt
quote: "Your DNA, it's not human. Usually, when someone develops abilities, there's a there's a hiccup in their genetic code. A circle, suddenly, in a row of squares. But your DNA, it's... It's row after row of circles more... more perfect than anything I've ever seen.""I think he likes you.""Your fMRI scan shows you have a an unusually large neural pathway connecting your cerebral cortex to your temporal lobe, supercharging your vocal cords. I'm both in awe of you and slightly terrified. Extremely terrified of you. I don't know how you do it. A whisper in your sleep would kill your wife. You have the power to kill everyone you love."

author: Mordis to Black Bolt
quote: "They say you're the most powerful Inhuman in all of Attilan. Want to find out?"

author: Medusa and Maximus
quote: "Black Bolt says that when he gets home, he wants to have a few words with you.""Tell my brother I look forward to the family reunion."

author: Louise Fisher and Medusa
quote: "You married the son of the people who banished your parents?""It's not like it sounds. We were alone. His parents died shortly after mine did. We understood loss. It connected us."

author: Medusa to Black Bolt
quote: "They don't understand because you've been guarded for so long. Maybe it's time everyone knows you like I do."

author: Auran and Evan Declan
quote: "Tell me where Black Bolt is, or I'll snap your neck.""What's a Black Bolt?""The one who doesn't speak."

author: Karnak to Black Bolt
quote: "You're a welcome sight too, my King."

author: Medusa and Gorgon
quote: "He said we need to take down Maximus, but what he means by "take down", I'm not exactly sure. I know I said we needed to throw Maximus off the highest wall in Attilan, but I think I think we need to take him alive.""Then let me smash his head in in front of the whole city.""Gorgon, I love you, but you are not helping. Haven't we learned anything from my parents?"

author: Auran to Medusa
quote: "I'm curious if Black Bolt still has that frankly disgusting  fondness for his human friends Declan and Sammy."

author: Medusa to Black Bolt
quote: "Why did I bring my parents up? I brought them up because when you became King, you said you never wanted to be like your own parents, like any other King before you. I'm reminding you that you promised me that you would be more understanding. Yes, he hurt me, and there's a part of me that wants him to pay for that, but we have to be bigger than that. So, to answer your question, no. No, we don't just let him walk away. We give him a fair trial. We let the people decide. Look. I am not trying to protect Maximus. I am trying to protect you. From yourself."

author: Maximus and Tibor
quote: "The people love me. They'll do anything for me.""Yes, my King.""And if Black Bolt obliterates them all, well, then, that'll make the rest of our citizens hate him all the more."

author: Mordis to Karnak
quote: "Black Bolt was just as dangerous, but he was given far more opportunities than I was."

author: Medusa to the Attilan Royal Guard
quote: "I suggest you stop, unless you want to deal with my husband."

author: Medusa to Black Bolt
quote: "I want to do more than survive. Is this the life that you wanted? I understand that you have to deal with reality, and I know that Maximus sent assassins. But where does this end? And what if the parley doesn't work? I understand more than most what Maximus is capable of. And I know he has to pay for his actions, but please... please!"

author: Medusa to Black Bolt
quote: "You allowed us all to mourn Triton's death. You deny us our dignity when you lie. But it is your duty as my husband to be honest to me in all things, to make me your partner. When you make a decision like this, when you sideline me, it is insulting. This time away, on Earth, it allowed me to step back and take a look at things, to see how people perceived me. Us. And I love you, and that has never changed. But I am not going to just be your interpreter. I need to have a say in in the things that affect our people, our lives. I am the Queen, and we move together or not at all."

author: Evan Declan and Karnak
quote: "I don't really have anything to contribute to a war.""If Black Bolt brought you, then you have some value."

author: Maximus to Black Bolt
quote: "Alone at last. Brother against brother. It's not like you to hide in the dark. But I guess times change, and us along with it."

author: Black Bolt to Maximus
quote: "Goodbye, brother."

author: Kitang to Black Bolt
quote: "Upon the death of your parents, your gift now makes perfect sense. You're the only one who can protect us from this, our greatest enemy."

author: Maximus to Black Bolt
quote: "How insulting that you, a murderer, would make a better king than I."

author: Maximus to Black Bolt
quote: "Really? You didn't want to be King, you just had to be King. That's rich, Black Bolt."

author: Medusa
quote: "We can no longer stay on the Moon. It is time for us to return to our homeland. To Earth. And Black Bolt and I will lead the way."

author: Medusa
quote: "He says that he needs to resolve this, that Maximus is too dangerous to leave unchecked."

author: Medusa to Black Bolt
quote: "You should be happy. You saved the Inhumans."

author: Black Panther to Captain America
quote: "Move, Captain. I won't ask a second time."

author: T'Challa to Helmut Zemo, referencing the Avengers
quote: "Vengeance has consumed you. It's consuming them. I am done letting it consume me."

author: Captain America and Falcon
quote: "Sam, southwest rooftop.""Who the hell is the other guy?""I'm about to find out."

author: Sam Wilson and Steve Rogers
quote: "So you like cats?"Sam...""What? Dude shows up dressed like a cat and you don't wanna know more?"

author: Natasha Romanoff and Tony Stark
quote: "I have an idea.""Me too. Where's yours?""Downstairs... Where's yours?"

author: Black Widow to Black Panther
quote: "I said I'd help you find him, not catch him. There's a difference."

author: Natasha Romanoff and Tony Stark
quote: "T'Challa told Ross what you did so, they're coming for ya, that's how it works now.""I'm not the one who needs to watch their back."

author: T'Chaka and T'Challa
quote: "For a man who disapproves of diplomacy, you're getting quite good at it.""I'm happy, Father."

author: T'Challa and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "In my culture, death is not the end. it's more of a stepping off point. You reach out with both hands and Bast and Sekhmet, they lead you into a green veld where... you can run forever."" That sounds very peaceful.""My father thought so. I am not my father.""T'Challa, Task Force will decide who brings in Barnes.""Don't bother Ms. Romanoff. I'll kill him myself."

author: T'Challa and Steve Rogers
quote: "Your suit, it's vibranium?"The Black Panther has been a protector of Wakanda for generations. A mantle passed from warrior to warrior. Now because your friend murdered my father, I also wear the mantle of king. So I ask you, as both warrior and king, how long do you think you can keep your friend safe from me?"

author: Black Panther and Captain America
quote: "Captain.""Your highness."

author: Winter Soldier and Black Panther
quote: "I didn't kill your father.""Then why did you run?"

author: Hawkeye and Black Panther
quote: "We haven't met yet. I'm Clint.""I don't care."

author: T'Challa to Helmut Zemo
quote: "Justice will come soon enough.""Tell that to the dead.""The living are not done with you yet."

author: Steve Rogers, Bucky Barnes, and T'Challa before Bucky goes into cryogenic hibernation
quote: "Are you sure about this?""I can't trust my own mind.""Your friend and my father, they were both victims. If I can help one of them find peace."

author: Steve Rogers and T'Challa
quote: "You know if they find out he's here, they'll come for him.""Let them try."

author: Spider-Man recording his reaction to the Clash of the Avengers
quote: "Okay, there's Captain America, Iron Man, Black Widow. Who's that new guy?"

author: Black Panther
quote: "The Black Panther has been a protector of Wakanda for generations. And now, it is time to show the outside world who we are."

author: T'Challa
quote: "If anyone found out what we truly are, what we possess... it could destroy the world."

author: T'Challa
quote: "This ends today!"

author: Black Panther
quote: "You were wrong! All of you were wrong! To turn your backs on the rest of the world! We let the fear of discovery stop us from doing what is right. No more! I cannot stay here with you. I cannot rest while he sits on the throne. He is a monster of our own making. I must take the mantle back. I must! I must right these wrongs."

author: T'Challa
quote: "Wakanda will no longer watch from the shadows. We can not. We must not. We will work to be an example of how we, as brothers and sisters on this earth, should treat each other. Now, more than ever, the illusions of division threaten our very existence. We all know the truth: more connects us than separates us. But in times of crisis the wise build bridges, while the foolish build barriers. We must find a way to look after one another, as if we were one single tribe."

author: Okoye
quote: "The Black Panther lives."

author: Shuri
quote: "The Black Panther fights for us. And I will be there beside him."

author: Erik Killmonger
quote: "Is this your king?"

author: T'Challa and T'Chaka
quote: "Tell me how to best protect Wakanda. I want to be a great king, Baba. Just like you.""You're going to struggle. So you'll need to surround yourself with people you trust. You're a good man with a good heart. And it's hard for a good man to be king."

author: Shuri and T'Challa
quote: "My king.""Ah, stop it."

author: Okoye and Black Panther
quote: "Just don't freeze when you see her.""What are you talking about? I never freeze."

author: Black Panther and Nakia
quote: "My uncle N'Jobu betrayed us, but my father...He may have created something even worse.""Hey. Look at me. You can't let your father's mistakes define who you are. You get to decide what kind of king you are going to be."

author: Black Panther and Erik Killmonger
quote: "What do you want?""I want the throne!"

author: Shrui and T'Challa
quote: "Wooh! Let's go! Look at your suit! You've been taking bullets and it's charging it up with kinetic energy!""Pull around the truck!""Show off!"

author: Erik Killmonger and T'Challa
quote: "Black Panther, you seem to be comfortable.""What do you want?""I want your secrets, your weapons. I'm gonna burn it all!"

author: Ramonda, Black Panther, Shuri, Nakia, Everett Ross and M'Baku
quote: "T'Challa, we will not leave Wakanda.""It is my duty to keep you safe.""If he gets control of our technology, nowhere will be safe. The Black Panther lives. And when he fights for the fate of Wakanda, I will be right there beside him.""As will I.""I'm in too. What? You're gonna need all the help you can get.""Are you're done? A-Are you-are you- are you done?""Give me and M'Baku a moment. Please allow my mother to stay here.""No harm will come to her. I give you my word.""You know, I could use an army as well.""I bet you could. But no."

author: Erik Killmonger and T'Challa
quote: "N'Jadaka!""Wassup?!""I never yielded! And as you can see, I am not dead!""All that challenge shit is over with! I'm the king now!"

author: T'Challa
quote: "Evacuate the City. Engage all defenses, And get this man a shield."

author: Black Panther
quote: "Today we don't fight for one life, we fight for all of them."

author: Okoye and T'Challa
quote: "The Kingsguard and the Dora Milaje have been alerted.""And the Border Tribe?""Those that are left.""Send word to the Jabari as well. M'Baku likes a good fight.""And what of this one?""This one may be tired of war, but the White Wolf has rested long enough."

author: Bucky Barnes and T'Challa
quote: "Where's the fight?""On its way."

author: Black Panther and Wakandans
quote: "Yibambe![1]""Yibambe!"

author: Okoye and T'Challa
quote: "When you said we were going to open Wakanda to the rest of the world, this is not what I imagined.""What did you imagine?""The Olympics. Maybe even a Starbucks."

author: Natasha Romanoff, Proxima Midnight, Steve Rogers and T'Challa
quote: "Where's your other friend?""You will pay for his life with yours. Thanos will have that stone.""That's not going to happen.""You are in Wakanda now. Thanos will have nothing but dust and blood.""We...have blood to spare."

author: Black Panther and Shuri
quote: "How much longer, Shuri?""I've barely begun, brother.""You might want to pick up the pace."

author: T'Challa offers to take the Nano Gauntlet from Hawkeye during the Battle of Earth
quote: "Clint, give it to me."

author: Black Widow to Happy Hogan
quote: "Eyes on the road."

author: Tony Stark and Pepper Potts
quote: "Oh wow, very, very impressive individual. She's fluent in French, Italian, Russian, Latin. Who speaks Latin?""No one speaks Latin, it's a dead language. You can read Latin, or you can write Latin, but you can't speak Latin.""Did you model in Tokyo? 'Cuz she modeled in Tokyo."

author: Tony Stark and Black Widow
quote: "Huh! You're... fired.""That's not up to you."

author: Black Widow and Tony Stark
quote: "I'm surprised you can keep your mouth shut.""God you're good. You are mind blowingly duplicitous. How do you do it? You're a triple impostor, I've never seen anything like it. Is there anything real about you? Do you even speak Latin?""Fallaces sunt rerum species et hominum spes fallunt."[1]"Which means? Wait, what did you just say?""It means you can either drive yourself home or I can have you collected."

author: Black Widow and Tony Stark
quote: "Well done with the new chest piece. I'm reading significantly higher output and your vitals all look promising.""Yes, for the moment, I'm not dying. Thank you."

author: Black Widow to Phil Coulson
quote: "Let me put you on hold."

author: Black Widow to Captain America
quote: "It was quite the buzz around here, finding you in the ice. I thought Coulson was gonna  swoon."

author: Black Widow to Bruce Banner
quote: "S.H.I.E.L.D. monitors potential threats."

author: Black Widow
quote: "These guys come from legend, Captain. They're basically gods."

author: Phil Coulson and Black Widow
quote: "I'll brief you on everything when you get back. But first, we need you to talk to the big guy.""Coulson, you know that Stark trusts me about as far as he can throw me.""Oh, I've got Stark. You get the big guy.""Bozhe moi![2]"

author: Thor and Black Widow
quote: "Loki is beyond reason, but he is of Asgard and he is my brother!""He killed eighty people in two days.""He's adopted."

author: Loki and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "Is that love, Agent Romanoff?""Love is for children; I owe that man a debt."

author: Black Widow and Loki
quote: "Regimes fall every day. I tend not to weep over that, I'm Russian, or I was.""And what are you now?""It's really not that complicated. I've got red in my ledger, I'd like to wipe it out.""Can you? Can you wipe out that much red? Drakoff's daughter? Sao Paulo? The hospital fire? Barton told me everything."

author: Black Widow and Steve Rogers
quote: "How do we do this?""As a team!"

author: Black Widow and Hawkeye
quote: "Just like Budapest, all over again.""You and I remember Budapest

author: Black Widow to Captain America
quote: "Most of the intelligence community doesn't believe he exists. The ones that do call him the Winter Soldier. He's a ghost. You'll never find him."

author: Black Widow to Nick Fury, while watching him 'die'.
quote: "Don't do this to me, Nick."

author: Black Widow
quote: "When I first joined S.H.I.E.L.D., I thought it was going straight. But I guess I just traded in the KGB for HYDRA."

author: Black Widow
quote: "If you want to arrest me, arrest me. You'll know where to find me"

author: Black Widow and Captain America evading Brock Rumlow
quote: "Kiss me.""What?""Public displays of affection make people uncomfortable.""Yes, they do.""Still feel uncomfortable?"

author: Captain America and Black Widow
quote: "Believe it or not, it's kinda hard to find someone with shared life experiences.""Oh that's all right, just make something up.""What, like you?""I don't know, the truth is a matter of circumstances. It's not all things to all people all the time, and neither am I.""That's a tough way to live.""It's a good way not to die though."

author: Sam Wilson, Natasha Romanoff and Nick Fury
quote: "Please tell me you got those choppers in the air!""Sam, where are you?""41st floor, northwest corner!""Got it! Stay where you are!""Not an option! 41st floor! Forty-first!""It's not like they put the floor numbers on the outside of the building."

author: Black Widow to Hulk
quote: "Hey, big guy. Sun's getting real low."

author: Natasha Romanoff to Bruce Banner
quote: "All my friends are fighters, and here comes a guy avoiding a fight 'cause he knows he'll win."

author: Natasha Romanoff to Tony Stark and Bruce Banner
quote: "When you two programmed him to protect the human race, you amazingly failed."

author: Black Widow
quote: "I'm always picking up after you boys."

author: Black Widow to Hulk
quote: "Let's finish the job."

author: Black Widow to Nick Fury
quote: "Nothing lasts forever."

author: Thor and Black Widow
quote: "Loki's Scepter must be here. Strucker couldn't mount this defense without it. At long last."""At long last" is lasting a little long, boys."

author: Natasha Romanoff and Madame B.
quote: "You'll break them.""Only the breakable ones. You're made of marble. We'll celebrate after the graduation ceremony.""What if I fail?""You never fail."

author: Madame B. and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "Sloppy. Pretending to fail. The ceremony is necessary... for you to take your place in the world.""I have no place in the world.""Exactly."

author: Nick Fury, Natasha Romanoff and Steve Rogers
quote: "Ultron says the Avengers are the only thing between him and his mission. And whether or not he admits it, his mission is global destruction. All this, laid in a grave. So stand. Outwit the platinum bastard.""Steve doesn't like that kind of talk.""You know what, Romanoff?"

author: Iron Man and Black Widow
quote: "Romanoff. You and Banner better not be playing "hide the zucchini."""Relax, shellhead. Not all of us can fly."

author: Captain America and Black Widow
quote: "You wanna keep staring at the wall, or do you wanna go to work? I mean, it's a pretty interesting wall.""I thought you and Tony were still gazing into each other's eyes. How do we look?""Well, we're not the '27 Yankees.""We got some hitters.""They're good. They're not a team.""Let's beat them into shape."

author: Black Widow to Falcon
quote: "What’s going on down there, Sam?"

author: Natasha Romanoff to Steve Rogers
quote: "After everything that happened with S.H.I.E.L.D., during my little hiatus, I went back to Russia and tried to find my parents. Two little gravestones by a chain-link fence. I pulled some weeds and left some flowers. We have what we have when we have it."

author: Black Widow to Captain America
quote: "Steve, you know what's about to happen. Do you really want to punch your way out of this?"

author: Black Widow
quote: "This isn't gonna end well..."

author: Captain America, Scarlet Witch and Black Widow
quote: "You see that ranger over half way up the block?""You mean the red one? It's cute.""It's also bullet proof, which means private security, which means more guns, which means more headaches for somebody, probably us.""You guys know I can move things with my mind, right?""Looking over your shoulder needs to become a second nature."

author: Black Widow and Falcon
quote: "Thanks, Sam.""Don't thank me.""I'm not thanking that thing.""His name is Redwing.""I'm still not thanking it.""He's cute. Go on, pet 'em."

author: Thaddeus Ross and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "Three days from now, the UN meets in Vienna to ratify the Accords. So, talk it over.""And if we come to a decision you don't like?""Then you retire."

author: Natasha Romanoff and Sam Wilson
quote: "Maybe Tony is right. If, we have one hand on the wheel that can still steer.""Aren't you the same woman who told the government to kiss our ass a few years ago?""I'm just... monitoring. We have made some very public mistakes."

author: Tony Stark and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "I'm sorry, did I mishear you or did you agree with me?""Oh, I want to take it back."

author: Natasha Romanoff and Steve Rogers
quote: "I know how much Barnes mean to you. I really do. Stay at home. You'll only make this worse for all of us. Please.""Are you saying you'll arrest me?""No. Someone will, if you interfere. That's how it works now.""If he's this far gone, then... I should be the one to bring him in.""Why?""Because I'm the one least likely to die trying."

author: Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanoff, Sam Wilson and Tony Stark
quote: "I'm not getting that shield back, am I?""Technically, it's the government's property. Wings too.""That's cold.""Warmer than jail."

author: Natasha Romanoff and Thaddeus Ross
quote: "What happens when the shooting starts, let them kill Steve Rogers?""If we are provoked. Barnes would have been eliminate in Romania if it wasn't for Rogers. There are dead people who would be alive now. Feel free to check my math."

author: Natasha Romanoff and Tony Stark
quote: "We're seriously understaffed.""Oh, yeah. It would be great if we had a Hulk, right about now. Any shot?""You really think he'd be on our side?"

author: Ant-Man and Black Widow
quote: "Look, I really don't want to hurt you.""I wouldn't stress about it."

author: Black Widow and Hawkeye
quote: "We're still friends, right?""Depends on how hard you hit me."

author: Tony Stark and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "They're coming for you.""I'm not the one that needs to watch their back."

author: Spider-Man recording his reaction to the Clash of the Avengers
quote: "Okay, there's Captain America, Iron Man, Black Widow. Who's that new guy?"

author: Roger Harrington and Flash Thompson
quote: "Flash, you're in for Peter.""I don't know. I gotta check my calendar first. I got a hot date with Black Widow coming up."

author: Thor and Bruce Banner
quote: "Banner. Hey, hey, hey. You all right, Banner? Sun's going down. Sun's going down. That's it, breathe. I won't hurt you. Sun's going down.""Thor.""Yeah.""What happened to your hair?""Some creepy old man cut it off.""It looks good.""Thanks.""Where are we? How's Nat?""Nat is good, I'm sure.""Is she okay?"

author: Black Widow to Proxima Midnight and Corvus Glaive
quote: "We don't want to kill you. But we will."

author: Nick Fury, Tony Stark, Vision, Thor, and Natasha Romanoff in the trailer
quote: "There was an idea...""To bring together, a group of remarkable people...""To see if we could become something more... ""So when they needed us, we could fight the battles...""That they never could."

author: Thaddeus Ross and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "You've got some nerve, I'll give you that.""You could use some of that right now."

author: Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanoff, and Sam Wilson
quote: "I think you look great. Yeah. I'm back.""Hi, Bruce.""Nat.""This is awkward."

author: Bruce Banner and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "Thanos has the biggest army in the universe. And he is not gonna stop until he... he gets... Vision's stone.""Well, then we have to protect it."

author: Vision, Natasha Romanoff, T'Challa, Steve Rogers, and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "It's too late. We need to destroy the stone now.""Vision, get your ass back on the table.""We will hold them off.""Wanda. As soon as that stone is out of his head, you blow it to hell.""I will.""Evacuate the city, engage all defenses and get this man a shield."

author: Proxima Midnight and Black Widow
quote: "He'll die alone. As will you.""She's not alone."

author: Black Widow and Proxima Midnight
quote: "Where's your other friend?""You will pay for his life with yours. Thanos will have that stone."

author: Steve Rogers and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "This is a nightmare.""I've had better nightmares."

author: Steve Rogers, James Rhodes, Bruce Banner and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "I thought we bypassed the battery.""We did. It's still plugged in, it just... it just stopped.""Reboot and send the signal again.""We don't even know what this is.""Fury did. You tell me the second you get a signal. I wanna know who's on the other end of that thing."

author: Black Widow
quote: "Thanos did what exactly he said he was gonna do. He wiped out 50% of all living creatures."

author: Black Widow
quote: "Whatever it takes."

author: Clint Barton, Thor, Bruce Banner and Steve Rogers
quote: "Can't get her back.""What?""It can't be undone. It can't.""Look, I'm sorry, no offence, but you're a very earthly being, okay, and we're talking about space magic, and can't seems very definitive.""Yeah, look, I know that I'm way outside my pay grade here, but she's still isn't here, isn't she?""No. That's my point.""It can't be undone! Or that's at least what the red floating guy had to say! Maybe you wanna go talk to him! Okay, go grab your hammer, and you go fly and you talk to him! It was supposed to be me. Sacrificed her life for that goddamned stone, she bet her life on it!""She's not coming back. We have to make it worth it. We have to.""We will."

author: Black Widow, Hulk, War Machine, Captain Marvel and Captain America
quote: "He used the stones again.""Hey, hey, hey, hey. We'd be going in short-handed, you know?""Look, he still got the stones, so...""So let's get 'em. We use them to bring everyone back.""Just like that?""Yeah. Just like that.""Even if there's a small chance that we can undo this, I mean we owe it to everyone who's not in this room to try."

author: Hulk, War Machine and Captain Marvel
quote: "If we do this, how do we know it's gonna end any differently than it did before?""Because before you didn't have me.""Hey, new girl? Everybody in this room is about that superhero life. And if you don't mind my asking, where the hell have you been all this time?""There are a lot of other planets in the universe, and unfortunately, they didn't have you guys."

author: Black Widow and Captain America
quote: "This is gonna work, Steve.""I know it is. 'Cause I don't know what I'm gonna do if it doesn't."

author: Ant-Man, Captain America, and Black Widow
quote: "Hi! Uh, is anyone home? This is Scott Lang. We met a few years ago, at the airport, in Germany? I got really big.""Is this an old message?""Ant-Man? Ant-M - I know you know wh - I know you know that!""That's the front door.""That's me. Can you buzz me in?"

author: Phil Coulson to Grant Ward
quote: "Agent Hill did a very detailed assessment of your last three missions. Combat, top grades. Espionage, she gave you the highest marks since Romanoff."

author: Victoria Hand and Phil Coulson
quote: "Barton, Romanoff, they never have an extraction plan.""They know that going in!"

movie: The Only Light in the Darkness
author: Eric Koenig and Grant Ward
quote: "Fury designed this himself. He wanted a Lie Detector Romanoff couldn't beat.""Did she?""Like Fury would tell!"

author: Grant Ward and Maria Hill
quote: "If he needed eye candy around, he could have at least picked Romanoff.""That's funny, I'll tell her you said that."

author: Sam Koenig and Daisy Johnson
quote: "Did you know that online, there's a library of fan fiction about Quake?""Did not need to know that.""Oh, well, you should Google it. Because it's... it's... Actually, no, you shouldn't. You shouldn't. Forget I said that. Some of it is a little on the steamier side. Not that I've read it! You But you hear things. I mean, they got you 'shipping with Black Widow."

movie: WHIH Breaking News: Attack in Lagos
author: Christine Everhart and Jackson Norris
quote: "Now, Jackson, which Avengers were there exactly? Tony Stark?""Captain Rogers involvement has been mentioned and corroborated. Some accounts indicate Sam Wilson and Natasha Romanoff, but nothing else definitive at this time."

movie: The Avengers Prelude: Black Widow Strikes
author: Black Widow
quote: "Fortunately, the Miniaturized Smoke Grenades that Coulson gave me have a variety of uses."

author: Donnie Gill
quote: "Kids at my home town wouldn't talk to me and when S.H.I.E.L.D. told my dad that I was gifted he said, "at what?""

author: Donnie Gill
quote: "Oh god, oh god. What is this? Hey what's happening to me?! Help me help me! Get it off! Make it stop! Help me get it off! No! Make it stop!."

author: Leo Fitz and Donnie Gill
quote: "You shouldn't keep these big ideas to yourself, you should run them by your instructors.""These aren't my big ideas."

author: Seth Dormer and Donnie Gill
quote: "The ice stopped, so it's ending?""No, it's just beginning. We're in the eye of the storm."

author: Leo Fitz and Donnie Gill
quote: "Donnie, I wanted to wish you good luck and I'm very sorry.""Don't say you're sorry, my only friend is dead because of me.""I don't know what else to say.""Then don't say anything."

author: Donnie Gill
quote: "A degree. I used to study engineering."

author: Donnie Gill
quote: "I want to be left alone but you people won't stop coming after me. So I'm done hiding. It's time HYDRA learn once and for all I'm not interested. I'm not afraid. I'm pissed off. And every HYDRA agent they send is going to feel it."

author: Phil Coulson and Melinda May discuss Donnie's Gill's training
quote: "Most likely scenario, HYDRAs looking for another weapon. From what we've been able to piece together Donnie Gill had limited powers when he entered the sandbox but...""While there he was taught to control, amplify those powers."

author: Antoine Triplett
quote: "Iceberg in the Middle East? Gill's not subtle."

author: Elias and Donnie Gill
quote: "Marrakech has a long history of giving shelter to travellers hiding from their past.""Why would you think I'm hiding? Who were you speaking to? Huh?!""They threatened me, they said you were dangerous."

author: Gill and Jemma Simmons
quote: "Which side are you? S.H.I.E.L.D.? HYDRA? What side did you wind up on?""I'd like to think that I'm on your side."

author: Sunil Bakshi and Donnie Gill
quote: "You know what is best. What is best is you comply.""I don't...""Compliance will be rewarded. Mr. Gill, are you ready to comply?""I'm happy to comply."

author: Isabelle Hartley and Lance Hunter
quote: "He's not a big picture kind a guy.""Sound like my ex-wife.""And you should have listened to her, too."

author: Skye and Lance Hunter
quote: "How did you guys meet?""Through my psychotic ex-wife."

author: Lance Hunter
quote: "I packed your chute. And according to my ex, my folding skills are abysmal."

author: Lance Hunter about Bobbi Morse
quote: "I first met her on a spring night. She was on the pier, facing the Outer Banks; the moonlight glinting off her face. She resembled a goddess. Of course, that was her cruel trick."

author: Lance Hunter, Alphonso Mackenzie, Antoine Triplett and Skye
quote: "Ha ha, and no. It didn't work out because interspecies relationships are hard. I was a human, whereas she was a demonic hell-beast.""He doesn't like her.""You don't say.""She's pure evil.""Hey, at least you got away from your ex, the guy I had a crush on is now the psycho living in our basement.""You know, I wish I could relate, but all my exes are awesome.""Is that right? I seem to remember an entire year when you had to pretend you liked quinoa.""Yeah, that was a dark time."

movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
author: Bobbi Morse
quote: "We have a mole, ladies and gentlemen, right here in our very facility!"

movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
author: Jemma Simmons and Phil Coulson
quote: "She's amazing.""That's why I asked her to join the team."

movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
author: Lance Hunter, Phil Coulson and Bobbi Morse
quote: "Anyone want to tell me what the bloody hell she's doing here?""Bobbi's one of our best agents.""Oh that's rich, mind telling me what I'm doing here?!""That's easy, I vouched for you."

author: Bobbi Morse
quote: "S.H.I.E.L.D.'s not S.H.I.E.L.D. anymore. I'm trying to figure out where I fit in, too."

author: Lance Hunter and Melinda May
quote: "Try being married to somebody who remembers every single little detail. It's not that charming. ... You think I'm being petty, don't you? Well, I'm not. I don't have a problem with Bob kissing that guy.""Good. Because you had a hickey on your neck for a week after our mission in Miami.""Well excuse me doing my job thoroughly. And with style."

author: Lance Hunter
quote: "She can handle it; deception's her forte."

author: Bobbi Morse and Melinda May
quote: "You ever been married?"" ... ""You still talk to him?"" ... ""Right. Good advice."

author: Grant Ward and Bobbi Morse
quote: "It can't be that interesting.""Why do you say that?""Because you were on page 117 when you were waiting outside. And you're still on page 117. So either you're a really slow reader, or you're working for Coulson.""Who?""I am impressed. And you can tell him I said that. I almost missed you.""What are you talking about?""I'm sure they told you about this. If you try or say anything, everyone in this bus will be flying. So just keep reading your book, and hope for a happy ending."

author: Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
quote: "Subtlety is key.""You were dressed like a cowboy!"

author: Lance Hunter
quote: "Bobbi can pretend to like anything."

author: Skye and Phil Coulson
quote: "Didn't want to crack him yourself?""Bobbi is as good as they come."

author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
quote: "Don't die out there, ok?""It's Canada."

author: Phil Coulson and Bobbi Morse
quote: "You ever had the fried plantains here?""From Tostones? Yeah, why?""I heard about this place down the street where they put crab in them. I wouldn't mind trying that. You know, after we save the world."

author: Bobbi Morse and Phil Coulson
quote: "With all due respect, sir, this kind of op, Fury would have a number.""A number?""Of acceptable losses.""My number is zero."

author: Phil Coulson and Bobbi Morse
quote: "Look around you. Venders, selling their wares to bring home a modest income. Locals, buying fresh vegetables for dinner tonight. Tourists, on their one vacation a year.""Point?""They are the point. The're the reason I'm here. The reason there's a S.H.I.E.L.D.. There are three million people on this island. I don't want HYDRA turning them into collateral damage."

author: Jemma Simmons and Bobbi Morse
quote: "We were in the bottom of the ocean, in a storage pod, left for dead. And Fitz... he said something that caught me completely off-guard.""Ah, those three little words.""Yes! Well, no. I mean, not exactly. I barely had a moment to process what he said or how I felt about it, next thing I know, he's giving me the oxygen, water's rushing in and... He's ... He's laying there, in the hospital bed. He was so pale.""How long was Fitz in the coma?""Nine of the longest days of my life. When it finally broke, he couldn't speak. He just stared at me, confused. All I wanted to do was help him. All I wanted was... My best friend back.""Your best friend?""I never thought of him as anything else. That said, I can't imagine my life without him. It's all very confusing.""You've never told him any of this, have you?""Oh, lord no."

author: Phil Coulson, Lance Hunter, and Bobbi Morse
quote: "Two goals; stop the drill, find Skye.""Aren't you forgetting the third?""What's that?""Don't die out there. We tend to remind each other not to die.""I thought that was implicit.""He likes to hear it.""Who doesn't like to hear it?"

author: Bobbi Morse and Skye
quote: "I've been in quarantine before, and I know it can drive you absolutely nuts.""Thanks. I was beginning to feel like a leper.""Are you kidding? You managed to be taken hostage by three known murderers, you gunned Ward down, then were blasted by an alien chemical weapon and walked out unscathed. Leper? I think you're a rock star."

author: Phil Coulson,Alphonso Mackenzie,Melinda May, Lance Hunter, Bobbi Morse, Skye, and Leo Fitz
quote: "I shouldn't have to ask any of you to save one of our own.""You never ask! You just give your orders, no matter cracked up they are!""Mack, you'd do well to remember your rank right now.""Really? Rank at a time like this? Why don't you shove your rank up your...""Not helping, Hunter.""Guys, stop.""No, it's cathartic. Do you have any thoughts of your own on it, or do you just parrot his?""Coulson's trying to stop HYDRA.""We didn't stop anything! We unleashed something on the planet!""Please.""No one knows what happened yet.""It could have been a lot worse.""And Skye barely made it out alive!""Thanks to Trip. He sacrificed his life, Mack!""No! He traded his life for hers! And then he was shattered into a thousand pieces!""That's enough! If Trip was here, he wouldn't be arguing, he wouldn't be bitching. He would be gearing up to do what needs to be done. Yes, we're dealing with forces we don't understand, but HYDRA I do understand. I want everyone ready when the sun comes up. End of discussion."

author: Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
quote: "(in American accent)Your presence is most welcome.""Drop the accent. It makes you sound like a douche bag.""(Reverting to normal voice)Now you know what it feels like for me to live in this country."

author: Jemma Simmons, Leo Fitz, Alphonso Mackenzie, Bobbi Morse, and Lance Hunter
quote: "Skye is my friend. She's different.""Oh, yeah. Like I was your friend, and then I changed. How did you handle that?""Uh, t-the point is, secrets don't help any of us. Skye should have just come clean.""What, and risked being locked up, studied, or who know what else? No, I wouldn't let her.""Oh, you wouldn't let her.""We could have handled her in a way that could have kept everybody safe.""It wasn't fair to us, Fitz. We had a right to know.""A right to know. What... is that the same way that Sif and the Kree had the right to know?""I think the situation is a bit different, mate.""No, you would have done to her exactly what they wanted to.""You don't know that!""Yes, I do know that! They would--you would--you'd "handle her"! Mack just said! Like, uh... like Skye's something to be locked up in a cage somewhere. We should be protecting her.""No, Fitz. We're the ones that need the protection from her."

author: Bobbi Morse
quote: "We're spies, we lie for a living."

movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
quote: "Everything I felt for you, that was real.""Yeah maybe so, but in the end you still got that intel didn't you?"

movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
author: Robert Gonzales and Bobbi Morse
quote: "This is your op, Morse, so tell me how do you want to proceed?""Skye's not the main concern. Coulson and his secrets, that's the threat. And I think it's time that we remove that threat."

author: Bobbi Morse
quote: "We can't keep pretending that everything's the same as it was yesterday. I mean, look around. Half of our friends are either dead or have turned. This isn't a time to go down with the ship. We need to do something. We need to stop this."

author: Bobbi Morse and Isabelle Hartley
quote: "Got to get you a gun one of these days.""Save my bullets for the real fight."

author: Alphonso Mackenzie, Isabelle Hartley, and Bobbi Morse
quote: "What's the plan? What are you even doing here?""Fury left us orders.""To do what?""To save S.H.I.E.L.D.."

author: Bobbi Morse and Melinda May
quote: "There's no need for the gun; I can explain.""Can't wait."

author: Bobbi Morse and Melinda May
quote: "I work for S.H.I.E.L.D., I do. I swear. But you don't.""Try again.""What Coulson's doing here, this isn't S.H.I.E.L.D - not the real S.H.I.E.L.D., anyway.""The last person who betrayed me... I broke his larynx. Hand that over."

author: Robert Gonzales and Bobbi Morse
quote: "Seven agents down, Calderon barely hanging on, and you want to defend that thing?""What happened wasn't her fault. I was there. Calderon fired at her.""She was armed and hostile.""She was scared and defending herself.""I don't care if she was chasing butterflies. We can't wear kid gloves around something with powers of that magnitude."

author: Robert Gonzales, Jemma Simmons, Bobbi Morse, and Leo Fitz
quote: "Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons, the ones that got away. I had my eye on you two when you were at the Academy. I wanted to recruit you, but Coulson beat me to it. I heard he actually bribed Weaver with cupcakes. Robert Gonzales.""We know who you are, and we are quite aware of your commendable reputation. Under different circumstances, we might even be flattered... Which is why this is so hard to comprehend.""Under different circumstances, we would have preferred to be invited guests, but that forced our hand. We had to take it out of play.""What's inside that's so important?""All we know is that Coulson and Fury both believed it was valuable enough or dangerous enough to protect with extreme measures.""Maybe it was their favorite recipes."

author: Bobbi Morse and Alphonso Mackenzie
quote: "Finally, an actual partner...Little tip; could have avoided losing your footing if you would have flipped into it.""A flip? Now you're just making fun of me.""Maybe a little. It's not like I can bench-press a small hatchback.""Yeah. We all have our talents."

author: Robert Gonzales and Bobbi Morse
quote: "These people are a threat.""We don't know that.""We don't know anything about them."

author: Bobbi Morse to Grant Ward and Kara Palamas
quote: "If I ever apologize or beg for mercy while you torture me, know that I don't mean a word of it... not a word. I made a hard call. I'd make the same one again right now."

author: Melinda May
quote: "But if anyone can handle him, it's Bobbi."

author: Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
quote: "You look better, stupid but better, taking a bullet for me was stupid.""Walking into a trap when you know it's a trap is stupid.""You were the bait."

author: Joey Gutierrez and Bobbi Morse
quote: "Who the hell are you?""My name's Bobbi. As in the name usually short for "Robert," but in my case, "Barbara," which, to me, is worse. This room is all yours, so feel free to make yourself at home. When you change, just put your clothing and any personal belongings in the drawer over here for analysis. The screen will then ask you to perform a series of medical scans. I know that you're not a huge fan of check-ups, but this will be painless.""No offense, but I don't know you, so don't act like you know a damn thing about me.""I know you put off your yearly physicals at least once every year. I know that your ex-boyfriend was a health nut and was on you to take better care of yourself. But it wasn't until you two broke up that you finally got your gym membership.""You've been spying on me?""Looked at your Facebook page. I did see enough to know that you're generally more concerned for others than you are for yourself."

author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
quote: "Want to tell me why you're not speaking to me?""Because... You're not supposed to see the bride on the wedding day. So, are we gonna do this or what?""I asked for the ring back because I paid for it, not as a meaningful gesture of any kind. But thanks, oh, great master of melodrama.""Why? Because it wasn't at all melodramatic when you whispered on your death bed, "I can't do this anymore."""I meant pretend not to... You know... I didn't mean that we should make the tragic mistake of marrying each other... again.""Call it what you will, but you've got the ring you once threw in my face, and we're shagging on the regular, so only thing missing is a piece of paper.""And your ring, not that you know where it is.""I know exactly where it is. Just don't personally own the scuba-diving equipment to retrieve it."

author: Leo Fitz, Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
quote: "I won't give up. I can't give up.""None of us want to, Fitz, but...""Fitz, you tried. Okay? You tried your hardest. Everybody knows that.""No. I missed something."

author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
quote: "Damn it. I wanna go after him with you.""You're still on the mend. Plus, you've been undercover with HYDRA, and that face makes an impression. The rest of you makes a bloody statement.""You like me stuck here in the lab.""Too bloody right. You're missing half a lung because you took a bullet Ward intended for me. Nearly bled out in my arms. If you being in the lab means I never have to see something like that again, I'm all for it."

author: Bobbi Morse and Jemma Simmons
quote: "You're safe. That portal won't open again.""But it has to. I have to go back."

author: Melinda May and Lance Hunter
quote: "What if there are innocent lives at risk?""There are always lives at risk! You were there when Bobbi was bleeding out in my arms, Ward did that. If I have a shot at finding him I'm taking it. I have to, before Bobbi gets back in the field."

author: Bobbi Morse and Melinda May
quote: "Coulson still has me off combat duty. The tests say that my lung isn't healed all the way yet.""My test says otherwise. Wheels up in 20. Welcome back, Agent Morse."

author: Kebo and Bobbi Morse
quote: "I've taken down men three times your size, girl. What makes you think you can beat me?""Experience."

author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
quote: "I don't want either of us to go after Ward.""You're joking right? Since when? Whatever it is lay it on me.""I think you've been reckless and stupid.""Can I take back what I just said?"

author: Steve Wilson and Bobbi Morse undercover as "Agent Phillips"
quote: "This guy does not look like FBI.""He wasn't. Dane here crashed the Pentagon servers, Mossad's, Ashley Madison. He's the best consultant we have. Otherwise, he'd be in jail or... I'd have shot him by now."

author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
quote: "Well, once again, too little and too late.""I'll remind you that we're basically the same height. I just don't wear bloody heels. I even had a pine for the days where we didn't have to fight bloody aliens. It's just not a fair fight.""Let's see if we can level the playing field.""Really? Your batons? That's your game-changer?"

author: Phil Coulson, Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
quote: "I figured out a way to track down Ward, but we got to go off book.""My specialty.""I'm not sure taking Hunter is really such a good idea.""You're going, too, Agent Morse. We need a pilot."

author: Phil Coulson and Bobbi Morse
quote: "How long till we reach HYDRA airspace?""We're about 10 minutes out. Sir? About what happened back there...""We got what we needed. End of story.""I understand. But that look on your face...I've seen it before. It's the same look Hunter had when he went after Ward.""Not sure I'm getting your point.""It's dangerous going into a mission that emotional. You need to be able to separate the job from your own feelings.""You're wrong. I've been keeping my feelings in check, and look what it got us. Rosalind's dead, Ward has Fitz and Simmons. My only regret is that I didn't kill that son of a bitch when I had the chance.""Coulson...""Let me know when we're close."

author: Joey Gutierrez and Bobbi Morse
quote: "I might be able to reinforce the doors. You know, using my, uh...my, uh...""Amazing new superpower.""Yeah. That."

author: Lance Hunter, Bobbi Morse and Alphonso Mackenzie
quote: "Invisibility... Imagine the possibilities.""What are you imagining?""Nothing fun.""Get used to it. We can't put the Terrigen genie back in the bottle. Powers are the new normal.""I think you're just jealous.""Damn right I am. Tell me you didn't try one of those little fish-oil pills. I had my fingers crossed for x-ray vision. I was just curious. I wasn't the only one.""I mean, I-I thought about it. I didn't actually do it. Rehab was a bitch.""Man, you two deserve each other."

author: Melinda May, Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
quote: "Great. Coulson's in trouble, the place is crawling with armed HYDRA Agents, and we have no weapons.""Not strictly true. Buon appetito.""I love you.""I don't hate you quite as much."

author: Alphonso Mackenzie, Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
quote: "What's wrong, Tremors?""Well, aside from the fact that this thing is ancient, I do not read Cyrillic.""Yet.""Forever the optimist.""Come on, Daisy. You can hack the Pentagon and shake the Earth. You're gonna let a few backwards letters trip you up?"

author: Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
quote: "Wait, wait, hold on. The letter that looks like New Hampshire with legs that's "D," right?""Da.""Great."

author: Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
quote: "Converting to Unicode, and...""Spasibo, Daisy.""De nada.""Pretty sure that's not Russian.""Whatever."

author: Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
quote: "Fitz is here.""It's the Spy's Goodbye."

author: Daisy Johnson and Phil Coulson
quote: "Ex-SVR, Special Ops The same Special Ops division the two men who tried to assassinate the Director were in.""And there's our link to Nadeer.""Get this. They all have ties to Prime Minister Olshenko.""The Russian Prime Minister who was attacked by an Inhuman And then threw Bobbi and Hunter under the bus after they saved his life."

author: Brett Mahoney and Foggy Nelson
quote: "Officer of the law, defense attorney. We're supposed to be enemies.""First of, we've been enemies since we were four, Brett, so let's not blame it on career choices. Secondly, I'm not a particularly good defense attorney."

author: Brett Mahoney and Foggy Nelson
quote: "Please stop giving my mom cigars, Foggy.""What? She'll outlive us all."

author: Brett Mahoney and Foggy Nelson
quote: "Homicide, female suspect found at the scene, definitely qualifies as interesting.""She hasn't been charged yet?""Assistant D.A. hasn't made the call yet."

author: Brett Mahoney and Matt Murdock
quote: "You're going after Tully?""Yeh you know him?""Yeh, guys a real scumbag, but he stays just the right side of the law so there's nothing we can do."

author: Brett Mahoney and Karen Page
quote: "Multiple stab wounds. The ambulance got there quick, but my mom says all the family she knew about's passed on. I knew you were looking into her tenancy case. I thought you might be able to point us toward the next of kin.""No, she didn't have anyone. Just us."

author: Brett Mahoney and the Masked Man
quote: "Hey you're the guy, the one that killed Blake and shot those cops!""I didn't kill Detective Blake, or shoot those cops. Blake and Hoffman were dirty, working for Wilson Fisk, along with a lot of others from your precinct. I'm not the bad guy."

author: Brett Mahoney
quote: "Ain't you seen

author: Brett Mahoney and Matt Murdock
quote: "The way things are going around here, I'm thinking about taking an early pension. Move my mom somewhere warm.""Be a shame. The only cop on the force we know for sure is honest."

author: Daredevil and Brett Mahoney
quote: "I told you before, Sergeant, I'm not the bad guy.""Holy shit, it's you."

author: Brett Mahoney and Foggy Nelson
quote: "If you're here to chase ambulances, you might notice there are none.""Any leads on what happened?""Oh, you wanna know what went down? Read about it in the papers like everybody else."

author: Brett Mahoney and Foggy Nelson
quote: "Now, we got history, so I'll tell you as a friend, you stay out of this shit. If you got a witness, the smart move is to turn him over and walk away. Hell's Kitchen is about to explode.""You hear that? He called me friend."

author: Brett Mahoney
quote: "Ever tell you what Clemons used to say? Gotta treat witnesses like mushrooms, feed 'em shit and keep them in the dark."

author: Brett Mahoney to Foggy Nelson
