quote: "Auran and her people don't know that you're broken. And they think that the almighty Karnak is gonna be heading their way. So give them what they expect. Now, there is no flaw if they don't know there is one."

author: Auran and Karnak
quote: "I'm not gonna let you kill me again.""I'm here to help you.""Who said I need help?""You know my power. I see the flaw in everything. And exploit it. I see the flaw in you. And I want to help you overcome it. I saw you across the courtyard today. I've been watching you closely since Earth. You backed the wrong man and you know it. I know you feel regret for Gorgon's death. His sacrifice saved your life.""That wasn't his intention.""What if it was? He could always be counted on to do the right thing at the right time, and he trained you to be the same. But you are not there yet, are you? Neither am I.""The great Karnak admitting to weakness?""My time on Earth changed me. Maybe. A little.""I don't understand how I can help.""I'm gonna need a bit of your DNA."

author: Grandmaster
quote: "Time works real different around these parts. On any other world I would be millions of years old but here on Sakaar..."

author: Grandmaster
quote: "Wow! Look at all of you. What a show, WHAT-A-NIGHT! Who’s having fun? Please, I’m your host. Big round of applause for all of our undercard competitors... who died so gruesomely. Good sports. What a show! What a night! This is what you’ve come for and so have I. And now, without further ado... it’s main event time!! Making his first appearance, though he looks quite promising, got a couple of tricks up his sleeve. I’ll say no more, see what you think. Ladies and gentlemen...I give to you...Lord of Thunder! Watch out for his fingers. They make sparks. Okay, this is it. Let’s get ready to welcome this guy. Here he comes. He is a creature. What can we say about him? Well, he’s unique. There’s none like him.  I feel a special connection with him. He’s undefeated. HE’S THE REIGNING...HE’S THE DEFENDING... Ladies and gentlemen... I give you your astonishingly savage, incredible..."

author: Grandmaster
quote: "It’s bad news, bad news today. Sakaar, hear ye. Attention please. I have some bad news. My beloved, exalted Champion has turned up missing. Take to the streets. Celebrate my champion. It seems that that criminally seductive Lord of Thunder has stolen him away."

author: Grandmaster to Sakaar's citizens
quote: "I just, I gotta say. I'm proud of you all. This revolution has been a huge success. Yay us! Pat, pat on the back. Pat on the back. Come on. No? Me, too. 'Cause I've been a big part of it. Can't have a revolution without somebody to overthrow! So, ah, you're welcome. And, uh, it's a tie."

author: Sakaar Computer and Thor
quote: "Fear not, for you are found.  You are home, and there is no going back. No one leaves this place. But what is this place? The answer in Sakaar. Surrounded by cosmic gateways, Sakaar lives on the edge of the known and unknown. It is the collection point for all lost and unloved things. Like you. But here on Sakaar, you are significant. You are valuable. Here, you are loved.""What...the hell?""And no one loves you more than the Grandmaster. He is the original. The first lost, and the first found. The creator of Sakaar and the father of the Contest of Champions. Where once you were nothing, now you are something. You are the property of the Grandmaster. Congratulations! You will meet the Grandmaster in five seconds. Prepare yourself.  Prepare yourself. You are now meeting the Grandmaster."

author: Valkyrie
quote: "You know, go ahead. Stay here and get drunk and enslave people for that lunatic. Keep drinking. Keep hiding. "

author: Grandmaster, Valkyrie, Thor and Topaz
quote: "What have you brought me today? Tell me.""A contender.""What?""I want to go closer, I need to get a closer look at this! Can you take us closer? Thankyou. Pay this lady.""Just wait a dam minute! I'm not for sale!""Man, he's a fighter!""I'll take ten million.""Tell her she's dreaming.""Oh for heavens sake, transfer the Units."

author: Grandmaster and Topaz
quote: "I love when you come to visit, 142. You keep bringing me just the best stuff. Whenever we get to talk to Topaz about Scrapper-142, what do I always say? She is, and it starts with a B.""Trash.""No. Not trash. Were you waiting to just call her that? It doesn't start with a B."

author: Grandmaster and Thor
quote: "What happened to my manners? I haven’t properly introduced myself. Come on. Follow me. My name is Grandmaster. I preside over a little harlequinade called the Contest of Champions. People come from far and wide to unwillingly participate in it. And you, my friend, might just be part of the new cast. What do you say to that?""We’re not friends, and I don’t give a shit about your games! I’m going back to Asgard!""Ass-gard? One, two, three, four."

author: Grandmaster, Loki and Thor
quote: "Time works real different around these parts. On any other world I would be millions of years old but here on Sakaar...In any case, you know this, ah, this, ah, you call yourself the 'Lord of Thunder?'""God of Thunder, tell him.""I've never met this man in my life.""He's my brother!""Adopted.""Is he any kind of fighter?""Take this thing out of my neck and I'll show you!""Oh, listen to that, he's threatening me! Hey sparkles, here's the deal. You want to get back to ass-place, ass-berg.""Asgard!""Any contender who defeats my champion, their freedom they shall win.""Fine, then point me in the direction of whoever's ass I have to kick!"

author: Grandmaster, Loki, Topaz and Valkyrie
quote: "I’m upset! I’m very upset. You know what I like about being upset? Blame. Right now, that’s the mindset that I’m in. And you know who I’m blaming?""Grandmaster, I...""Hey! Don’t interrupt me!""Here you go.""Why are you handing me the Melt Stick? He was interrupting. That’s not a capital violation. My precious champion has come up missing and its all because of that Lord of Thunder. It’s all because of him. YOUR brother. Whatever the story is. Adopted, or complicated. I’m sure there’s a big history. And YOUR contender.""My dear friend, if you were to give me twelve hours I could bring them both back to you.""I can do it in two.""I could do it in one.""You know what? I woke up this morning thinking about a public execution. But for now, I’ll settle for this sweet little “who’s gonna get him first?” So you’re on the clock."

author: Grandmaster and Topaz
quote: "Revolution? How did this happen?""Don’t know. But the Arena’s mainframe for the Obedience Disks have been deactivated and the slaves have armed themselves.""Oh! I don’t like that word!""Mainframe?""No. Why would I not like “mainframe?” No, the “S” word.""Sorry, the “prisoners with jobs” have armed themselves.""Okay, that’s better."

author: Grant Ward about Skye
quote: "She's a groupie, all the hacking into S.H.I.E.L.D., tracking powers. She might as well be one of those sweaty Cosplay characters crowding around Stark Tower."

author: Grant Ward to Phil Coulson
quote: "This is definitely not protocol."

author: Grant Ward and S.H.I.E.L.D. agent
quote: "If the job was easy.""Yeah, it wouldn't be any fun."

author: Maria Hill and Grant Ward
quote: "What does S.H.I.E.L.D. stand for, agent Ward?""Strategic Homeland Enforcement and Logistics Division.""And what does that mean to you?""It means someone really wanted our initials to spell out "S.H.I.E.L.D."."

author: Grant Ward and Phil Coulson
quote: "I'm Clearance Level Six. I know that... Agent Coulson was killed in action before the Battle of New York. Got the full report.""Welcome to Level 7."

author: Grant Ward and Phil Coulson
quote: "Is that who I think it is?""She's just the pilot.""Melinda May is just the pilot?""

author: Skye and Grant Ward
quote: "Have you ever killed anyone?""Yes, a few. High-risk targets. But they were terrible people who were trying to murder nice people. And I didn't feel good afterwards."

author: Grant Ward and Melinda May
quote: "Forgot I was working with 'The Cavalry'.""Don't ever call me that."

author: Skye and Grant Ward
quote: "I don't ever want to do another pull-up again.""You ever find yourself hanging off the edge of a building twenty stories up, you're gonna want to do at least one."

author: Skye to Grant Ward
quote: "You're a robot, can you do that?"

author: Leo Fitz, Grant Ward and Jemma Simmons
quote: "We're gonna have this new 'Night-Night' pistol working in no time, okay?""Great. One thing. We're not calling it that.""Told you.""Yes, we-- Yes, we are."

author: Grant Ward and Phil Coulson
quote: "I know Director Fury felt he owed you after you sacrificed yourself.""And my card collection."

author: Grant Ward imitating himself the way Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons do
quote: "After all... I'm agent Grant Ward. I just jumped out of a plane without a parachute on and saved your life!"

author: Leo Fitz imitating Grant Ward
quote: "I'm agent Grant Ward. And I can shoot the legs off a flea from 500 yards... as long as it's not windy."

author: Jemma Simmons imitating Grant Ward
quote: "I'm agent Grant Ward. I could rupture your spleen with my left pinky... blindfolded."

author: Grant Ward and Leo Fitz
quote: "How long can you hold your breath underwater?""I-I don't know.""Are you familiar with the term 'Slam and Cram'?""No, and I do- I don't think I want to be.""How attatched are you to your pinky?""Very, very attached, and before you ask another terrifyingly vague question, let me be clear. Any plan that involves even one of those scenarios isn't going to work for me."

author: Leo Fitz and Grant Ward
quote: "Checking for alien spectrographic signatures one teeny rock at a time.""Necessary precaution. We don't want anything alien getting into the wrong hands.""Still, this is definitely the type of work a monkey could easily do.""You're our little monkey."

author: Skye and Grant Ward
quote: "The memory... Was it about your brother?""Drop it.""Ward, if you ever need me, I am here-""-To talk. Because that's what you do. You talk, and talk. Don't you ever get tired of hearing your own voice?!"

author: Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons, Grant Ward, and Skye
quote: "It's not funny. I was sleeping peacefully. Very clever, Simmons.""I-I didn't do it!""Oh, well Ward. I don't appreciate-""Don't look at me!""Ok, then Skye.""No!""Well who then? The bunks should be off limits! No, don't laugh! Because I know it was one of you!"

author: Grant Ward and Vanchat
quote: "Time to talk. The names of all your buyers, alphabetically would help.""I'm not telling you a bloody thing.""That's how you want to play it?"

author: Victoria Hand and Grant Ward
quote: "No single agent is that important.""Coulson is."

author: Grant Ward and Leo Fitz
quote: "Sounds like riding a bull for eight seconds.""Yeah. Exactly. It's that simple."

author: Melinda May to Phil Coulson
quote: "Agent Ward and I been having sex."

author: Grant Ward, Jemma Simmons, and Skye
quote: "It's strategic.""It's adorable.""The Tin Man has a heart after all."

author: Grant Ward
quote: "Holotable... On. Holotable... Activate"

author: Grant Ward and Melinda May
quote: "Really? You think Coulson will take that excuse if he finds out about us?""Took it ok when I told him.""Wait. You told him?""Yep."

author: John Garrett and Grant Ward
quote: "Besides, if the job was easy.""It wouldn't be any fun."

author: Grant Ward
quote: "They're great. And you lost the ounce!"

author: Victoria Hand to Grant Ward
quote: "What do you think Agent Ward? You shot the wrong Clairvoyant before; care to shoot the right one?"

author: Raina and Grant Ward
quote: "You're not her type.""I'm everyone's type."

author: Skye and Melinda May
quote: "You know, I never gave you enough credit for this whole zen-warrior thing. But I got to admit, it'd be nice to feel nothing right now.""You think I don't feel anything?""Look at you. You're a statue. And you and Ward had a thing. So if anyone should be furious...""I'm furious. But I'm sure as hell not gonna waste it on a tantrum. I'm gonna mine it, save it... and when we find Ward, I'm gonna use every bit of it to take him down.""Wish I knew how to use that hate-fu.""I'm up most mornings at five."

author: Grant Ward to Melinda May
quote: "And you said our thing was no-strings-attached. Looks to me like the ice queen got her feelings hurt."

author: Grant Ward and Melinda May
quote: "Aahh...This reminds me of the old days.""You were never on top!"

author: Grant Ward to Skye
quote: "Aren't you a sight for sore eyes."

author: Grant Ward to Skye
quote: "I told Coulson weeks ago that I was willing to speak to you to give you intelligence. Why now? Something bad happen?"

author: Grant Ward
quote: "I know what I am. But my brother... is worse."

author: Phil Coulson
quote: "Do not give him an inch."

author: Grant Ward and Bobbi Morse
quote: "It can't be that interesting.""Why do you say that?""Because you were on page 117 when you were waiting outside. And you're still on page 117. So either you're a really slow reader, or you're working for Coulson.""Who?""I am impressed. And you can tell him I said that. I almost missed you.""What are you talking about?""I'm sure they told you about this. If you try or say anything, everyone in this bus will be flying. So just keep reading your book, and hope for a happy ending."

author: Grant Ward, Skye, and Calvin Zabo
quote: "You're welcome. Now let's get out of here.""Yeah, me too! Come on!""It's safer here. And I'm about to do something to Whitehall. I don't want you to see me like that.""I don't mind... seeing. Hell, I'm happy to help.""No. I get to do this myself."

author: Lance Hunter, Grant Ward and Phil Coulson
quote: "Three men, heavily armed - bet there's more where they came from.""Does it matter? They got a cyborg on board with rockets in his arm.""He's not a cyborg - he's a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent... with rockets in his arm."

author: Grant Ward
quote: "Some people just don't deserve forgiveness."

author: Grant Ward, Leo Fitz, Melinda May, Phil Coulson, Jemma Simmons, and Daisy Johnson
quote: "Can we just address the elephant on the plane? I know. This is weird. Mistakes were made.""By you.""And people got hurt.""By you.""And I could stand here and explain again how my parents - and brother left me vulnerable...""We've all had our traumas, Ward. Didn't turn any of us into psychopaths.""Well, we all have our own ways of coping, don't we? For example, I was yours.""Watch it, Ward!""Look, I'm just saying we all made mistakes. Coulson handed me over to my abuser, thank you. Skye shot me.""After you killed how many people?""Yeah, and we were a team and a family, and you betrayed us!""I know. It's what I regret the most. Not the lying, the S.H.I.E.L.D. agents I had to put down, and I'm sorry not even dropping you two in the ocean. It's this. My actions destroyed this. I'll regret that forever. 'Cause there were good times. Right? Before? I mean, for a while there, we were a good team. Weren't we?""(after a dramatic pause) I'm still happy I shot you.""Yeah, me too.""Should've aimed for the face."

author: Grant Ward to Werner von Strucker
quote: "From now on, you want something, you earn it."

author: Grant Ward to Werner von Strucker about Wolfgang von Strucker after beating Kebo
quote: "You're Werner von Strucker. Your father was Baron Wolfgang von Strucker. One of HYDRA's greatest leaders. Powerful family name doesn't mean you deserve respect. You earn that. I wondered if you had it in you. Your old man would be proud. Come on. Brought tacos!"

author: Werner von Strucker and Gideon Malick
quote: "You don't know this guy Ward. He's scary.""I'm aware of Grant Ward. He was once an untested youth, too."

author: Gideon Malick and Grant Ward
quote: "Revenge only provides a temporary pleasure.""But a pleasure nonetheless.""You should think on a grander scale.""Oh, it'll be grand. I'm going to cut off the head of S.H.I.E.L.D., because without Phil Coulson, S.H.I.E.L.D. won't grow back."

author: Grant Ward and Gideon Malick's Men
quote: "So Malick wanted me slaughtered, which means I'm on the right track. See I know where the vault is, just don't know how to get in, which creates a once in a lifetime opportunity for anyone who has accompanied him there.""We're not helping you!""Well then... Whose on the bottom of the food-chain now?"

author: Grant Ward to Gideon Malick's Men
quote: "You've kept quiet, I admire that. These babies burn up to 2,600 degrees, I was a bit of a pyro when I was a kid, got me into some real trouble, but damn if I don't love the sound that gas igniting. You have to incorporate what you love into your work. You see the trick is you want them to know it's gonna hurt, build anticipation. But you have to let them imagine a better world. You could walk into Strucker's vault with me, you just have to show me how, we could walk in there together, share what we find."

author: Lance Hunter to Thomas Ward
quote: "Hate to break it to you, but your brother isn't a very nice guy."

author: Grant Ward
quote: "Hail HYDRA."

author: Grant Ward to Phil Coulson
quote: "You know, everyone had this place wrong. It isn't death. It's a new beginning. Malick was right. This is all meant to be. And the fact that you followed me here, that we're in this together, that just confirms the fact that I am part of a grand plan. I see that now."

author: Grant Ward to Phil Coulson
quote: "I'm not looking for mercy or absolution. I just want you to know, I've been where you are right now. Filled with rage, wanting revenge... I chose HYDRA for petty, personal, selfish reasons... for a father figure, for vengeance... for closure. But what I saw today gave my life meaning. For the first time ever, I have a sense of satisfaction that I never experienced when I was seeking revenge."

author: Grant Ward and Hive
quote: "How long you been here?""Feels like forever."

author: Hive and Gideon Malick
quote: "Grant Ward. I wish we could have met under different circumstances.""He was a good soldier, he dedicated his life to HYDRA.""Thank you, for arranging that. He was strong, resilient, a perfect host."

author: Hive and Daisy Johnson
quote: "He was fond of you, Grant Ward.""And I'm glad he's dead.""He is, too. In a way. Grant was a thirsty soul. And he suffered for it."

author: Phil Coulson and Daisy Johnson
quote: "You're not a criminal""That's exactly what I am. So you can keep your forgiveness in your pity because I shouldn't have either... Or your friendship.""Daisy... you were brainwashed.""So was Ward. We make the perfect pair."

author: Holden Radcliffe/Life-Model Decoy to Leo Fitz
quote: "We all have programming. It may be more obvious in my case, but what is a human if not a function of programming? You've been programmed by betrayal, abandonment. Ward, who you thought was your friend, Daisy who left you all, your father--"

author: Phil Coulson and Jemma Simmons
quote: "Ok, I gotta ask, what is it about that guy? Every time I see him I get this weird itch... like hives. Did we get along?""Well, you crushed his chest with your cybernetic arm and left him for dead on an alien planet. So, no."

author: Griot
quote: "Remote piloting system activated."

author: Griot
quote: "Glass integrity at 15%."

author: Griot
quote: "Critical weapons failure."

author: Griot
quote: "Sonic overload initiated."

author: Griot
quote: "System rebooting in 5...4...3...2...1. System rebooted."

author: Everett Ross and Griot
quote: "What the hell was that?""The lab is under attack.""What? Where?""Deactivating hologram."

author: Shuri, Everett Ross and Griot
quote: "Ross! You have to get out of there, now!""How long have I got?""Glass integrity is at 50%.""Put me back in."

author: Groot
quote: "I am Groot!"

author: Groot
quote: "We are Groot."

author: Garthan Saal and Rhomann Dey
quote: "What the hell?""They call it Groot. He's been travelling recently as 89P13's personal houseplant/muscle."

author: Star-Lord and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "What is wrong with giving tree, here?""Well, he don't know talking good like me and you, so his vocabulistics is limited to 'I' and 'am' and 'Groot.' Exclusively, in that order."

author: Star-Lord
quote: "I'm pretty sure the answer is "I am Groot.""

author: Groot and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "I am Groot.""Four of us? Asleep for the danger, awake for the money as for friggin' usual."

author: Groot, Rocket Raccoon, and Star-Lord
quote: "I am Groot.""So what, 'It's better than eleven percent!' What the hell does that have to do with anything?""Thank you, Groot, thank you. See. Groot's the only one of you who has a clue."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Groot.
quote: "No, Groot... don't do this, you'll die... why are you doing this?""WE are Groot."

author: Peter Quill, Drax, Rocket Raccoon, Gamora and Groot
quote: "I look around at us, you know what I see? Losers. I mean like, folks who have lost stuff. And we have, man, we have, all of us. Our homes, our families, normal lives. And usually life takes more than it gives, but not today. Today it's giving us something. It is giving us a chance.""To do what?""To give a shit, for once, not run away. I for one am not gonna stand by and watch as Ronan wipes out billions of lives.""But Quill, stopping Ronan, it's impossible. You're asking us to die.""Yeah, I guess I am. I-""Quill. I have lived most my life surrounded by my enemies, I will be grateful to die among my friends.""You are an honorable man, Quill. I will fight beside you. And in the end, see my wife and daughter again.""I am Groot.""What the hell, I ain't got that long of a life span anyway. Now I'm standing, you all happy? We're all standing up now. Bunch of jackasses standing in a circle."

author: Groot
quote: "I am Groot!"

author: Star-Lord to Groot
quote: "Groot, put your seat belt on!"

author: Drax the Destroyer
quote: "Out of the way, dumber smaller Groot!"

author: Groot and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "I am Groot.""They were not looking at you funny."

author: Yondu Udonta, Rocket Raccoon and  Groot
quote: "What? No!""He thinks you want him to wear it as a hat.""That's not what I said!""I am Groot.""He's relieved that you don't want him to.""I am Groot.""He hates hats.""I am Groot.""On anyone, not just himself.""I am Groot.""You see someone and think they have a weird head and then it just turns out part of their head is a hat. That's why you don't like hats?"

author: Rocket Raccoon and Groot
quote: "Alright, first you flick this switch, then this one, that activates it. Then you press this button, which will give you five minutes to get out of there. Now, whatever you do, don't push this button, because that will set off the bomb immediately and we will all then be dead. Now, repeat back what I just said.""I am Groot. I am Groot.""That's right.""I am  Groot.""NO! That's the button that will kill everyone. Try again."I am Groot. I am Groot. I am  Groot.""NO! That's exactly what you just said! How's that even possible? Which button is the button you're supposed to push? Point to it. NO!"

author: Peter Quill and Groot
quote: "Dude, seriously? You gotta clean up your room, it's a complete mess.""I am Groot.""I am not boring, you're boring. You know what's boring? Sitting there playing that mind numbing game. What's boring is me tripping over your vines everyday. I'm not boring.""I am Groot.""And now I know how Yondu felt."

author: Groot
quote: "I am Groot!"

author: Star-Lord, Groot and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "Groot, put that thing away, now. I don't want to tell you again. Groot?""I am Groot.""Whoa!""Language!""You got some acorns on you, kid.""Ever since you got a little sap, you’re a total D-hole. Keep it up and I’m going to smash that thing to pieces."

author: Thor, Groot and Captain America
quote: "By the way, this is a friend of mine, Tree.""I am Groot!""I am Steve Rogers."

author: Groot and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "I am Groot""No, no, no, no. Groot, no."

author: Rocket Raccoon to Thor
quote: "I lost the only family I ever had. Quill, Groot, Drax, the chick with the antenna... all gone. I get that you miss your mom. But she's gone. Really gone. And there are plenty of people who are only kinda gone. And you can help them."

author: Groot, Star-Lord, and Thor
quote: "I am Groot.""Not necessary.""There shall be no knifing one another. Everybody knows who's in charge.""Me, right?"

author: Erik Selvig
quote: "Let me contact one of my colleagues. He's had some dealings with these people before."

author: Hank Pym to Scott Lang
quote: "You don’t have many options right now. Quite frankly, neither do I. Why do you think I let you steal that suit in the first place?"

author: Hank Pym about Hope van Dyne
quote: "Before Hope lost her mother, she used to look at me like I was the greatest man in the world. And now she looks at me and it's just disappointment."

author: Hank Pym
quote: "This is your chance. To earn that look in your daughter's eyes. To become the hero that she already thinks you are. It's not about saving our world, it's about saving theirs. Scott, I need you to be the Ant-Man."

author: Hank Pym to Scott Lang
quote: "You've learned about the suit, but you've yet to learn about your greatest allies, the Ants. Loyal, brave, and your partners on this job."

author: Hope van Dyne and Scott Lang
quote: "You know when my mother died I didn't see him for two weeks?""He was in grief.""Yeah, so was I, and I was seven. And he never came back, not in any way that counted. He just sent me off to boarding school."

author: Hank Pym, Howard Stark, Peggy Carter and Mitchell Carson
quote: "Stark!""He doesn't seem happy. Hello, Hank. You're supposed to be in Moscow.""I took a detour... Through your defence lab.""Tell me that isn't what I think it is.""That depends if you think it's a poor attempt to replicate my work. Even for this group, that takes nerve.""You were instructed to go to Russia. May I remind you, Doctor Pym, that you're a soldier...""I'm a scientist.""Then act like one. The Pym Particle is the most revolutionary science ever developed. Help us put it to good work.""I let you turned me into your errand boy, and now you try to steal my research?""If only you'd protected Janet with such ferocity, Doctor Pym.""Ah...""Easy, Hank!""You mention my wife again, and I'll show you ferocity.""Don't look at me. You said it."

author: Mitchell Carson and Hank Pym
quote: "May I remind you, Dr. Pym, that you’re a soldier...""I’m a scientist."

author: Hank Pym and Howard Stark
quote: "I formally tender my resignation.""We don’t accept it. Formally. Hank, we need you. The Pym Particle is a miracle. Please, don’t let your past determine the future.""As long as I am alive, nobody will ever get that formula."

author: Hank Pym and Darren Cross
quote: "Darren, there’s a reason that I buried these secrets.""So you finally admit it. We could’ve done this together, Hank. But you ruined that. That's why you're the past and I'm the future."

author: Hank Pym and Scott Lang
quote: "I took on a young protégé called Darren Cross.""Darren Cross. He’s a big deal.""But before he was a big deal he was my assistant."

author: Scott Lang and Hank Pym
quote: "You know, I think this regulator is holding me back.""Do not screw with the regulator. If that regulator is compromised, you would go subatomic.""What does that mean?""It means that you would enter a Quantum Realm.""What does that mean?""It means that you would enter a reality where all concepts of time and space become irrelevant as you shrink for all eternity. Everything that you know and love, gone forever.""Cool. Yeah, if it ain't broke..."

author: Hank Pym about Janet van Dyne
quote: "I knew I had to shrink between the molecules to disarm the missile, but my regulator had sustained too much damage. Your mother, she didn’t hesitate."

author: Scott Lang and Tony Stark
quote: "Hank Pym always said, you never can trust a Stark""Who are you?""...Come on, man."

author: Hank Pym to Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne
quote: "Our only chance is both of you."

author: Luis
quote: "Doctor Pym, I actually heard what happened to you. You opened up the Quantum Realm. And this crazy creepy ghost who walks through walls and stuff stole your tech!"

author: Hank Pym and Hope van Dyne
quote: "Gone forever. Telling you that she wasn't coming home, was the hardest thing that I ever had to do. But then Scott showed up...or should I say, broke into our house. And when he went to the Quantum Realm... he came back, everything changed. I started to wonder...could your mother still be alive? So I dusted off some old plans.""Dad, what are you saying?""I think it's possible to bring her back."

author: Scott Lang and Hank Pym
quote: "Hold on, you gave her wings?!""And blasters.""So I take it you didn’t have that tech available for me.""No, I did."

author: Hank Pym, Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne
quote: "Hiya, champ, how was school today?""Aw, ha ha ha! Alright, get your jokes out now, can you fix the suit?""So cranky.""You want a juice box and some string cheese?""Do you really have that?"

author: Hank Pym and Scott Lang
quote: "Just tell me you weren't lying about the suit you took. Tell me you really destroyed it.""I did. I destroyed it. I swear.""I can't believe you destroyed my suit! That was my life's work."

author: Wasp, Hank Pym and Scott Lang
quote: "Oh, my God. You didn't destroy the suit?""What?""Well, it was your life's work, Hank. I couldn't destroy that. Before I turned myself in, I shrunk it down and mailed it to Luis.""You sent my suit through the mail?""Hey, the postal service is very reliable, you know? They do tracking numbers now. Like UPS."

author: Steve Rogers and Hank Pym
quote: "Hello. Dr. Pym?""That would be the number that you called. Yes.""This is Capt. Stevens from shipping. We have a package for you.""Bring it up.""Well, that's the thing, sir. We can't.""I'm confused. I thought that was your job.""Well, it's just... Sir, the box is glowing and, to be honest, some of our mail guys aren't feeling that great.""They didn't open it, did they?""Yeah, they did. You better get down here."

author: Peggy Carter and Hank Pym
quote: "Sometimes you won't know what you're working with until you're in the moment... So you have to improvise.""Okay... This I was not expecting."

author: Pepper Potts and Tony Stark
quote: "Call for a press conference? What on earth for?""Yeah, Hogan, drive. Cheeseburger first."

author: Tony Stark and Happy Hogan
quote: "I thought I lost you back there!""You did, sir."

author: Tony Stark, Happy Hogan and U.S. Marshal
quote: "Show me the badge.""He likes the badge.""Still like it?""Yeah."

author: Happy Hogan, Tony Stark and Pepper Potts
quote: "Anything else, boss?""I'm good, Hap.""No, I'll be just... another minute.""I lost both the kids in the divorce."

author: Happy Hogan and Tony Stark
quote: "What the hell was that?!""It's called mixed martial arts, it's been around for three weeks.""It's called dirty boxing, there's nothing new about it."

author: Happy Hogan and Tony Stark
quote: "Are you okay?""Yeah. Were you headed for me or him?""I was trying to scare him!""Because I can't tell!"

author: Black Widow and Happy Hogan
quote: "I said stay in the car!""What are you wearing? Look, I'm not letting you go in alone."

author: Tony Stark, Happy Hogan and Maya Hansen
quote: "I gave a speech? How was it?""Pitiful.""Unintelligible.""Really? It's my favorite kind, a winning combo."

author: Happy Hogan, Maya Hansen and Tony Stark
quote: "I'm coming! I got you!""It's okay, it was the plant! It's a glitch in my work.""Please, stop riding me!"

author: Happy Hogan and Tony Stark
quote: "Hello?""Is this forehead of Security?""What? You know, look, You know, look... I got a real job. What do you want? I'm working. I've got something going on, here.""What, harassing interns?""Let me tell you something. Do you know what happened when I told everyone I was Iron Man's bodyguard? They would laugh in my face. I had to leave while I still had a shred of dignity. Now I got a real job. I'm watching Pepper.""What’s going on? Fill me in.""For real? All right, so she’s meeting up with this scientist. Rich guy, handsome. I couldn’t make his face at first, right? You know I'm good with faces.""Oh, Yeah, yeah. You're the best.""Yeah. Well, so I run his credentials, I make him Aldrich Killian. We actually met the guy back in... where were we in '99? The science conference?""Um...Switzerland.""Right, right, exactly.""Killian? No, I don't remember that guy.""Of course you don't. He's not a blond with a big rack. At first it was fine, they were talking business, but now it's like getting weird. He's showing her a big brain.""His what?""Big brain, and she likes it. Here, let me show you. Hold on. See?""Look at what? You watching them? Flip the screen and then we can get started.""I'm not a tech genius like you. Just...just trust me, get down here.""Flip the screen, then I can see what they're doing.""I can't! I don't know how to flip the screen! Don't talk to me like that anymore. You're not my boss. Alright, I don't work for you. Now I don't trust this guy. He's got another guy with him, he's shifty.""Relax.""Seriously?""I'm just asking you to secure the perimeter. Tell him to go out for a drink or something?""You know what? You should take more of an interest in what's going on here. This woman... this woman's the best thing that ever happened to you, and you...you're just ignoring her.""A giant brain?""Yeah, there's a giant brain, there's a shifty character. I'm gonna follow this guy. I'm gonna run his plates and if it gets rough, so be it.""I miss you, Happy.""Yeah, I miss you too. But the way it used to be. Now you're off with the 'Superfriends', I don't know what's going on with you anymore. The world's getting weird...""Hey, I...I'd hate to cut you off. Do you have your taser on you?""Why?""I think there's a gal in HR who's trying to steal some printer ink, you should probably go over there and zap her.""Yeah, nice."

author: Eric Savin and Happy Hogan
quote: "What are you doin', buddy? You out by yourself? A little date night? Watching your favorite chick flick maybe?""Yeah, a little movie called "The Party's Over", starring you and your junkie girlfriend, and here's the ticket."

author: Happy Hogan
quote: "We just gotta load up Tony's old Hulkbuster armor, a prototype for Cap's new shield and the Meg..me..megin... Thor's magic belt."

author: Happy Hogan to Peter Parker
quote: "You don't see that every day."

author: Happy Hogan to Ned Leeds
quote: "Aww, you gotta be shitting me."

author: Tony Stark and Happy Hogan
quote: "See, Happy is... is hoping to get bumped up to asset management. He was "forehead of security", and before that he was just a driver.""That was a private conversation. I don't like joking about this. It was hard for me to talk to you about it."

author: Happy Hogan and Spider-Man
quote: "Okay. Good. Yes. Yes, No. No, put that down. That's worth more than you or me. Yeah?""Happy! The craziest thing just happened. These guys were robbing an ATM...with high-tech weapons...""Take a breath. I don't have time for ATM robberies.""Yeah, but...""Or the notes you leave. I have moving day to worry about. Everything's gotta be out next week.""Wait. You're moving? Who's moving?""Yeah, don't you watch the news? Tony sold Avengers Tower. We're relocating to a new facility upstate where hopefully cell service is worse.""But what about me?""What about you?""Well, what if Mr. Stark needs me or something big goes down? Can I please talk to Mr. Stark?""Stay away from anything dangerous. I'm responsible for making sure you're responsible, okay?""I am responsible. I...Oh, crap. My backpack's gone.""""That doesn't sound responsible.""I'll call you back.""Feel free not to."

author: Tony Stark and Happy Hogan
quote: "So after the press conference, Happy will show you to your room, your new quarters, see that he is next to Vision.""Yeah, Vision's not big on doors.""It's so much fun.""Or walls.""You'll fit right in."

author: Happy Hogan to Morgan Stark
quote: "I'll get you all the cheeseburgers you want."

author: Happy Hogan and Peter Parker
quote: "Heads up. Nick Fury's calling you.""I don't really wanna talk to Nick Fury.""Answer the phone.""Why?""Because if you don't talk to him, I have to talk to him. I don't want to talk to him.""You sent Nick Fury to voicemail?""I gotta go.""You do not ghost Nick Fury!"

author: Hawkeye to Phil Coulson
quote: "Better call it, Coulson. I'm starting to root for this guy."

author: Phil Coulson and Hawkeye
quote: "Barton, talk to me.""You want me to slow him down sir? Or are you sending in more guys for him to beat up?"

author: Clint Barton
quote: "I see better from a distance."

author: Clint Barton to Natasha Romanoff
quote: "Have you ever had someone pick your brain and play? Pull you out, stuff something else in. Do you know what it's like to be unmade?"

author: Clint Barton
quote: "I need a distraction. And an eyeball."

author: Clint Barton
quote: "Well, if I put an arrow in Loki's eye socket, I'd sleep better I suppose."

author: Clint Barton to Natasha Romanoff
quote: "You're a spy, not a soldier. Now you want to wade into a war? Why? What did Loki do to you?"

author: Black Widow and Loki
quote: "I wanna know what you've done to Agent Barton.""I'd say I've expanded his mind.""And once you've won. Once you're king of the mountain. What happens to his mind?""Is this love, Agent Romanoff?""Love is for children. I owe him a debt.""Tell me.""Before I worked for S.H.I.E.L.D., I made a name for myself. I have a very specific skillset. I didn't care who I used it for, or on. I got on S.H.I.E.L.D.'s radar in a bad way. Agent Barton was sent to kill me, he made a different call."

author: Loki to Black Widow
quote: "I won't barter Barton! Not until I make him kill you. Slowly, intimately, in every way he knows you fear. And then he'll wake just long enough to see his good work, and when he screams I'll split his skull. This is my bargain, you mewling quin!"

author: Natasha Romanoff and Loki
quote: "I've got red in my ledger, I'd like to wipe it out.""

author: Nick Fury and Black Widow
quote: "It's Barton. He took out our system. He's headed for the detention lab. Does anybody copy?""This is Agent Romanoff. I copy."

author: Clint Barton and Nick Fury
quote: "If there was any tampering sir it wasn't at this end.""At this end?""Yeah, the cube is a doorway to the other end of space right? Doors open from both sides."

author: Loki and Hawkeye
quote: "What did it show you, Agent Barton?""My next target.""Tell me what you need.""I need a distraction. And an eyeball."

author: Captain America and Hawkeye
quote: "You think you can hold them off?""Captain, it would be my genuine pleasure."

author: Captain America, Thor, Iron Man, Black Widow and Hawkeye
quote: "What's the story upstairs?""The powers surrounding the cube is impenetrable.""Thor's right, we gotta deal with these guys.""How do we do this?""As a team.""I have unfinished business with Loki.""Yeah? Get in line."

author: Iron Man, Captain America and Hawkeye
quote: "Call it, Captain!""Alright, listen up. Until we can close that portal, our priority's containment. Barton, I want you on that roof, eyes on everything. Call out patterns and strays. Stark, you got the perimeter. Anything gets more than three blocks out, you turn it back or you turn it to ash.""Want to give me a lift?""Right. Better clench up, Legolas.""Thor, you gotta try and bottleneck that portal. Slow 'em down. You got the lightning. Light the bastards up. You and me, we stay here on the ground, keep the fighting here. And Hulk? Smash!"

author: Hawkeye and Iron Man
quote: "Stark, you got a lot of strays sniffing your tail.""Just trying to keep them off the streets.""Well, they can't bank worth a damn, find a tight corner.""I will roger that."

author: Black Widow and Hawkeye
quote: "Just like Budapest all over again!"  "You and I remember Budapest very differently."

author: Hawkeye to the Avengers
quote: "I think we lost the element of surprise."

author: Clint Barton to the Avengers
quote: "Fury helped me set this up when I joined. He kept it off S.H.I.E.L.D.’s files; I’d like to keep it that way."

author: Hawkeye to Scarlet Witch
quote: "Okay, look. The city is flying, we’re fighting an army of robots and I have a bow and arrow. None of this makes sense. But I'm going back out there because it's my job. Okay? And I can't do my job and babysit. It doesn't matter what you did, or what you were. If you go out there, you fight, and you fight to kill. Stay in here, you're good. I'll send your brother to come find you. But if you step out that door, you are an Avenger."

author: Hawkeye
quote: "Nobody would know. Nobody. Yeah, The last I saw him, Ultron was sitting on him. Yeah, he’ll be missed, quick little bastard. I miss him already."

author: Hawkeye to Wanda Maximoff
quote: "I've done the whole mind control thing. Not a fan."

author: Hawkeye to Pietro Maximoff
quote: "What? You didn't see that coming?"

author: Clint Barton to Pietro Maximoff
quote: "Yeah, you better run."

author: Clint Barton
quote: "No, no. I’m fine. Oh, it’s been a long day."

author: Tony Stark
quote: "Maybe I should take a page out of Barton's book. Build Pepper a farm, hope nobody blows it up."

author: Tony Stark and Clint Barton
quote: "Oh, he's flatlining. Call it. Time?""No, no, no. I’m going to live forever. I'm gonna be made of plastic."

author: Clint Barton and Thor
quote: "Whosoever, be he worthy, shall haveth the power", whatever man! It's a trick!""It is more than that, my friend!"

author: Clint Barton and Maria Hill
quote: "He also said he killed somebody.""But there wasn’t anyone else in the building."

author: Laura Barton and Clint Barton
quote: "I see you with the Avengers, and, well...""You don't think they need me?""Actually, I think they do. They're gods, and they need someone to keep them down to Earth."

author: Hawkeye and Captain America
quote: "You're not a match for him, Cap.""Thanks, Barton."

author: Laura Barton and Clint Barton
quote: "I see you with the Avengers, and, well…""You don't think they need me?""Actually, I think they do. They're gods. And they need someone to keep them down to Earth."

author: Wanda Maximoff, Vision and Clint Barton
quote: "I looked in your head and saw annihilation.""Look again.""Yeah. Her seal of approval means jack to me."

author: Captain America, Vision, Hawkeye, Iron Man and Bruce Banner
quote: "Are you? On our side?""I don't think it's that simple.""Well it better get real simple real soon.""I am on the side of life. Ultron isn't, he will end it all.""What's he waiting for?""You.""Where?""Sokovia. He's got Nat there too."

author: Hawkeye and Scarlet Witch
quote: "What about the core?""I'll protect it. It’s my job."

author: Hawkeye and Scarlet Witch
quote: "Go, go, move!""How could I let this happen?""Hey, hey, you okay?""This is all our fault.""Hey, look at me. It's your fault, it's everyone's fault, who cares. Are you up for this? Are you? Look, I just need to know, cause the city is flying. Okay, look, the city is flying, we're fighting an army of robots, and I have a bow and arrow. None of this makes sense. But I'm going back out there because it's my job. Okay? And I can't do my job and babysit. It doesn't matter what you did, or what you were. If you go out there, you fight, and you fight to kill. Stay in here, you're good, I'll send your brother to come find you, but if you step out that door, you are an Avenger. Alright, good chat. Yeah, the city is flying."

author: Hawkeye and Black Widow
quote: "I know what I need to do. The dining room! If I knock out that east wall, it'll make a nice work space for Laura, huh? Put up some baffling, she can't hear the kids running around, what do you think?""You guys always eat in the kitchen anyway.""No one eats in a dining room."

author: Quicksilver and Hawkeye
quote: "Keep up, old man!""Nobody would know. Nobody.

author: Hawkeye
quote: "I knew I should have stretched."

author: Hawkeye
quote: "Just can't seem to miss."

author: Hawkeye to Captain America
quote: "As much as I hate to admit it, if we're gonna win this one, some of us might have to lose it."

author: Clint Barton to Tony Stark
quote: "The Futurist, Gentlemen! The Futurist is here! He sees all! He knows what's best for you whether you like it or not."

author: Clint Barton
quote: "You gotta watch your back with this guy. There's a chance he's gonna break it."

author: Steve Rogers and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "Clint?""Says he's retired."

author: Scarlet Witch and Hawkeye
quote: "Oh my god. What are you doing here?""Disappointing my kids. I'm supposed to go water skiing."

author: Vision and Hawkeye
quote: "Clint! You should not be here.""Really? I retired for, what, like 5 minutes? And it all goes to shit.""Please consider the consequences of your actions.""Okay, they're considered."

author: Scarlet Witch and Hawkeye
quote: "I've caused enough problems.""C'mon, you gotta help me, Wanda. You wanna mope, go to high school. You wanna make amends, then you get off your ass."

author: Vision and Hawkeye
quote: "Clint, you can't overpower me.""I know I can't. But she can."

author: Clint Barton and Steve Rogers
quote: "Cap.""You know I wouldn't have called if I had any other choice.""Hey man, you're doing me a favor. Besides... I owe her a debt."

author: Black Widow and Hawkeye
quote: "We're still friends, right?""Depends on how hard you hit me."

author: Iron Man and Hawkeye
quote: "Hey, Clint.""Hey, man.""Clearly retirement doesn't suit you. Got tired of shooting golf?""Well, I played 18, shot 18...Just can't seem to miss.""Well, first time for everything.""Made you look."

author: Hawkeye and Ant-Man
quote: "Buckled in?""Yeah, no, I'm good. I'm good, Arrow guy. Let's go. Let's go!"

author: Hawkeye and Black Panther
quote: "We haven't met yet, I'm Clint.""I don't care."

author: Clint Barton to Tony Stark
quote: "The Futurist, Gentlemen! The Futurist is here! He sees all! He knows what's best for you whether you like it or not.""Give me a break, Barton. I had no idea they'd put you here, come on.""Yeah, well, you knew they'd put us somewhere, Tony.""Yeah, but not some Supermax floating ocean pokey, you know. This place is for maniacs, it's a place for-""Criminals. Criminals, Tony. I think that's the word you're looking for. Right? It didn't use to mean me. Or Sam, or Wanda. But here we are.""Because you broke the law.""Yeah. La, la, la, la, la...""I didn't make you. You read it, you broke it. Alright. You all grown up, got a wife and kids. I don't understand, why didn't you think of them before you chose the wrong side?""You gotta watch your back with this guy. There's a chance he's gonna break it."

author: Bruce Banner and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "We need all hands on deck. Where's Clint?""After the whole Accords situation, he and Scott took a deal. It was tough on their families. They're on house arrest."

author: Clint Barton
quote: "Lila, let's go. Lila? Honey? Hey, Babe? Babe? Babe! Boys! Boys! Laura!"

author: Hawkeye to Black Widow
quote: "We've come a long way since Budapest."

author: Clint Barton
quote: "Under different circumstances, this would be totally awesome."

author: Clint Barton
quote: "Whatever it takes."

author: James Rhodes and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "The federales found a room full of bodies, looks like a bunch of cartel guys, never even got a chance to get their guns out.""It's probably a rival gang.""Except it isn't. It's definitely Barton. What he's done here, what he's been doing for the last few years... I mean the scene that he left... I gotta tell you there's part of me that doesn't even want to find him."

author: Stonekeeper to Clint Barton
quote: "Clint, son of Edith."

author: Akihiko and Clint Barton
quote: "Why are you doing this? We never did anything to you!""You survived... Half the planet didn't. They got Thanos. You get me..."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Hawkeye
quote: "You promise to bring that back in one piece right?""Yeah, yeah, yeah... Okay, I'll do my best."

author: Black Widow and Hawkeye
quote: "Whatever it takes.""Whatever it takes.""We don't get that stone, billions of people stay dead.""Then I guess we both know who it's gotta be.""I guess we do.""I'm starting to think we mean different people here, Natasha.""Last five years I've been trying to do everything to get to here, it's all it's been about, bringing everybody back.""Now don't you get all decent on me.""You think I want to do it? I'm trying to save your life, you idiot.""Yeah, well I don't want you to, how's that? Natasha, you know what I've done. You know what I've become.""I don't judge people on their worst mistakes.""Maybe you should.""You didn't.""You're a pain in my ass, you know that? Okay... You win. Tell my family I love them.""You tell them yourself.""Damn you.""Let me go.""No. Please, no.""It's okay.""Please. Nat!"

author: Clint Barton, Thor, Bruce Banner and Steve Rogers
quote: "Can't get her back.""What?""It can't be undone. It can't.""Look, I'm sorry, no offence, but you're a very earthly being, okay, and we're talking about space magic, and can't seems very definitive.""Yeah, look, I know that I'm way outside my pay grade here, but she's still isn't here, isn't she?""No. That's my point.""It can't be undone! Or that's at least what the red floating guy had to say! Maybe you wanna go talk to him! Okay, go grab your hammer, and you go fly and you talk to him! It was supposed to be me. Sacrificed her life for that goddamned stone, she bet her life on it!""She's not coming back. We have to make it worth it. We have to.""We will."

author: Victoria Hand and Phil Coulson
quote: "Barton, Romanoff, they never have an extraction plan.""They know that going in!"

author: Bobbi Morse
quote: "Marcus Scarlotti was behind the attack. An assassin-- almost killed Barton a few years back."

author: Hawkeye
quote: "You really sure you can count on this bunch in a tight spot?"

author: Heimdall
quote: "Be warned, I will honor my sworn oath to protect this realm as its gatekeeper. If your return threatens the safety of Asgard, Bifrost will remain closed and you will be left to die on the cold waste of Jotunheim."

author: Heimdall, Volstagg and Thor
quote: "Be warned, I shall uphold my sacred oath to protect this realm as its gatekeeper. If your return threatens the safety of Asgard, my gate will remain shut and you will be left to perish on the cold waste of Jotunheim.""Couldn't you just keep the bridge open for us?""Keeping the bridge open would unleash the full power of the Bifrost and destroy Jotunheim, with you on it.""I have no plans to die today.""None do."

author: Thor and Heimdall
quote: "So Earth is lost to us...""No. There is always hope.""Can you see her?""Yes.""How is she?""She searches for you."

author: Loki and Heimdall
quote: "What troubles you, gatekeeper?""I turned my gaze upon you in Jotunheim but could neither see you nor hear you. You were shrouded from me like the Frost Giants that had entered this realm.""Perhaps your senses have weakened after your many years of service.""Or perhaps someone has found a way to hide that which he does not wish me to see.""You have great power, Heimdall. Did Odin fear you?""No.""And why is that?""Because he is my king, and I am sworn to obey him.""He was your king. And you're sworn to obey me now. Yes?""Yes.""Then you'll open the Bifrost to no-one! Until I have repaired the damage that my brother has done!"

author: Heimdall and Loki
quote: "Tell me, Loki, how did you lead the Jotuns into Asgard?""Do you think the Bifrost is the only way in and out of this realm? There are passages between worlds to which even you, with all your gifts, are blind. But I have need of them no longer, now that I am king. And I say, for your act of treason, you are relieved of your duties as gatekeeper and no longer citizen of Asgard!""Then I need no longer obey you!"

author: Heimdall and Sif
quote: "You would defy the commands of Loki, our king? Break every oath you have taken as warriors, and commit treason to bring Thor back?""Yes.""Good."

author: Thor and Heimdall
quote: "Heimdall, may we pass?""Never has an enemy escaped my watch until this day. I want to know how it happened.""And tell no one where we have gone until we return."

author: Heimdall to Thor
quote: "The universe hasn’t seen this marvel since before my watch began. Few can sense, even fewer can see it. A world that’s infected can be dangerous. It is truly beautiful."

author: Heimdall and Thor
quote: "We need to find a way out of Asgard, to the Dark World. There are paths between the realms known only to a few...""Known only to ONE, actually."

author: Thor and Heimdall
quote: "You’re not in Odin’s war council?""The Bifrost is closed by your father’s orders. No one is to come or to go. We face an enemy that is invisible even to me. Of what use is a guardian such as that?"

author: Odin and Heimdall
quote: "You called me here on an urgent matter. What is it?""Treason, my lord.""Whose?""Mine."

author: Heimdall to Thor in  his hallucination
quote: "The son of Odin, you must wake up! You must save us!"

author: Heimdall to Thor in  his hallucination
quote: "Is it him? Is that the first son of Odin?"

author: Heimdall to Thor in  his hallucination
quote: "We are all dead. Can you not see?"

author: Heimdall to Thor in  his hallucination
quote: "You're a destroyer Odinson. See where your power leeds."

author: Thor and Heimdall and in his hallucination
quote: "Heimdall, your eyes...""They see everything. They see you leading us to Hel."

author: Heimdall
quote: "Excuse me. Sorry about that. These bloody things are everywhere. Come on."

author: Heimdall
quote: "You’ll be safe here."

author: Heimdall to the Asgardians
quote: "Asgard. She’s here."

author: Heimdall to the Asgardians
quote: "We must keep moving! Go to the Bifrost!"

author: Heimdall to the Asgardians
quote: "Go back!"

author: Heimdall to the Asgardians
quote: "We must cross now! To the Bifrost!"

author: Thor
quote: "Heimdall. I know it’s been a while, but I could use a fast exit!...Heimdall?"

author: Skurge
quote: "Heimdall was an idiot. This job should have made him rich."

author: Thor
quote: "Heimdall, come on. I'm running short on options!"

author: Thor and Skurge
quote: "Where’s Heimdall?""That traitor. No one knows, he’s a fugitive of the throne.""Traitor?""Yeah, you see, Odin charged Heimdall with negligence of duty, but he disappeared before the trial. Hard to catch a guy who can see everything in the Universe."

author: Thor and Bruce Banner
quote: "The people trapped down there are all that matters. While I'm dealing with Hela, I need you two to help get everyone off Asgard.""How the hell are we supposed to do that?""I have a man on the ground."

author: Thor and Heimdall
quote: "Heimdall, I know you can see me. I need you to help me. Help me see.""I see you. But you are far away.""What’s going on here?""Come see for yourself. I’m providing refuge in a stronghold build by our ancestors. But if the garrison falls our only escape will be the Bifrost.""You’re talking about evacuating Asgard?""We won’t last long if we stay. She draws her power from Asgard and grows stronger everyday. Come on. Hela is ravenous. If I let her leave, she’ll consume the Nine Realms and all the cosmos. We need you.""I’m working on it, but I don’t even really know where the hell I am.""You’re on a planet surrounded by doorways. Go through one.""Which one?""The big one!"

author: Heimdall and Loki
quote: "Welcome home. I saw you coming.""Of course you did."

author: Heimdall and Thor
quote: "What have I done?""You saved us from extinction. Asgard is not a place, it’s a people."

author: Heimdall and Thor
quote: "So, King of Asgard. Where to?""I’m not sure. Any suggestions?"

author: Heimdall
quote: "Allfathers. Let the dark magic flow through me one last time."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Thor
quote: "So dead brother, huh? Yeah. That can be annoying""Well, he's been dead before. But this time, I think it really might be true.""And you said your sister and your dad...?""Both dead.""Still got a mom, though?""Killed by a dark elf.""Best friend?""Stabbed through the heart."

author: Heimdall
quote: "The Marauders amass near Vanaheim. Thor's destruction of the Bifrost continues to shift the balance of power across the Nine Realms... and into the worlds beyond Yggdrasil."

author: Hela to Thor
quote: "I'm not a queen or a monster. I'm the Goddess of Death."

author: Hela
quote: "Asgard is dead and it will be reborn in my image."

author: Hela to Thor
quote: "You're in my seat."

author: Hela to Skurge
quote: "You look like a smart boy. How would you like a job?"

author: Hela
quote: "Does no one remember me? Has no one been taught our history? Look at these lies. Goblets and garden parties? Peace treaties? Odin... Proud to have it, ashamed of how he got it. We were unstoppable. I was his weapon in the conquest that built Asgard's empire. One by one, the realms became ours. But then, simply because my ambition outgrew his, he banished me, caged me, locked me away like an animal. Before that, Asgard's warriors were honored, their bodies buried as heroes beneath this very palace."

author: Hela
quote: "Fake! Most of the stuff in here is fake. Weak! Smaller than I thought it would be. That's not bad. But this! The Eternal Flame..."

author: Hela to Skurge
quote: "Skurge, do you know the purpose of an executioner? An executioner doesn't just execute people, but he executes his leader's vision. But he mainly executes them too. I was Odin's executioner. Now, you shall be mine."

author: Hela to Thor
quote: "What were you the God of again?"

author: Hela to Skurge
quote: "Skurge, where’s the sword? That sword is the key to opening the Bifrost. These people you mentioned, the ones who aren’t falling into line. Round them up."

author: Thor
quote: "I need to stop her here and now to prevent Ragnarök – the end of everything."

author: Bruce Banner to Thor
quote: "I don’t want to fight your sister. That’s a family issue."

author: Hela, Loki and Thor
quote: "Kneel.""Beg your pardon?""You must be Hela. I'm Thor, son of Odin..""Really? You don't look like him.""Perhaps we can come to an arrangement?""You sound like him. Kneel...before your queen.""I don't think so. It's not possible.."Darling, you have no idea what's possible..."

author: Hela and Hogun
quote: "It's come to my attention that you don't know who I am. I am Hela. Odin's firstborn. Commander of the legions of Asgard. The rightful heir to the throne and the Goddess of Death. My father is dead. As are the princes. You're welcome. We were once the seat of absolute power in the cosmos. Our supremacy was unchallenged. Yet Odin stopped at Nine Realms. Our destiny is to rule over all others. And I am here to restore that power. Kneel before me and rise into the ranks of my great conquest.""Whoever you were, whatever you've done, surrender now or we will show you no mercy.""Whoever I am? Did you not listen to a word I said?"

author: Hela and Hogun
quote: "Oh, I've missed this! Still, it's a shame. Good soldiers dying for nothing all because they couldn't see the future. Oh, look. Still alive. Change of heart?""Go back to whatever chamber you crept out of, you evil demoness!"

author: Hela and Skurge
quote: "What is that noise?""The common folk aren’t exactly falling in line. There’s a resistance trying to knock down the front gates."

author: Hela and Thor
quote: "You're still alive.""I love what you've done with the place. Redecorated and everything.""It would seem our father's solution to every problem was to cover it up.""Or cast it out. I would love for someone else to rule but it can't be you. You're just... the worst.""Okay. Get up. You're in my seat."

author: Thor to Gamora
quote: "Families can be tough. Before my father died, he told me I had a half-sister that he imprisoned in Hel. Then she returned home and stabbed me in the eye, so I had to kill her. I feel your pain."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Thor
quote: "And you said that your sister and your dad...""Both dead."

author: Helen Cho to Tony Stark
quote: "I don't understand. You built this program. Why is it trying to kill us?"

author: Helen Cho and Bruce Banner
quote: "The nano-molecular functionality is instantaneous. His cells don’t know they’re bonding with a simulacrum.""She is creating tissue."

author: Tony Stark and Helen Cho
quote: "I expect to see you at the party on Saturday.""Unlike you, I don’t have a lot of time for parties. Will Thor be there?"

author: Helen Cho and Ultron
quote: "The Vibranium atoms aren’t just compatible with the tissue cells, they’re binding them. And S.H.I.E.L.D. never even thought-""The most versatile substance on the planet and they used it to make a frisbee. Typical of humans."

author: Helen Cho and Ultron
quote: "The Regeneration Cradle prints tissue; it can’t build a living body.""It can, you can. You lacked the materials. You’re a brilliant woman, Helen."

author: Ultron and Helen Cho
quote: "Scream, and your entire staff dies. I could have killed you, Helen, the night we met, I didn't.""Do you expect a thank you note?""I expect you to know why.""The Cradle.""This is the next me.""The Regeneration Cradle prints tissue. It can't build a living body.""It can. You can. You lack the material. You're a brilliant woman, Helen. But we all have room to improve."

author: Helen Cho and Tony Stark
quote: "This is the next thing, Tony. Your clunky metal suits are gonna be left in the dust.""That is exactly the plan."

author: Helmut Zemo posing as a civilian who crashed into Vasily Karpov's car
quote: "Hello? Is this your car out front? I jumped the curb. Maybe we could take care of it ourselves. But, if you wanna call the cops, then that's okay, I guess."

author: Helmut Zemo to Vasily Karpov
quote: "HYDRA deserves its place on the ash heap, so your death would not bother me. But I have to use this book and other bloodier methods to get what I need. I'm not looking forward to that. You'd only be dying for your pride."

author: Helmut Zemo
quote: "Mission Report: December 16, 1991."

author: Helmut Zemo to T'Challa
quote: "I knew I could not kill them. More powerful men than me have tried. But, if I could get them to kill each other..."

author: Helmut Zemo
quote: "An empire toppled by its enemies can rise again. But one that crumbles from within, that's dead. Forever."

author: F.R.I.D.A.Y. to Tony Stark
quote: "The Task Force called for a psychiatrist as soon as Barnes was captured. The UN dispatched Dr. Theo Broussard from Geneva within the hour. He was met by this man."

author: T'Challa to Helmut Zemo
quote: "Vengeance has consumed you."

author: Helmut Zemo and Vasily Karpov
quote: "You've kept your looks, colonel. Congratulations. Mission report, December 16th, 1991.""Who are you?" "My name is Zemo. I will repeat my question. Mission report, December 16th, 1991?""How did you find me?""When S.H.I.E.L.D. fell, Black Widow released HYDRA files to the public. Most of it was encrypted. Not easy to decipher. But I have patience and experience. A man can do anything if he has those.""What do you want?""Mission report! December 16th! 1991!""Go to hell!"

author: Helmut Zemo and Bucky Barnes
quote: "Hello, Mr. Barnes. I've been sent by the United Nations to evaluate you. Do you mind if I sit? I'm not here to judge you, I just want to ask you a few questions. Do you know where you are, James? I can't help you if you don't talk to me, James.""My name is Bucky."

author: Helmut Zemo and Winter Soldier
quote: "Longing, Rusted, Seventeen, Daybreak, Furnace, Nine, Benign, Homecoming, One, Freight Car. Soldier?"Ready to comply."

author: Steve Rogers and Helmut Zemo
quote: "Who are you? What do you want?""To see an empire fall."

author: Captain America and Helmut Zemo
quote: "You're Sokovian, is that what this is about?""Sokovia was a failed state long before you blew it to hell. No. I'm here because I made a promise.""You've lost someone.""I've lost everyone. And so will you, captain.""

author: T'Challa to Helmut Zemo
quote: "Justice will come soon enough.""Tell that to the dead.""The living are not done with you yet."

author: Everett Ross and Helmut Zemo
quote: "So how does it feel? To spend all that time, all that effort, and to see it fail so spectacularly?""Did it?"

author: Will Daniels
quote: "It has this way of getting inside your head and just making you crazy. Austin threw himself off a cliff. Brubaker set himself on fire. Taylor took an axe to the gear and then he came after me."

author: Will Daniels and Jemma Simmons
quote: "That THING has been killing everyone that's come through here for centuries.""How long have people known about the Monolith? And why keep sending people when there's no way back? It's as if they're being sacrificed!"

author: Jemma Simmons
quote: "You were right, Will. I saw It, whatever it is. Something was out there."

author: Jemma Simmons and Will Daniels
quote: "That's more like 100 meters. Unless there was some significant earthquake...""It doesn't want us to leave."

author: Gideon Malick
quote: "Thousands of years ago, an Inhuman was born on this planet that was destined to rule it, so powerful, so fearsome that others were consumed with dread, and so they banished it from the Earth, sent it through the portal to a distant planet. HYDRA was founded with the sole purpose of engineering its return."

author: Grant Ward and Hive
quote: "How long you been here?""Feels like forever."

author: Hive and Leo Fitz
quote: "They had a chance to become something great, something beautiful, but in the end...""How do you know so much about it?""Because I was there."

author: Leo Fitz and Hive
quote: "You're not Will.""No. Will died saving Jemma ... from me."

author: Hive
quote: "I'm hungry."

author: Hive
quote: "You'll believe... Once I make a believer out of him."

author: Hive and Giyera
quote: "They have advanced, but they haven't changed.""They?""Humans. But you're not human anymore, are you? You don't believe I am what they say. Once I'm strong enough... You will."

author: Giyera and Hive
quote: "These are the healthiest we could find. Lucio has frozen them in place for you. I hope they're acceptable.""Yes. Well done.""One will be your host?""I have a better use for them."

author: Lucio and Hive
quote: "What are you?""What are we?"

author: Hive to Gideon Malick
quote: "I know you've had people killed. You've even considered shooting someone. But to drain a man's life with your own hand, to feel the life go out inside him...as Mr. Coulson did with me. That look in his eyes. A feeling so powerful, it scared him...enough to leave that hand behind."

author: Gideon Malick and Phil Coulson
quote: "This god has outlived...""I've met gods. Gods bleed."

author: Hive and Daisy Johnson
quote: "He was fond of you, Grant Ward.""And I'm glad he's dead.""He is, too. In a way. Grant was a thirsty soul. And he suffered for it."

author: Hive
quote: "The world fears our kind of power because not everyone has it. Only billionaires can build iron suits. Only the military can make super soldiers, which can only lead to a war of its own, whereas I plan to apply a more, uh, collectivist philosophy."

author: Hive and Kree Reaper
quote: "You made something great. Something divine. And now you want to destroy it.""You're a failed experiment.""Sometimes the world's greatest miracles happen by accident."

author: Hive to Daisy Johnson
quote: "Their emancipation will be my gift to you."

author: Ward's memories briefly induce Hive
quote: "I'm not a good man, Skye."

author: Hive to Lincoln Campbell
quote: "I only wanted to feel a connection, and you must feel that already to sacrifice for them."

author: Lincoln Campbell and Hive
quote: "There's no turning this thing back around.""I can see that. I think we're already going to share a connection, as we experience the one thing that's eluded me all these years. Death."

movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
author: Daisy Johnson and Jemma Simmons
quote: "James. I haven't seen him since Hive.""Right. Well, withdrawal from Hive's sway hit him even harder than you."

movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
author: Hellfire
quote: "I didn't ask for this. Hive? And bloody misery. If I could take it all back, I would."

author: Phil Coulson
quote: "Ok, I gotta ask, what is it about that guy? Every time I see him I get this weird itch... like hives. Did we get along?"

author: Tony Stark to Raza
quote: "I need him. Good assistant."

author: Tony Stark and Ho Yinsen
quote: "The hell did you do to me?""What I did? What I did was to save your life. I removed all the shrapnel I could; there's a lot left and it's headed into your atrial septum. Here wanna see? Souvenir. Take a look. I've seen many wounds like that in my village. We call them the 'walking dead', because it takes about a week for the barbs to reach the vital organs.""What is this?""That is an electromagnet hooked up to a car battery, and it's keeping the shrapnel from entering your heart."

author: Ho Yinsen and Tony Stark
quote: "We met once, you know, at a technical conference in Bern.""I don't remember.""No you wouldn't. If I had been that drunk, I wouldn't have been able to stand, much less give a lecture on integrated circuits."

author: Tony Stark and Ho Yinsen
quote: "You still haven't told me where you're from.""I'm from a small town called Gulmira. It's actually a nice place.""Got a family?""Yes, and I will see them when I leave here. And you Stark?""No.""No. So, you're a man who has everything, and nothing."

author: Ho Yinsen and Tony Stark
quote: "We need more time. Hey, I'm gonna go by you some time.""Stick to the plan. Stick to the plan!"

author: Tony Stark and Ho Yinsen
quote: "Come on. We gotta go. Move with me. We got a plan. We need to stick to it.""This was always the plan, Stark.""Come on. You're gonna go see your family. Get up.""My family's dead. I'm going to see them now, Stark. It's okay. It's okay. I want this. I want this.""Thank you for saving me.""Don't waste it. Don't waste your life."

author: Ho Yinsen, Tony Stark and Wu
quote: "Mr. Stark! Ho Yinsen.""Oh, I finally met a man called Ho.""I would like to introduce you to our guest, Dr. Wu.""Oh this guy.""Mr. Stark.""Hey!""你好"[1]"You're a heart doctor. She's gonna need a cardiologist after I...""Perhaps another time?"

author: Hogun
quote: "We should not be here."

author: Thor and Hogun
quote: "Hogun, who led you into the glorious of battles?""You did."

author: Hogun and Fandral
quote: "Laufey said there were traitors in the house of Odin. A master of magic could bring three Jotuns into Asgard.""Loki's always been one for mischief, but you're talking about something else entirely."

author: Hogun, Fandral and Volstagg
quote: "We must go. We must find Thor!""You speak of treason!""Forget treason, it's suicide!"

author: Fandral and Hogun
quote: "Do we have a plan here?""Stand and fight!"

author: Hogun and Thor
quote: "Where do we go next?""Hogun, the peace is nearly won across the Nine Realms. You should stay here and be with your people, where your heart is. Asgard can wait.""You have my thanks.""As you have mine."

author: Hela and Hogun
quote: "It's come to my attention that you don't know who I am. I am Hela. Odin's firstborn. Commander of the legions of Asgard. The rightful heir to the throne and the Goddess of Death. My father is dead. As are the princes. You're welcome. We were once the seat of absolute power in the cosmos. Our supremacy was unchallenged. Yet Odin stopped at Nine Realms. Our destiny is to rule over all others. And I am here to restore that power. Kneel before me and rise into the ranks of my great conquest.""Whoever you were, whatever you've done, surrender now or we will show you no mercy.""Whoever I am? Did you not listen to a word I said?"

author: Hela and Hogun
quote: "Oh, I've missed this! Still, it's a shame. Good soldiers dying for nothing all because they couldn't see the future. Oh, look. Still alive. Change of heart?""Go back to whatever chamber you crept out of, you evil demoness!"

author: Jemma Simmons
quote: "He was lead researcher on parasitic organisms at the agrochemical lab we raided, based on his expertise we believe he is the key to finding a cure for Daisy."

author: Holden Radcliffe to Jemma Simmons
quote: "I believe that art and science are entwined. The Devil, and God, is in the details. I don't want the people to see my work and know it works. If they gave a second glance, I want it to be out of awe, not disgust."

author: Holden Radcliffe
quote: "Bird's visual acuity is superior to mammals; I got envious."

author: Holden Radcliffe to Jemma Simmons
quote: "I see how it's surveillance capabilities are appealing, but there was a company that had something eerily similar, Cybertek, heard of them? Turns out they were HYDRA. They connected explosives to soldiers eyes, violence for violence sake, an ugly misuse of science."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Hive
quote: "We've only just begun that kind of DNA modification, to make something of your kind that's... We can only dream.""You don't need to dream anymore."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Hive
quote: "The genetic make up of Inhumans in incredibly complex, we were bound to run into complications!""You assured me this would work.""Yes, it would have if I'd been provided with the right ingredients."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Daisy Johnson
quote: "You were going to handle this thing! Now we're both gonna die!""No ones dying here today!"

author: Holden Radcliffe and Hive
quote: "These Primitives are an Abomination of science and a very poor reflection of my talents.""They are not abominations, they're part of me and the Inhuman race. I want you to make more."

author: Holden Radcliffe to two Primitives
quote: "Right, listen up. This is called a Unified Extensible Firmware Interface. Grunt along with me... "Unified...""

author: Holden Radcliffe and Melinda May
quote: "Did S.H.I.E.L.D. send you?! Did they?!""Yes, I'm with S.H.I.E.L.D.!""Oh thank god, take me with you, you have to, please!"

author: Holden Radcliffe and Glenn Talbot
quote: "I can tell by your mustache that you're a man of importance and not to be trifled with, so I will be absolutely honest with you... the process is irreversible.""And I can tell by your beady little eyes that you're a worm. So let me be absolutely honest with you. If you don't find a solution to this problem, you're gonna end up looking like one of those mouth-breathers you made. You understand?""How could I not? [Talbot leaves] Almost as scary as Hive, that one."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Alphonso Mackenzie
quote: "Crank the heating up to a hundred degrees Fahrenheit and we're free to move about as we please.""You so want us to go out there on a hunch and hope those things don't rip us apart?""It's not a hunch, it's science. It's a science hunch."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Aida
quote: "This is based on an old S.H.I.E.L.D. program, poor kids have had a lot of friends die, maybe they didn't have to.""Is that what we're celebrating today? The inclusion of your new colleague Fitz on this project?""No Aida, today, today's your birthday."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Jemma Simmons
quote: "You're ready?""Hell no, I'm not ready! We're about to kill May!""We're about to

author: Holden Radcliffe to Aida
quote: "Alternating probe and coupling lasers, built exactly to your specifications at 593.5 nanometers."

author: Holden Radcliffe
quote: "I'm building an inter-dimensional gateway with an android I've created. If this works, I could die happy."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Melinda May
quote: "Look, if the internet is a garden hose, this book is Niagara Falls, blasting the universe's deepest thoughts through your eyeballs.""It's a piece of technology, a tool.""So's a grenade, until it's in the hands of a child."

author: Yo-Yo Rodriguez and Alphonso Mackenzie
quote: "Someone needs to make Radcliffe watch all the

author: Aida and Holden Radcliffe
quote: "I know what you're doing, Doctor. You came here to end my life.""Well, that's not... true, Aida. We simply wanted to make a few upgrades, that's all.""I made a few upgrades of my own."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Aida
quote: "To Aida.""To Aida. Is everything okay, Doctor?""It will be. It's just... We were so close. She had it in her hand, Aida in her hand! She just couldn't get out with it.""Your previous model had the Darkhold book in her hand.""And all the answers it holds. I've only glimpsed it, but it opened my eyes to possibilities beyond my wildest imaginings. It can show us how-""How to live forever.""Well, it's a bit more complicated, but yes. Man could, once and for all, break the bonds of his mortal restraints.""Is it still possible to make such a leap without the Darkhold?""I'm afraid not which is why I took a chance and had Aida make a play for it. It was a risk we had to take.""But she failed.""Ah, through no fault of her own. She played her part to perfection, right down to my little speech about how the Darkhold was making her a real girl. Oscar-worthy stuff. Though poor Fitz he was quite down in the dumps afterwards. But I had to protect myself switch to the long game.""Will there be another opportunity to acquire the Darkhold?""After today they're never gonna let me near it again. Which is why I'm counting on her to get it for me."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Aida
quote: "Agent May is resilient. She never stops fighting, yet she showed more distress before she woke than during the fight.""That's odd.""No. It makes perfect sense. The flaw isn't in the hardware. It was in May herself. The simulation was rejected because Agent May thrives in conflict and chaos, not tranquility. She's a warrior.""You're saying fighting against me stabilized her?""Precisely. If we want her to accept the simulation, we need to give her an opponent to fight, an enemy to vanquish, a dragon to slay.""Shall I design a dragon?""No. I have something else in mind."

author: Holden Radcliffe and Aida
quote: "Our May Life-Model Decoy should get us the Darkhold, eventually. And if something goes wrong, then we have our safety net.""You're referring to the other android, now in operation.""Yes, our second LMD."

author: Aida and Holden Radcliffe
quote: "I've observed much human behavior. And the more I see, the harder it gets to find a logic to it.""Oh, you sweet girl, there is no logic to love, anger, wonder, joy--""I understand the concepts, but I don't feel them myself. And unfortunately they've created a paradox in my programming.""What do you mean? Explain.""My two main parameters are in opposition due to human emotions. I was programmed to protect the Framework but also to preserve your life above all others.""Well, how is that a contradiction?""Because the greatest threat to the Framework, Doctor, is you."

author: Holden Radcliffe to Leo Fitz
quote: "The Darkhold corrupted my mind. Please, don't blame yourself. It's all my fault."

author: Holden Radcliffe
quote: "The world doesn't end with a bang, but a-"

author: Tony Stark's award ceremony
quote: "Tony Stark. Visionary. Genius. American patriot. Even from an early age, the son of legendary weapons developer Howard Stark quickly stole the spotlight with his brilliant and unique mind. At age four, he built his first circuit board. At age six, his first engine. And at seventeen, he graduated Summa Cum Laude from MIT. Then, the passing of a titan. Howard Stark's life long friend and ally Obadiah Stane, steps in to help fill the gap left by the legendary founder.
