quote: "I only kill assassinos who deserve it. It's vengeance, chica.""For what? You killed a detective.""He had blood on his hands.""A teacher!""A pedophile."

author: Quake and Ghost Rider
quote: "You don't get to decide who deserves to die.""I'm not the one who decides."

author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
quote: "You get lost, or I'll get angry, so angry I may not remember what I do to you... Sometimes I prefer it that way.""In front of them?"

author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
quote: "You're here to counsel me? You want to save my soul? I'm telling you, girl, I sold mine.""To the devil?""He was the only one buying, you know?"

author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
quote: "You see, this is new for me. I've never been--""A kidnapper?""Caught. You know who I am, which is a problem. For both of us. A problem that has to go away."

author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
quote: "No doubt you got a death wish, coming back to find me after I let you live. You told me not to, said you deserved it, I'm just looking for proof that you do.""And then?""My problem goes away, and your wish comes true."

author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
quote: "You know what happens to people during a blackout? They think they can get away with whatever they want.""That nothing can stop them."

author: Daisy Johnson and Robbie Reyes
quote: "Calm down before you go all Carrot Top again.""Stress has nothing to do with it.""What exactly is "it"? Because I still don't buy the whole "sold my soul" story.""Well, I don't give a damn what you buy. I'm the one stuck with it.""So you want to get rid of it.""I thought that if I settled the score, took down the gangbangers that put Gabe in a wheelchair, it would go away. Didn't happen. So I started settling other people's scores."

author: Ghost Rider and Quake
quote: "I don't get hurt. You gave me a pretty bad gash at the junkyard, now..""Not a scratch.""I've been stabbed, shot, run over, twice. Next day I'm good as new."

movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
author: Hellfire to Quake
quote: "The Watchdogs have the right idea, so I struck a deal with them. Help them hunt and kill every Inhuman. Hunted like the animals that we are. And I'm gonna be the last one to go.""You hate yourself that much?""I don't hate myself. I hate all of us."

author: Melinda May to Daisy Johnson
quote: "I know what you're doing. Trying to distance yourself from everyone else so they don't drown in your wake? I invented that move. It doesn't work, for one simple reason: Phil Coulson. He found me in that cubicle and dragged me out. He didn't give up on me, and he won't give up on you.""I never wanted that.""Mm-mm, no. You don't get to choose who cares about you. And Coulson... he's got a bigger heart than most. Lincoln wouldn't want you killing yourself over what happened."

author: Daisy Johnson and Robbie Reyes
quote: "It heals itself. Scientifically impossible self-healing car.""That only works when I'm the Rider."

author: Jemma Simmons and Daisy Johnson
quote: "It is nice having someone here to talk to again - you, specifically.""Someone other than Fitz?""Oh, well, of course, Fitz, but he has been rather distracted lately.""Distracted how?""Aida. You know how boys can be with their robots.""Actually, I really don't."

author: Burrows and Daisy Johnson
quote: "The Director would like a word with Quake.""My name's Daisy.""Well, not according to the press release."

author: Jeffrey Mace and Daisy Johnson
quote: "I must admit we make a pretty impressive pair.""Well, looks like we're stuck with each other.""Well, I was just trying to make the most of the precarious situation you put me in.""Is this when I get read the riot act?""Not by me. However, if you're as smart as they say, then you'll know that, uh, I saved you from being thrown in prison.""You saved face. You turned it into a publicity stunt.""You already had plenty of publicity destruction of public property, assault, armed robbery-""I never carry a weapon.""You are the weapon. The public was turning against you. Now? They look up to you. You're welcome... Okay, this isn't how I wanted this to go. Uh, we're both Inhuman. And as you say, we're stuck with each other, so why not make the most of it? I read your written statement, and I believe it. You were just trying to protect the innocent. And I know you're new here, but that's what S.H.I.E.L.D. is all about."""New here?"""It was a joke. I was making a joke to break the ice.""Got it."

author: Daisy Johnson and Jeffrey Mace
quote: "Seems they look up to you, too the "hero of Vienna". It's a nice pic.""Not as big a deal as they made it. They gave me too much credit.""You don't get to be modest and have a framed glamour shot on your desk.""Fair point."

author: Jeffrey Mace and Daisy Johnson
quote: "Look, we're a team now, and I have a saying: A tea-""I read the motivational poster in the bathroom.""Good. Well, um, the team trust has been eroded for both of us, but I'm hoping we can earn it back tackle problems together within the administrative structure and start-""You want to tackle problems? The Watchdogs enemy number one. I believe they're funded internationally. They have ties to people within the U.S. government.""I don't want to chase conspiracy theories.""It's not a theory if I can prove it.""I want to chase hard facts, like the fact that Senator Nadeer is aware of an Inhuman who's being held against his will.""Now we're talking."

author: Jeffrey Mace and Daisy Johnson
quote: "You know, I have to admit Jemma is much tougher than I had originally given her credit for.""Yeah, well, being in S.H.I.E.L.D. will do that to you. I think Simmons has been kidnapped like - three times since I've known her.""Really?""Yeah, well, only twice on this planet."

author: Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons and Daisy Johnson
quote: "It's a high-pitch frequency caused by Shockley's cellular vibration.""The ramping up of his kinetic energy at an atomic level, and once it reaches a critical threshold, that massive energy transforms his body from a solid to a flammable gaseous state and then..""Boom."

author: Superior and Quake
quote: "I've been looking forward to facing one of you, readying myself. I strive for perfection. You are a genetic cheater.""I'm not a cheater. You're just playing by the old rules."

author: Daisy Johnson to Jemma Simmons
quote: "Prove to me that you're not a frickin' robot. Because it looks like you're malfunctioning."

author: Quake to Leo Fitz
quote: "Fitz. We were all in the Framework together. We understand how confusing and screwed up that world is. And trust me, it's gonna take me years to process everything that happened in there. But the one thing that I don't need time to understand is that we are all in this together. I tried to take the blame for everything not too long ago, I dyed my hair, I ran away... I thought that separating myself from the team would help me protect it. But in truth, I kind of just lost myself."

author: Aida and Quake
quote: "Hello Daisy. I had a lot of time when you shattered my spine to think about what I'd do when I see you again. I decided it would be fun to watch you kill yourself.""Aida,

author: Daisy Johnson and Phil Coulson
quote: "I can't do what you're asking of me. I can't do it.""You've always been capable of more than you imagined. No. Not without you. You found me alone in an alley, and you gave me everything. A home, a belief, solid ground to  stand on. But that was all you. You are what I believe in.""You believe in yourself, and you should.""No. You want a symbol? You are the symbol. There's no S.H.I.E.L.D. without you. There's nothing without you."

author: Deke Shaw and Daisy Johnson, about Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
quote: "They're okay, right? Like, they're gon... Like, they're gonna be... They're gonna be fine?""They'll figure it out. Have faith. Or a, you know, Xanax."

author: Daisy Johnson and The Doctor
quote: "Fitz.""Oh, come on, Agent Johnson. That's not how you address a HYDRA superior."

author: Daisy Johnson and Leo Fitz
quote: "I will never forgive you.""I suspect you won't be the only one."

author: Quake
quote: "Hale is HYDRA. "Hale HYDRA". Seriously? How are we still fighting Nazis today?"

author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
quote: "Maybe Daisy shouldn't have been put in that position in the first place.""You don't think she should lead?""I didn't say that. But she does need time. She's questioning herself...""I question myself everyday...""Let me speak! All Daisy could think about was getting you back. She's not ready for your job, Phil.""She has to be. My time is running low.""Because you're being irresponsible."

author: Deke Shaw, Alphonso Mackenzie and Piper
quote: "Is Daisy here? She's so pretty.""What now?""I want to put my mouth on her mouth and move it around a lot. But I don't want to do that unless she wants to too, 'cause that's what makes it nice. But I don't think she wants that, 'cause she does not like me one bit.""I mean, she's not my type, but I get it."

author: Alphonso Mackenzie, Deke Shaw and Phil Coulson
quote: "You're in love with her.""Sorry? What? No. Uh, no offense, Mack, but I think your radar is way misfiring on this one.""That was convincing. I believe him.""Thank you.""You confessed, you idiot. When you were hopped up on painkillers. Piper and I couldn't get you to shut up about it.""No. That's... Okay, guys. What, you've never heard that drugs can make you say stuff that's a little crazy? Maybe that's why drugs are bad.""It's obvious. I figured it out a while ago.""All right, well, it doesn't matter. She hates me, anyway."

author: Phil Coulson and Quake
quote: "You're getting good at this. You are.""I have a feeling Professor Coulson was easy on his students. I should at least lose points for the mutiny on day one.""For sure. But I'm throwing you some extra credit for a well-timed rescue."

author: Quake and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
quote: "I had it under control. She was coming around, and then Yo-Yo killed her.""No. I just saved the world."

author: Taryan and Quake
quote: "You are Inhuman. I always knew the tales of the experiments were true.""Okay, for the record, we don't love to be called experiments, just moving forward."

author: Taryan and Quake
quote: "I'm merely saying that I understand what it is to be on the outside, as I'm sure you are different, hunted by lesser humans. You deserve better than that.""Look, yeah, some people have given me a hard time. Humans are complicated. They disagree. Sometimes it comes to blows. Only, sometimes, it's a person who risks everything for their friends even though she lost her limbs. Hypothetically. We fight, okay, but not with a lack of respect, and that's something I don't think you're quite understanding.""Oh, no matter. You will come with me, willingly or not.""I'm gonna have to choose "not"."

author: Quake and Taryan
quote: "I'm stronger than you know.""Everyone thinks that.""But in my case, it's true. I'm the Destroyer of Worlds."

author: Phil Coulson to Quake after he kissed Melinda May
quote: "Not a word, Agent Johnson.""Copy that, Hot Lips."

author: Quake and Phil Coulson
quote: "So... You made out with May.""Did I?""Oh yeah.""Oh. People see what they want to see, I guess."

author: Quake
quote: "I'm aware that we rolled the dice with Coulson, and I still believe that we need him for this, but I will admit that I let my emotions get the best of me. I thought that Coulson was the only one who could keep us all on the same page. You would say that's proof that I can't do the job, that I shouldn't lead. Well, I agree. The truth is, I can't hold the team together. But he can. Coulson wants me to call the shots in his absence? Well, that's my decision. Mack should call the shots. He has the biggest heart. I mean, physically, but also, you know... You are our moral center. And, look, I never want to stop being a soldier. He's a general we can all rally behind. Anyone who thinks I'm 100% right about this, raise your hand."

author: Quake to Phil Coulson
quote: "We fought for you. And we fought each other for you."

author: Glenn Talbot and Quake
quote: "The end justifies the means, right?""The only people who say that are the people doing bad things.""I'm becoming a hero.""You are one! The minute that you enlisted, you became one. We all did. Look around. You're surrounded by them. Anyone who signs up for this, to lose friends, or limbs, or your mind, or your life, in protection of humanity. We are in this together. We need to join forces."

author: Phil Coulson and Quake
quote: "I left you something in your bunk. It's a letter. Nothing fancy. Basically just says how proud I am of you. I am so proud.""I love you.""I love you, too.""And, uh, thanks for the spaceship."

author: Jemma Simmons and Quake
quote: "The Zephyr is banged up because everywhere we go, Quake leaves a wake of destruction!""I've explained my philosophy on that. They need to respect how strong we are.""We're down to four people!""Exactly! That is the point! They don't know that!"

author: Trok and Quake
quote: "This small aircraft isn't even worth as much as a unit of fuel. Unless you plan to work in the shafts, how do you expect to make payment?""You're gonna give it to me on the house."

author: Quake and Jemma Simmons
quote: "Going that deep is not smart. It... We have to consider heading home and regrouping before we jump into the juicy center of the Milky Way.""No, we can't let this trail go cold!"

movie: Fear and Loathing on the Planet of Kitson
author: Quake and Jemma Simmons
quote: "I'm the mission leader, and that was my call to make, not yours.""Whose side are you on?""You know damn well whose side we are all on. We went to a Fire Planet for you. We followed every bread crumb trying to find him, and now we're at the end of a galaxy."

movie: Fear and Loathing on the Planet of Kitson
author: Daisy Johnson and Jemma Simmons
quote: "We're on a mission.""Right. What is the mission?""The mission is... Ladies' Night!"

author: Quake and Atarah
quote: "Hurt Fitz one more time, and I will tear this ship apart.""I've heard reports of what Quake can do, which is why Leopold Fitz is being held on another ship. If any harm comes to me, those ships will scatter across the galaxy. Behave... or you will never find him."

author: Quake and Jemma Simmons
quote: "Simmons, I... I can't leave you.""You have to. Whatever happens, at least I'll be with Fitz. We'll have each other."

author: Daisy Johnson and Sarge
quote: "Yeah, I'm out. This is too much.""Her, too, huh? Daddy issues?"

author: Melinda May and Daisy Johnson
quote: "I don't know why, but a part of me feels like I could trust him. It's just a feeling.""Would you be saying that if he didn't have Coulson's face?"

author: Daisy Johnson to Deke Shaw
quote: "We're still stuck with a live nuke and whatever else is out there."

author: Daisy Johnson and Alphonso Mackenzie
quote: "When do I get to hear stories about deep space?""When we sit down for debrief. I saw an ocean of lava.""For real?""Yeah. I didn't think I could come back to anything more bizarre, but I should've known better."

author: Daisy Johnson to Alphonso Mackenzie
quote: "She was in Davis and then she jumped into May and now who knows."

author: Daisy Johnson and Sarge
quote: "This time, I'll actually kill you.""Go ahead. It'd be easier than doing it myself. Come on! What are you waiting for?! Do it! Kill me, Skye!"

author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Daisy Johnson
quote: "You really think this man is Coulson?""Maybe not all of him, but he remembered my name. He called me Skye. How would he have known that?"

author: Daisy Johnson and Alphonso Mackenzie
quote: "I should've never trusted him. I should've...""No. It wasn't right for me to judge–""No, don't... don't... don't do that. Don't you walk it back. I did this. May... This is on me."

author: Daisy Johnson and Phil Coulson
quote: "You're an LMD.""No. No... No!"

author: Fischer and Daisy Johnson
quote: "What's a gal like you doing trying to be a Mountie? Can't you find a husband?""Okay. Yeah, I mean, I wish that I could hold on to a husband. But for some reason, they just end up with broken ribs whenever they give me lip. Now move, or a gal like me will knock out a guy like you in front of people like them."

author: Abel and Daisy Johnson
quote: "Quake. I've been looking forward to this.""Huh. Well, sorry... this is just another fight for me."

author: Phil Coulson and Daisy Johnson
quote: "If HYDRA doesn't form, then S.H.I.E.L.D. doesn't form in response.""Well, because it doesn't have to. I mean, think about all the future lives we'll save if there's no Freddy Malick."

author: Daisy Johnson to Deke Shaw
quote: "I know what I said about the butterfly effect, but we can't pass up this opportunity. He's Wilfred Malick. He's gonna be a major player in HYDRA. And if you kill him right now, you will save thousands of lives."

author: Daisy Johnson
quote: "'55? As in our giant spaceship just appeared in the sky in 1955?"

author: Daisy Johnson to Phil Coulson
quote: "But odd is the new normal. I mean, you are a highly sophisticated robot version of yourself, and we're in a diner in the 50s."

author: Daisy Johnson to Daniel Sousa
quote: "Look, all I can say is that you are not crazy. And the people you have locked up might be the key to proving it."

author: Daisy Johnson and Deke Shaw
quote: "I outrank you. And if you want to get technical–""Daisy, he was a kid!"

author: Daisy Johnson to Alphonso Mackenzie
quote: "Cool. Writing some new history. Copy that."

author: Daisy Johnson and Gideon Malick
quote: "You must hear all the secrets about S.H.I.E.L.D. from your dad?"Some. Lately his been locked up in his windowless office all day, but, uh, I'm in the loop."

author: Daniel Sousa and Daisy Johnson
quote: "Looks like I missed a lot.""I'm sorry. This is so weird and messed up. But the Chronicoms jumped, we have to dive in after them. Without us, it's way worse."

author: Nathaniel Malick and Daisy Johnson
quote: "Nothing really spoke to me... until I met you... saw what you could do. Woah.""You haven't even seen the half of it."

author: Daisy Johnson to Phil Coulson
quote: "We are not in the best shape, are we?"

author: Daisy Johnson and Jemma Simmons
quote: "I think I'm time-looping. I-I've done this already. I've done this already.""Oh, well, that's fun."

author: Daisy Johnson and Daniel Sousa
quote: "Every time I ask you for help, you say yes. Even if I don't ask, you're waiting here to make me rest or whatever. Why? Be honest.""Honest? I know your type.""My what, now?""I know people like you. Some of my favorite people are people like you. Focused on the greater good, even at your own expense. You want people to think you like being alone, even though you always end up back with friends. You hate losing.""Everyone hates losing.""Yeah, but you'll keep running at the problem full-tilt until you either solve it or slam headlong into a brick wall.""Some of those walls are literal.""I know.""But how does that...""Because when people like you run into those walls, you should have someone there to pick you back up.""And you... you like to be that someone?""Not for everyone. It helps if they're fun to be around and if they say what they mean and if they have that superpower where they can rock things around, which is very impressive.""That's, um... that is awfully specific."

author: Daisy Johnson and Jiaying
quote: "I never knew my mom. And when I finally found her... she wasn't who I'd hoped she would be.""She hurt you. I can't speak to your mother's reasons, but for me... sometimes, trying to do the right thing comes out all wrong."

author: Daisy Johnson to Daniel Sousa
quote: "Sibyl dropped Kora in my lap because they knew I'd want to save her. The thing is, I already have a sister to save. Her name is Jemma Simmons"

author: Kora and Daisy Johnson
quote: "I believe there's a chance we could work together.""What makes you think that we would ever-""You. I've always wanted a sibling, and we have the same blood. You believe in S.H.I.E.L.D.. There must be a reason."

author: Daisy Johnson and Elena Rodriguez
quote: "It's quiet here in the mornings. Less strangers in suits running around.""Well, you should make room in that routine for uh, what's the word in English? Bureaucracy. Mace is going to want to grill you about your time off.""Yeah, he already has. Trying to set up meet and greets or whatever that is."

author: Jeffrey Mace and Elena Rodriguez
quote: "The powers that be get twitchy when enhanced individuals choose their own missions. With Quake out there--""Daisy has nothing to do with this, sir.""But she is the example of what not to be. A vigilante."

author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Elena Rodriguez
quote: "Not cool, Yo-yo. Zephyr's about to take off and you're just gonna let me leave without saying goodbye?""Are you going after Daisy again? Where are you headed?""Well, intel says she's on the east coast. We got every USGS satellite and geological monitoring station on it so if she uses her powers, we'll know.""Does she get to be a S.H.I.E.L.D. pet too? Bagged and tagged like a stray dog."

author: Alpha Dog and Quake
quote: "Hey, you know who this is, boys? Guess it's our lucky day.""I don't think lucky's the word you're looking for."

author: Quake and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
quote: "What the hell are you doing here? S.H.I.E.L.D. assign you to go after that weapon?""No, they assigned me to paperwork. S.H.I.E.L.D. doesn't know about this. I'm here for Ramon.""The one who killed your cousin.""Sí."

author: Daisy Johnson to Elena Rodriguez
quote: "All right. Let's get out of here before that guy Burrows comes in and sets out a coffee and scone for the Director."

author: Yo-Yo Rodriguez and Quake
quote: "Mack said Coulson and him are also tracking your powers, the earthquakes. Look, Daisy, if I can help--""No, no. One Inhuman fugitive is enough. If I need help your help, I'll find you.""Okay."

author: Quake and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
quote: "What happened with Ramon?""He won't be hurting anyone again."

author: Daisy Johnson and Elena Rodriguez
quote: "Okay, so, this is the data from your watch, and this right here is the GPS coordinate that puts your location in the warehouse.""Here we are, breaking rules again.""Yep. But one click of a button and all Mace will know is whatever we tell him.""Do it."

author: Elena Rodriguez and Daisy Johnson
quote: "Ramon, at the warehouse, I just want you to know I didn't kill him. I'm not capable of--""I know."

author: Daisy Johnson and Elena Rodriguez
quote: "What's that?""Something Coulson gave me the day I signed the Accords. He said it would help remind me that I'm not giving something up but gaining something.""A team."

author: Wolfgang von Strucker about Wanda and Pietro Maximoff
quote: "There's nothing more horrifying than a miracle!"

author: Quicksilver's repeated quote
quote: "You didn't see that coming?"

author: Quicksilver warns the Sokovian Police Department of the upcoming Battle of Sokovia
quote: "We're under attack! Clear the city, now!"(Leaves, returns with assault rifle and shoots bullets in the air)"Get off your asses."

author: Doctor List to Baron Wolfgang von Strucker
quote: "Let's show them what we have accomplished. Send out the twins."

author: Steve Rogers and Maria Hill
quote: "The two enhanced?""Wanda and Pietro Maximoff. Twins. Orphaned at ten when a shell collapsed their apartment building. Sokovia's had a rough history. It's nowhere special but it's on the way to everywhere special.""Their abilities?""He's got increased metabolism and improved thermal homeostasis. Her thing is neural electric interfacing, telekinesis, mental manipulation. He's fast and she's weird.""Well, they're going to show up again.""Agreed. File says they volunteered for Strucker's experiments. It's nuts.""Right. What kind of monster would let a German scientist experiment on them to protect their country?""We're not at war, Captain.""They are."

author: Pietro Maximoff, Ultron and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "Everyone's plan is not to kill them.""And make them martyrs? You need patience. Need to see the big picture.""I don't see the big picture. I have a little picture. I take it out and look at it... every day.""You lost your parents in the bombings. I've seen the records.""The records are not the picture.""Pietro.""No, please.""We were 10 years old. Having dinner, the four of us. When the first shell hits, two floors below, it makes a hole in the floor. It's big. Our parents go in... and the whole building starts coming apart. I grab her, roll under the bed, and the second shell hits. But it doesn't go off. It just... sits there in the rubble. Three feet from our faces. And on the side of the shell is painted one word.""Stark.""We were trapped for two days. Every effort to save us, every shift in the bricks, I think, This will set it off.""We wait for two days for Tony Stark to kill us.""I know what they are."

author: Pietro and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "I’m gonna kill him. I’ll be right back.""No. I’m over it. I want... I want to finish the plan. I want the big one."

author: Wanda Maximoff, Captain America, Quicksilver & Hawkeye
quote: "You don't know what's in this!""This isn't a game!"(Pietro, using his super-speed deactivates the Regeneration Cradle)"No, no. Go on. You were saying?"(All of a sudden, Hawkeye shatters the glass floor Pietro was on with a bullet, sending him to the floor below)"Pietro!""What? You didn't see that coming?"

author: Quicksilver and Captain America
quote: "This is S.H.I.E.L.D.?""This is what S.H.I.E.L.D. is supposed to be.""This is not so bad."

author: List
quote: "No one has made it past this stage of our experiments with alien enhancement. Well, no one other than the twins, of course."

movie: Avengers: Age of Ultron Prelude - This Scepter'd Isle
author: Pietro to Wanda Maximoff
quote: "Be strong, sister. It won't be long before we have the power we need to fight."

author: Raina and Chan Ho Yin
quote: "You need a similar name. More powerful name. A name like... Scorch.""Scorch? You're joking.""Have you ever heard of Steve Rogers? No. Captain America, now he's on the news and lunch box and a poster on the wall."

author: Debbie and Raina
quote: "I'm surprised you got him to cooperate.""He has dreams. I told him they'd come true.""You gave him a name, didn't you?"

author: Raina to Phil Coulson
quote: "We want to know about the day after you died."

author: Raina and Edison Po
quote: "Will you tell me what he's like?""Never. The last person who tried to learn such things got a knife for it. I don't want to have to do that again, Raina. You have such pretty eyes.""I understand. You can't even whisper to me about him.""No, I can't."

author: Raina and Phil Coulson
quote: "I know you don't want to believe it, but you can't tell me nothing makes you doubt, makes you wonder what happened in Tahiti.""It's a magical place. I keep saying that."" Don't you want to know why?"

author: Raina and Phil Coulson
quote: "You didn't just give your life, you gave up your chance at a normal one, at love. And she did love you, Agent Coulson.""How could you know that?""Do you miss her? Dinners at the Richmond. Do you miss hearing her play? You didn't have a chance to say goodbye.""I couldn't... I can't...""She cried for days after S.H.I.E.L.D. told her you died. They shattered her heart with a lie, and now they're lying to you.""No. No they're not.""I know you don't want to believe it, but you can't tell me nothing makes you doubt, makes you wonder what happened in Tahiti.""

author: Raina and John Garrett
quote: "So you're a liar. You're a fraud.""An artist. A con artist, perhaps, but an artist all the same."

author: Raina and Grant Ward
quote: "You don't seem like her type.""I'm everyone's type."

author: Raina to Grant Ward
quote: "I thought Agent Garrett shared my interest in special people, in transformation, but now I realize he's just afraid to die."

author: John Garrett and Grant Ward
quote: "Something about that woman unnerves me.""It's those eyes.""No it's what's behind those eyes."

author: John Garrett and Raina
quote: "You never disappoint, do you Flowers? I just wish everyone on my team had the same success rate.""It's Raina.""Sorry, force of habit."

author: Deathlok and Raina
quote: "Why are you here?""For you and others like you. People with gifts, I'm waiting for what's inside to be revealed. The girl, Skye. What do you know about her? Where does she come from?""Why do you care?""Because inside, I believe she and I have something in common."

author: Raina to John Garrett
quote: "What will I become?"

author: Raina
quote: "The evolution he speaks of, she will be an important part of that."

author: Raina to Calvin Zabo
quote: "I found your daughter."

author: Raina and Phil Coulson
quote: "Let me be clear: Mr. Creel is working for HYDRA; I am not!""Why the break-up? Bad dental plan?""HYDRA only has one thing on their minds: world domination, which is so 1945."

author: Raina
quote: "Oh, the Obelisk. I see what this is. I can help you-"

movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
author: Raina to Phil Coulson
quote: "You know how to make a girl feel special."

movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
author: Raina to Phil Coulson
quote: "Take me in. PLEASE."

movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
author: Raina to Phil Coulson
quote: "You're going to use me to get to Whitehall."

movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
author: Calvin Zabo
quote: "Don't beg. It reminds me of what you were when I first found you: hungry, in the streets, with just the fairy tales that your grandmother told you."

movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
author: Lance Hunter and Raina
quote: "If you ask me, Coulson let you off easy.""I didn't ask."

movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
author: Calvin Zabo and Raina
quote: "Who wants it? Who has you so afraid, Raina?""... Daniel Whitehall.""He scares you more than I do?""Please. He's very powerful.""Hmm.""He has resources!""He's a butcher.""And what are you?""I'M A MAN! Trying to  put my family back together!"

author: Raina
quote: "Destiny calls."

author: Raina
quote: "We're humans, Skye. We just have the potential to be more"

author: Raina
quote: "Destiny calls."

author: Calvin Zabo, Daniel Whitehall, and Raina
quote: "If my daughter wasn't here, I would tear you and your men to pieces.""Well, then, I'll add that to the number of reasons that I'm glad she's here. You are the piece of the puzzle I can't decipher. Why are you really here?""Is it really that hard to see? It's love. Agent Ward believes if he helps Skye fulfill her destiny, she'll see him for what he really is.""(To Zabo)Aww. It's a pity you won't get to fulfill that destiny, or that after all those years, you won't get your vengeance after what I did to your wife."

author: Raina and Skye
quote: "Your whole life... our whole lives have been leading up to his moment.""Sorry. I don't buy into the whole "this is your destiny" thing. We're taking the Obelisk, and we're leaving. There's too many lives at stake.""You got it all wrong. Whitehall, everyone has got it all wrong. This doesn't destroy. It gives life; new life. We finally get to find out what we become.(the Obelisk floats onto a pedestal)""Make it stop.""I can't. Neither of us can now."

author: Raina and Calvin Zabo
quote: "After all that time, I didn't quite get the answers I was searching for.""I'm sorry you didn't find your way to the temple. You didn't get to evolve.""Oh, I evolved. What the hell have I become?""Raina. Let's not lose our heads.""What happened to me?""Metamorphosis, by the look of it.""I was supposed to become something divine, something transcendent. My grandmother said I'd be an angel, not some gnarled freak of nature covered in thorns.""You always did like flowers.""They hurt, and it's all your fault."

author: Raina and Calvin Zabo
quote: "I can't live as this repulsive creature.""Then don't."

author: Lincoln Campbell
quote: "You're a piece of cake compared to the other one. Total physical transformation, and we still have no idea what her gift is."

author: Raina and Lincoln Campbell
quote: "I dream of Skye and her father at dinner. A bouquet of daisies. And she's so happy."

author: Raina
quote: "Consequences are upon us. Men made of metal will tear our cities apart."

author: Jiaying and Calvin Zabo
quote: "What can you tell me about her?""Raina? She's manipulative, dangerous, deceitful. We had good times."

author: Raina to Gordon
quote: "You were right, it is a gift, all of it. I just needed to embrace it, embrace my life here, my purpose, to help my people."

author: Raina and Calvin Zabo
quote: "What do you think I'm trying to do?""Oh I don't know, create chaos?!""Why would I do that?""Because you thrive on it!"

author: Raina to Jiaying
quote: "I am not a monster, I am an angel and I'm finally what I'm meant to be."

author: Raina
quote: "It is the thorn that protects the rose...in this case, the daisy."

author: Raina to Skye
quote: "Even in the darkness, you'll see the truth."

author: Ramonda to T'Challa
quote: "Show him who you are!"

author: Ramonda to T'Challa
quote: "Son, we have entertained this charlatan for too long. Reject his request."

author: Ramonda
quote: "Nakia. I don't like this. The Heart-Shaped Herb belongs to us. We may be creating a bigger monster with M'Baku. Nakia, you should take it yourself."

author: Ramonda
quote: "I call upon the ancestors. I will call upon Bast. I am here with my son T'Challa. Heal him. We must bury him."

author: T'Challa and M'Baku
quote: "Please allow my mother to stay here.""No harm will come to her. I give you my word."

author: Nakia and Ramonda
quote: "Queen Mother... Princess. My comfort for your loss.""Thank you, Nakia. It is so good to have you back with us."

author: Ramonda and Shuri
quote: "Shuri!""Sorry, Mother!"

author: T'Challa and Ramonda
quote: "How are you feeling today, Mama?""Proud. Your father and I would talk about this day all the time. He is with us, and it is your time to be King."

author: Shuri and Ramonda upon hearing and seeing the Jabari Tribe's arrival
quote: "Are they Jabari?""Yes."

author: River Tribe Elder, Erik Killmonger, Ramonda and W'Kabi
quote: "Ungubani?"[1]"NdinguYONAJadaka, unyana weNkosana N'Jobu!"[2] I found my daddy with panther claws in his chest! You ain't the son of a king, you're the son of a murderer!"

author: Shuri, Nakia and Ramonda
quote: "First Baba, and now my brother. Mama, we didn't even get to bury him.""It's me.""Nakia. Who is this man?""He's a friend of T'Challa's, he saved my life.""Where is Okoye?""Okoye is not coming. She and the Dora Milaje will serve the new king. Wait here.""What has happened to Wakanda?"

author: Johann Schmidt
quote: "The Tesseract was the jewel of Odin's treasure room. It's not something one buries. But I think it is close, yes?"

author: Johann Schmidt
quote: "Great power has always baffled primitive men. HYDRA is assembling an arsenal to destroy my enemies in one stroke, wherever they are, regardless of how many forces they possess, all in a matter of hours."

author: Johann Schmidt
quote: "My weapons contain enough destructive power to decimate every hostile capital on Earth. Quite simply, gentlemen, I have harnessed the power of the gods."

author: Red Skull
quote: "You are failing! We are close to an offensive that will shake the planet, yet we are continually delayed because you cannot outwit a simpleton with a shield!"

author: Abraham Erskine to Steve Rogers
quote: "Now Schmidt is a member of the inner circle and he is ambitious. He and Hitler share a passion for occult power and Teutonic myth. Hitler uses his fantasies to inspire his followers, but for Schmidt, it is not fantasy. For him, it is real."

author: Chester Phillips
quote: "He thinks that he is a god and he is willing to blow up half the world to prove it."

author: Johann Schmidt and Church Keeper
quote: "The Tesseract was the jewel of Odin's treasure room. It's not something one buries. But I think it is close, yes?""I cannot help you.""No. But maybe you can help your village. You must have some friends out there. Some... some little grandchildren perhaps. I have no need for them to die."

author: Johann Schmidt and Arnim Zola
quote: "I have not come all this way for safety, Doctor.""What was that?""I must congratulate you, Arnim, your designs does not disappoint, though they may require some slight reinforcement.""Nothing has changed, it's stable. Amazing."

author: Johann Schmidt to Roeder
quote: "While Hitler speaks of a thousand-year Reich, but he cannot feed his army for the month. His troops spill their blood across every field in Europe. But he is still no closer to achieving his goals."

author: Roeder and Red Skull
quote: "And I suppose you still aim to win this war through magic?""Science. But I understand your confusion. Great power has always baffled primitive men."

author: Red Skull to Captain America
quote: "You are deluded, Captain. You pretend to be a simple soldier but, in reality, you are just afraid to admit that we have left humanity behind. Unlike you, I embrace it proudly. Without fear!"

author: Red Skull to HYDRA
quote: "Tomorrow, HYDRA will stand as master of the world, borne to victory on the wings of the Valkyrie. Our enemies' weapons will be powerless against us. If they shoot down one plane, hundreds more will rain fire upon them! If they cut off one head, two more shall take its place."

author: Red Skull and Captain America
quote: "Arrogance may not be a uniquely American trait, but I must say, you do it better than anyone. But there are limits to what even you can do, Captain, or did Erskine tell you otherwise?""He told me you were insane."

author: Red Skull and Captain America
quote: "You could have the power of the gods! Yet you wear a flag on your chest and think you fight a battle of nations! I have seen the future Captain! There are no flags!""Not in my future!"

author: Captain America and Arnim Zola
quote: "HYDRA died with the Red Skull.""Cut off one head, two more shall take its place."

author: Red Skull and Thanos
quote: "Welcome, Thanos, son of A'Lars. Gamora, daughter of Thanos.""You know us?""It is my curse to know all who journey here.""Where is the Soul Stone?""You should know, it extracts a terrible price.""I am prepared.""We all think that at first. We are all wrong."

author: Thanos and Red Skull
quote: "How is it you know this place so well?""A lifetime ago, I, too, sought the stones. I even held one in my hand. But it cast me out, banished me here, guiding others to a treasure I can not possess."

author: Red Skull, Gamora and Thanos
quote: "What you seek lies in front of you. As does what you fear.""What's this?""The price. Soul holds a special place among the Infinity Stones. You might say, it is a certain wisdom.""Tell me what it needs.""To ensure that whoever possesses it, understands its power. The stone demands a sacrifice.""Of what?""In order to take the stone, you must lose that which you love. A soul for a soul."

author: Gamora, Red Skull and Thanos
quote: "All my life I dreamed of a day, a moment, when you got what you deserved. And I was always so disappointed. But now, you kill and torture and you call it mercy. The universe has judged you. You asked it for a price and it told you no. You failed. And do you wanna know why? Because you love nothing. No one. Really, tears?""They are not for him.""No. This isn't love.""I ignored my destiny once, I cannot do that again. Even for you. I'm sorry, Little one.""No!"

author: Hawkeye and Black Widow
quote: "How's it going? Jesus... Maybe he's making this shit up."No, I don't think so.Why, cause he knows your Daddy's name?"

author: Hawkeye to Thor
quote: "It can't be undone. Or that's at least what the red floating guy had to say. Maybe you wanna go talk to him, okay? Go grab your hammer, and you go fly and talk to him"

author: Red Skull and Black Widow
quote: "Consider me a guide. To you, and to all who seek the Soul Stone.""Oh, good. You tell us where it is. Then we'll be on our way.""Ah, liebchen. If only it were that easy."

author: Red Skull and Black Widow
quote: "What you seek lies in front of you, as does what you fear.""The stone is down there.""For one of you. For the other... In order to take the stone, you must lose that which you love. An everlasting exchange. A soul, for a soul."

author: Skye and Grant Ward
quote: "The Red Skull, founder of HYDRA, was a big, fat, freaking Nazi.""That has nothing to do with today.""You know, you always had that Hitler Youth look to you. So it's really not that surprising."

author: HYDRA Officer to Werner Reinhardt
quote: "Herr Reinhardt, I-I fear Schmidt-""Oh, there's no reason left to fear the Red Skull.""He's dead.""However, his vision is not. The work HYDRA has done will live on."

author: Werner Reinhardt
quote: "The Red Skull said it may hold the answer the answer to death itself."

author: Werner Reinhardt
quote: "The world has lost a great man."

movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
author: Robbie Reyes and Phil Coulson
quote: "Is that the book my uncle was talking about?""I think so.""Well, you know where to find it?""No one ever has. Not Daniel Whitehall, not the Red Skull, not even Nick Fury himself."

author: Howard Stark to Peggy Carter
quote: "You want a mission that matters? This is it. My technology in the hands of some nut that wants to be the next Red Skull? You have no idea how bad that could be."

author: Rhomann Dey after capturing the Guardians of the Galaxy.
quote: "We arrested these five on Xandar."

author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal about Drax.
quote: "Drax, A.K.A. The Destroyer. Since his wife and family were killed, he's been on a rampage across the galaxy in a search for vengeance."

author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal about Gamora.
quote: "Gamora. Soldier, assassin. Wanted on over a dozen counts of murder."

author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal about Rocket.
quote: "Rocket. Wanted on over 50 charges of vehicular theft and escape from lock up."

author: Rhomann Dey when he arrests Peter Quill.
quote: "Hey, if it isn't Star-Prince."

author: Garthan Saal to Rhomann Dey about Groot.
quote: "What the hell?""Groot. He's been travelling recently as Rocket's personal houseplant/muscle."

author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal about Star-Lord
quote: "Peter Jason Quill. He's also known as Star-Lord." "Who calls him that?"  "Himself, mostly. He's wanted on charges of minor assault, public intoxication and fraud."

author: Rhomann Dey and Garthan Saal about the Guardians of the Galaxy
quote: "They call themselves 'The Guardians of the Galaxy.'""What a bunch of A-Holes"

author: Drax the Destroyer and Rhomann Dey
quote: "What if someone does something that irks me and I decide to remove his spine?""That's... that's actually... murder. One of the worst crimes of all, so... also illegal.""Hmm."

author: Rhomann Dey and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "Your criminal records have also been expunged. However, I have to warn you against breaking any laws in the future.""Question. What if I see something that I wanna take and it belongs to someone else?""Then you will be arrested.""But what if I want it more than the person who has it?""Still illegal.""That doesn't follow. No, I want it more, sir. Do you understand me? What are you laughing at? What? I can't have a discussion with this gentleman?"

author: Rhomann Dey and Star-Lord.
quote: "Hey, if it isn't "Star-Prince.""Star-Lord. It's like my outlaw name.""No, it's cool, I can see why you'd want a code name. It's not weird at all."

author: Rocket Raccoon
quote: "Xandarians. What a bunch of losers! Always trying to get from something stupid to nothing at all."

author: Rocket Raccoon
quote: "I live for the simple things... like how much this is gonna hurt."

author: Rocket Raccoon
quote: "I guess most of Nova Corps wanna uphold the laws, but these ones here, they're corrupt and cruel."

author: Rocket Raccoon to the guards
quote: "I guess most of the Nova Corps are out to protect the greater good, but  here, they're corrupt and cruel. But hey, that's not my problem. I ain't gonna be here long. I've been escaped 22 prisons. This one is no different. You're lucky the broad showed up, cause otherwise me and Groot here woulda' collected our bounty."

author: Rocket Racoon
quote: "Ain't no thing like me 'cept me!"

author: Rocket Raccoon
quote: "Pretty high and mighty coming from the lackey of a genocidal maniac. Yeah, I know who you are. Anyone who's anyone knows who you are."

author: Rocket Racoon to the prisoners
quote: "Let's make something clear. This one here's our booty! You wanna get to him, you go through us! Or more accurately... We go through you!!"

author: Rocket Raccoon
quote: "You got issues, Quill."

author: Rocket Raccoon
quote: "Aw, what the hell, I don't got that long a lifespan anyway..."

author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal
quote: "Subject 89P13. Calls itself "Rocket." The result of illegal genetic and cybernetic experiments on a lower life form."

author: Groot, Rocket Raccoon, and Star-Lord
quote: "I am Groot.""So what, 'It's better than eleven percent!' What the hell does that have to do with anything?""Thank you, Groot, thank you. See. Groot's the only one of you who has a clue."

author: Rocket and Star-Lord
quote: "There's one more thing we need to complete the plan. That guy's eye...""No! No, we don't. No, we don't need that guy's eye.""No, seriously, I need it! It's important to me."

author: Rocket and Garthan Saal seconds before his death
quote: "Rocket!""Hold on, Saal, just--""Aargh!!!"

author: Rocket and Groot.
quote: "No, Groot... don't do this, you'll die... why are you doing this?""WE are Groot."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Rhomann Dey.
quote: "Your criminal records have also been expunged. However, I have to warn you against breaking any laws in the future.""Question. What if I see something that I wanna take and it belongs to someone else?""Then you will be arrested.""But what if I want it more than the person who has it?""Still illegal.""That doesn't follow. No, I want it more, sir. Do you understand me? What are you laughing at? What? I can't have a discussion with this gentleman?"

author: Peter Quill, Drax, Rocket Raccoon, Gamora, and Groot
quote: "I look around at us, you know what I see? Losers. I mean like, folks who have lost stuff. And we have, man, we have, all of us. Our homes, our families, normal lives. And usually life takes more than it gives, but not today. Today it's giving us something. It is giving us a chance.""To do what?""To give a shit, for once, not run away. I for one am not gonna stand by and watch as Ronan wipes out billions of lives.""But Quill, stopping Ronan, it's impossible. You're asking us to die.""Yeah, I guess I am. I-""Quill. I have lived most my life surrounded by my enemies, I will be grateful to die among my friends.""You are an honorable man, Quill. I will fight beside you. And in the end, see my wife and daughter again.""I am Groot.""What the hell, I ain't got that long of a life span anyway. Now I'm standing, you all happy? We're all standing up now. Bunch of jackasses standing in a circle."

author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal
quote: "Rocket. Wanted on over 50 charges of vehicular theft and escape from lockup."

author: Rocket Raccoon to the Sovereign
quote: "Ya'know, they told me you people were conceded douchebags, but that isn't true at all."

author: Rocket Raccoon to Yondu Udonta
quote: "You maniac! The whole ship is gonna blow!"

author: Rocket Raccoon to Gamora
quote: "Sorry, I can only lose one friend today."

author: Rocket Raccoon
quote: "What was your first choice, Scrotumhead?"

author: Rocket Raccoon
quote: "You people have issues!"

author: Gamora to Groot
quote: "Hey, it'll be just a couple of days. We'll be back before Rocket is finished fixing the ship."

author: Rocket Raccoon, Star-Lord, Drax the Destroyer and Gamora
quote: "You know why I did it, Star-Munch? Hmm?""I'm not gonna answer to "Star-Munch."""I did it because I wanted to! What are we even talking about this for? We just had a little man save us by blowing up fifty ships!""How little?""Well, kinda like this?""A little one-inch man saved us?""Well, if he got closer, I'm sure he'd be much larger.""Yeah, that's how eyesight works, you stupid raccoon.""DON'T CALL ME A RACCOON!""I'm sorry, I took it too far. I meant "trash panda."""Is that better?""I don't know.""It's worse. It's so much worse."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord
quote: "Does anyone got any tape out there? I wanna put some tape over the death button.""Nobody has any tape!""Not a single person has tape?!"You have an Atomic Bomb in your bag. If anyone's gonna have tape, it's you!""That's exactly my point! I have to do everything!"

author: Taserface and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "We'll deliver you to the Kree in the morning! Neither one of you will laugh much longer after that!""Ok Taserface! Hey, tell the other guys we said hi, Taserface!"

author: Taserface, Rocket Raccoon and Nebula
quote: "You're the one who killed those men by leading them down the wrong path because you're weak and stupid! It's time for the Ravagers to rise once again to glory with a new captain: Taserface!""I'm sorry, I'm sorry, your name is, it's Taserface?""That's right.""Do you shoot Tasers out of your face?""It's metaphorical!""For what?""For...It is a name what strikes fear into the hearts of anyone who hears it!""Yeah...Ok, whatever you say.""You shut up, your next! Udonta, I've waited a long time for this... What?""Sorry, I'm so sorry, I just keep imagining you waking up in the morning, looking in the mirror and in all seriousness to yourself saying 'You know what would be a really kick-ass name? Taserface!'. That's how I hear you in my head! What was your second choice? Scrotumhead?""New plan! We're killing you first!""Well, dying is certainly better than living an entire life as a moronic shithead who thinks Taserface is a cool name.""That's enough killing for today!"

author: Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord
quote: "So we're saving the galaxy again?""Yup.""Awesome! We're really gonna be able to jack up our price if we're two-time galaxy savers.""I seriously can’t believe that is where your mind goes.""It was just a random thought, man! I thought we were friends! Of course I care about the planets, and the buildings, and all of the animals on the planets.""And the people.""Meh."

author: Yondu Udonta and Rocket Raccoon
quote: ""I know everything about you. I know you play like you're the meanest in the heart but actually you're the most scared of all.""Shut-up!""I know you steal batteries you don't need and you push away anyone who's wiling to put up with you because just a little bit of love reminds you of how big and empty that hole inside you actually is.""I said shut-up!""I know them scientist what made you never gave a rats ass about you.""I'm serious dude!""Just like my own damn parents who sold me, their own little baby to slavery. I know who you are boy, because you're me.""What kind of a pair are we?""The kind that's about to fight a planet I reckon.""Alright, okay, good that's...wait, fight a what?"

author: Groot and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "I am Groot.""One minute you think someone has a weird shaped head, the next minute just because you realize part of that head is a hat. That's why you don't like hats?""

author: Rocket Raccoon, Groot and Star-Lord
quote: "Alright, first you flick this switch, then this one, that activates it. Then you press this button, which will give you five minutes to get out of there. Now, whatever you do don't push this button, because that will set off the bomb immediately and we will all then be dead. Now, repeat back what I just said.""I am Groot. I am Groot.""That's right.""I am Groot.""NO! That's the button that will kill everyone. Try again.""I am Groot. I am Groot. I am Groot.""NO! That's exactly what you just said! How's that even possible? Which button is the button you're supposed to push? Point to it. NO!""Hey, your making him nervous!""Shut up and give me some tape! Does anyone got any tape out there? I wanna put some tape over the death button.""I don't have any tape, let me check! Yo Yondu, do you have any tape? Gamora, do you have any tape? Hey, ahh, never mind! Drax, do you have any tape? Yeah, Scotch Tape would work! Then why would you ask me if scotch tape would work if you didn't have any? Nobody has any tape!""Not a single person has tape?!""Nope!""Did you ask Nebula?""...Yes!""Are you sure?""Well I asked Yondu and she was sitting right next to him!""I knew you were lying!""You have priceless batteries and an Atomic Bomb in your bag. If anyone's gonna have tape, it's you!""That's exactly the point! I have to do everything!""You are wasting a lot of time here!""We're all gonna die..."

author: Star-Lord, Drax and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "Drax, why aren't you wearing one of Rocket's Aero-Rigs?""It hurts.""Hurts?""I have sensitive nipples.""Wa-ha-ha-ha! My nipples hurt! Oh, goodness me!""What about him, what's he doing?""I'm finishing this so we can listen to tunes while we work.""How is that important?""Blame Quill, he's the one who loves music so much!""No, I actually agree with Drax on this, that's hardly important right now.""Oh, ok, sure Quill""No, seriously, I side with Drax.""I understand that, your being very serious right now.""I can clearly see you winking!""Dam, I'm using my left eye?"

author: Groot and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "I am Groot.""They were not looking at you funny."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord
quote: "The metal's too thick! For the bomb to work, we'll need to place it on Ego's core. And our fat butts aren't going to fit in those tiny holes!""Well...""That's a terrible idea.""Which is the only kind of idea we have left.""Unbelevable. "Rocket, do this, Rocket do that".""What a day."

author: Drax, Gamora, Star-Lord, Rocket Raccoon, Mantis, Nebula, and Groot
quote: "Out of the way, dumber, smaller Groot!""I told you something didn’t feel right!""‘I told you so.’ That’s really what I need right now.""I came back, didn’t I?""Because there’s an unspoken thing.""There is no unspoken thing.""What are you doing? You could have killed us all crashing in here like that!""Uh, ‘Thank you, Rocket’?""We had it under control.""We did not. That is only an extension of his true self. He will be back soon.""What’s Smurfette doing here!?""Back rubs, dishes, killing gods, whatever I need to do to get a damn ride home.""She tried to murder me!""I saved you, you stupid fox.""He’s not a fox.""I am Groot.""I’m not a raboon either!""I am Groot.""‘Raccoon,’ whatever!""How do we kill a Celestial?""There’s the center to him - his brain, his soul, whatever it is, in some sort of shell...""It’s in the caverns below the surface.""Yondu?""If he’s got that fin back, I am so screwed."

author: Rocket Raccoon, Gamora, and Star-Lord
quote: "Why are we doing this again?""It's a distress signal, Rocket. Someone could be dying.""I get that, but why are we doing it?""'Cause we're nice. And maybe whoever it is will give us a little cheddar cheese for our help.""Which isn't the point.""Which isn't the point... I mean… If he doesn't pony up…""We'll take his ship.""B-b-b-bingo!"

author: Rocket Raccoon and Thor
quote: "That place is a legend, they make the most powerful, horrific weapons to ever torment the universe. I would very much like to go there, please.""The rabbit is correct, and clearly the smartest among you!""Rabbit?""I assume you're the captain, sir?""You're very perceptive...""You seem like a noble leader. Would you join me on my quest to Nidavellir?""alright, let me just ask the Captain... oh, wait a second, it's me! Yeah, I'll go.""Wonderful."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Thor
quote: "So, dead brother, huh? Yeah, that could be annoying.""Well, he's been dead before.""And you said that your sister and your dad...""Both dead.""But still got a mom though?""Killed by a dark elf.""A best friend?""Got stabbed through the heart.""Are you sure you're up to this particular murder mission?""Absolutely."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Thor
quote: "Well, if fate does want you to kill that crapsack, you're gonna need more than one stupid eyeball.""What's this?""What's it look like? Some jerk lost a bet with me in Contraxia.""He gave you his eye?""No, he gave me 100 Credits. I snuck into his room later that night and stole his eye.""Thank you, sweet rabbit.""I would've washed that. The only way I could sneak it off Contraxia was on my..."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Winter Soldier
quote: "How much for the gun?""Not for sale.""Okay, how much for the arm? ...Oh, I'll get that arm."

author: Groot and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "I am Groot...""No. No. No. No. No! Groot... No..."

author: Rocket Raccoon to the Avengers
quote: "Okay, who here hasn't been to space? You better not throw up on my ship."

author: Rocket Raccoon to Thor
quote: "I lost the only family I ever had. Quill, Groot, Drax, the chick with the antenna! All gone! I get that you miss your mom. But she's gone. Really gone. And there are plenty of people who are only kinda gone. And you can help them."

author: Rocket Raccoon
quote: "Oh, yeah!"

author: Roger Dooley and Peggy Carter
quote: "Agent Carter, we just pulled a red ball out of D.C. All hands on deck. Meaning cover the phones.""Rose, redirect all calls to the briefing room. Covered. Shall we?"

author: Peggy Carter and Roger Dooley
quote: "I wonder if I might request a sick day.""What's the matter? Got a headache?""Amongst other things. Ladies' things.""Oh, geez. Yeah, sure, take the day. Go shopping, whatever makes you feel better.""Thank you for your understanding."

author: Roger Dooley and Peggy Carter
quote: "Carter. Come here for a second. C'mere. C'mere. C'mere. Settle a bet for us. Is that Joe DiMaggio?""I don't follow boxing."

author: Roger Dooley and Peggy Carter
quote: "Agent Carter...""Miss Carter; I don't work here anymore."

author: Roger Dooley and Peggy Carter
quote: "Promise you'll get the son of a bitch who did this. Say it!""We'll catch him.""Attagirl."

author: Ronan the Accuser
quote: "I promised Thanos I would retrieve the Orb for him only then will he destroy Xandar for me."

author: Ronan the Accuser to Drax the Destroyer
quote: "I don’t recall killing your family.  I doubt I’ll remember killing you either."

author: Ronan the Accuser to Drax the Destroyer
quote: "I was mistaken. I do remember your family. Their screams were pitiful and..."

author: Ronan the Accuser
quote: "Xandar, you stand accused. Your wretched peace treaty will not save you. It will be the tinder on which you burn!"

author: The Broker about Ronan
quote: "A Kree fanatic, outraged by the peace treaty, who will not rest until Xandarian culture, my culture, is wiped from existence!"

author: Drax the Destroyer to Moloka Dar
quote: "Ronan murdered my wife, Ovette, and my daughter, Kamaria. He slaughtered them where they stood. And he laughed! Her life is not yours to take. He killed my family, I shall kill one of his in return."

author: Nebula to Ronan the Accuser
quote: "This is one fight you won't win."

author: Ronan the Accuser and Nova Corps Soldier.
quote: "They call me terrorist. Radical. Zealot. Because I obey the ancient laws of my people the Kree and punish those who do not. Because I do not forgive your people for taking the life of my father and his father and his father before him. A thousand years of war between us will not be forgotten.""You can’t do this. Our governments signed a peace treaty.""My government knows no shame. You Xandarians and your culture are a disease.""You will never rule Xandar.""No... I will cure it!"

author: Ronan the Accuser argues with The Other before being killed by him.
quote: "With all due respect, Thanos, your daughter made this mess, and yet you summon me?""I would lower my voice, Accuser!""First, she lost a battle to some primitive.""Thanos had put Gamora under your charge!""Then she was apprehended by the Nova Corps.""You are the one, here, with nothing to show for him!""Your sources say she was meant to betray us the whole time.""Lower your tone! I may be your..."

author: Ronan the Accuser and Thanos
quote: "I only ask that you take this matter seriously.""The only matter I do not take seriously, boy, is you. Your politics bore me. Your demeanor is that of a pouty child. And apparently, you alienated my favorite daughter, Gamora. I shall honor our agreement, Kree, if you bring me the Orb. But return to me again empty handed again... and I will bathe the starways in your blood."

author: Thanos, Korath the Pursuer and Ronan the Accuser
quote: "BOY! I would reconsider your current course!""Master! You cannot! Thanos is the most powerful being in the universe!""(To Korath) Not anymore." (To Thanos) "YOU CALL ME "BOY"?! I will unfurl one thousand years of Kree justice on Xandar AND BURN IT TO ITS CORE!! Then, Thanos, I'm coming for you!"

author: Ronan the Accuser and Star-Lord
quote: "People of Xandar, the time has come to rejoice and renounce your paltry gods! Your salvation is at hand!""Ooh, child, things are gonna get easier. Ooh child, things will get brighter. You listen to these words. Ooh child, things are gonna get easier. Ooh child, things'll get brighter. Then bring it down hard! Someday...""What are you doing?""Dance-off, bro. Me and you. Gamora... Subtle, taking it back.""What are you doing?""I'm distracting you, you big turd blossom!"

author: Ronan the Accuser and Star-Lord
quote: "You're mortal! How...""You said it yourself, bitch. We're the Guardians of the Galaxy."

author: Ego, Gamora, Star-Lord and Drax the Destroyer
quote: "A memorial to the War Over Xandar, when you single-handedly saved the galaxy.""Single-handedly?""Whoa. It’s perfect.""You’ve got to be kidding.""Why am I dead? Why did you all kill me?!""That’s Ronan. That’s you."

author: Nebula and Gamora
quote: "Here you stand, a hero, a Garden of the Galaxy!""A what? It's ‘Guardians of the Galaxy.’""Oh.""Why would we be ‘the Gardens of the Galaxy’?""I don’t know. I thought it was stupid.""Yeah, it would be.""It’s still wordy.""I wasn’t the one who thought of it."

author: Ronan and an Accuser
quote: "We'll be back for the weapon.""The core?""The woman."

author: Yon-Rogg, Ronan and Korath
quote: "Ronan.""The Accusers completes their operation... but the greater mission was a failure, thanks to your team."It was a trap to lure our operative Vers to Torfa and kidnap her.""Give is their location. We'll take care of the terrorist threat.""By bombing them out of the galaxy? No, we'll handle this.""A cell of Skrulls everywhere is a threat to Kree everywhere. Where are they?""They are...""Lost. They are lost for now. But we will find them.""Do so, or we will."

author: Thanos and Gamora
quote: "Ronan's located the Power Stone, I'm dispatching you onto his ship.""He won't like that.""The alternative is death. Ronan's obsession clouds his judgement.""

author: Samantha Reyes to Foggy Nelson
quote: "I'll say this once Mr. Nelson. If, god willing, your firm doesn't collapse under the weight of the chickens and the fruit baskets you've been collecting from your clientele, there will come a time when you need to ask a favor of the District Attorney's Office, and depending on how this situation resolves, that favor will either be forthcoming, or permanently withheld. Am I making myself clear?"

author: Karen Page and Foggy Nelson
quote: "That's Reyes?""In all her Defense Attorney destroying glory."

author: Blake Tower and Foggy Nelson
quote: "We need all your files in the Grote case, notes, interviews, any and all recordings and emails.""And in return we get?""I convince District Attorney Reyes to scratch the names Nelson and Murdock off her shit list."

author: Marci Stahl and Foggy Nelson
quote: "Rumors among my new partners? Reyes has her sights on the mayor's office.""This is my shocked face."

author: Samantha Reyes
quote: "Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, Frank Castle brutally tortured and murdered thirty people, thirty that we know of, he took the law into his own hands, acted as judge, jury and most violent executioner, and you will hear that the defendant's victims were criminals but the victims are not on trial here today and justice does not belong in the hands of a man like Frank Castle, this isn't the Wild West. Justice is served here in a court of law, and it is up to each of you to take back the city from lawless vigilantes like Frank Castle. This man is no hero, he's a serial killer, and he is guilty."

author: Samuel Sterns
quote: "This will be a somewhat novel sensation. We have begun. The dialysis machine will mix the antidote with your blood. Except the antidote will only take hold once we've achieved a full reaction. Just relax. Okay. We are comprehensive. Here you go. All right. We set to pop?"

author: Samuel Sterns
quote: "We could get the Nobel for this!"

author: Samuel Sterns
quote: "Just the three of us, this is Promethean fire!"

author: Samuel Sterns and Bruce Banner
quote: "We started on rats and mice, but it just completely fried them, so we had to go bigger. And we still don't know which is more toxic, the gamma or your blood.""What do you mean, my blood?""Bruce, this is all you. You didn't send me much to work with, so I had to concentrate it and make more. With a little more trial and error, there's no end to what we can do! This is potentially Olympian! This gamma technology has limitless applications. We'll unlock hundreds of cures. We will make humans impervious to disease!"

author: Kathleen Sparr and Samuel Sterns
quote: "Are you telling me you can make more like him?""No! Not yet. I sorted out a few pieces, but it's not like I can put together the same Humpty Dumpty, if that's what you're asking. He was a freak accident! The goal is to do it better!"

author: Bruce Banner and Samuel Sterns
quote: "You should know that there is a flip side to this too. If we miss on the low side, if we induce me and it fails, this will be very dangerous for you.""Ha-ha-ha. Look, I've always been more curious then cautious and that's served me pretty well, so are we gonna do this?"

movie: The Avengers Prelude: Fury's Big Week
author: Natasha Romanoff and Samuel Sterns
quote: "Dr. Samuel Sterns?""I think perhaps once I was...but shall now become much more."

movie: The Avengers Prelude: Fury's Big Week
author: Samuel Sterns to Natasha Romanoff
quote: "I see my future unfolding. It is an illustrious future defined by power and influence. A future that begins this very instant."

author: Fox and Sarge
quote: "You're... you're from S.H.I.E.L.D.""Never heard of it."

author: Sarge to Dana
quote: "People fantasize about doing something heroic in times like these, but I'd save your own skin."

author: Sarge and Pax
quote: "You can tell a lot about a world by its currency. What have we got?""Paper. With faces on it.""Great. One of those."

author: Sarge and Pax
quote: "See? You were right, Pax. This rock has it all. Now, are you good to come with me, secure the exit while these two scout the site? Or should we discuss that, too?""No. I'm good. I'm just I'm sorting through it. Tinker died. He was a friend.""That's what friends are for."

author: Pax and Sarge
quote: "You know, why not take a breath here? This place has sugar water, blue sky. Maybe kick back before it's reduced to ash.""Sounds like powering down.""Or charging up, right? I mean, didn't you ever take a load off back in your home turf, your past life or whatever?"

author: Sarge and Dana
quote: "Right now, you're sizing me up, wondering how much paper money a guy like me has to spend. Could be a big sale. Your heart rate goes up a little. Can you feel it?""We always do our best to meet our customers' needs.""Oh, don't worry about me. I'll be leaving satisfied. Worry about you, your heart rate, because it's about to go nuts when we rob this place."

author: Sarge to Harold Simcoe
quote: "I've been looking all over for you."

author: Sarge to Deke Shaw
quote: "You're a real talker, but you're not from here and you shouldn't be here, so I got to take you and make you sing."

author: Sarge to Melinda May
quote: "I've been to a lot of worlds. Some good, some garbage. But I've never been to one where people recognize my face."

author: Sarge and Melinda May
quote: "The Shrike are cancer. I'm going to make sure this is the last planet they ever infect.""How do you plan to do that?""To stop the spread, you cut off the limb. When their creator arrives, I'm going to burn it all down."

author: Sarge and Alphonso Mackenzie
quote: "I'm prepared to protect my people from whatever's coming.""You're people? They keep looking at me. Might want to get used to that.""And why's that?""Because by the end of the day, I'll be the one in charge."

author: Sarge to Daisy Johnson
quote: "Your world is about to be destroyed. The only two questions that matter are how to stop the monster and how to survive if we fail. She's coming."

author: Sarge to Jaco and Pax
quote: "Jaco and I will take the bridge. Pax, you lock down the engine bays. Then we get this ship out of here before the warhead blows."

author: Sarge to Snowflake as he returned to his cell
quote: "It wasn't personal Snow."

author: Izel and Sarge
quote: "This host silenced most of who you are. But you still remember my name like it's a song in your head. You remember your name, too.""Pachakutiq."

author: Sarge and Daisy Johnson
quote: "I can feel the rage churning underneath my skin.""Use it. Let the anger out.""I don't want to. I want it gone."

author: Wolfgang von Strucker about Wanda and Pietro Maximoff
quote: "There's nothing more horrifying than a miracle!"

author: Wanda Maximoff to Steve Rogers, referencing Tony Stark
quote: "Ultron can't see the difference between saving the world and destroying it. Where do you think he gets that from?"

author: Scarlet Witch to the people of Sokovia
quote: "Get off the bridge! Run!"

author: Doctor List to Baron Wolfgang von Strucker
quote: "Let's show them what we have accomplished. Send out the twins."

author: Steve Rogers and Maria Hill
quote: "The two enhanced?""Wanda and Pietro Maximoff. Twins. Orphaned at ten when a shell collapsed their apartment building. Sokovia's had a rough history. It's nowhere special but it's on the way to everywhere special.""Their abilities?""He's got increased metabolism and improved thermal homeostasis. Her thing is neural electric interfacing, telekinesis, mental manipulation. He's fast and she's weird.""Well, they're going to show up again.""Agreed. File says they volunteered for Strucker's experiments. It's nuts.""Right. What kind of monster would let a German scientist experiment on them to protect their country?""We're not at war, Captain.""They are."

author: Ultron to Quicksilver and Scarlet Witch
quote: "I wondered why only you two survived Strucker's experiments. Now I don't. We will make it right. You and I can hurt them. But you will tear them apart... from the inside."

author: Maria Hill and Steve Rogers
quote: "He's all over the globe. Robotics labs, weapons facilities, jet propulsion labs. Reports of a metal man, or men, coming in and emptying the place.""Fatalities?""Only when engaged. Mostly guys left in a fugue state going on about old memories, worst fears, and "something too fast to see".""Maximoffs. That makes sense he'd go to them. They have someone in common.""Not anymore."

author: Ultron to Scarlet Witch
quote: "It's time for some mind games."

author: Thor to Captain America
quote: "The girl tried to warp my mind. Take special care. I doubt a human could keep her at bay. Fortunately, I am mighty."

author: Iron Man to the Hulk
quote: "Are you listening to me? That little witch is messing with your mind. You're stronger than her. You're smarter than her. You're Bruce Banner."

author: Steve Rogers and Tony Stark
quote: "Sometimes my teammates don't tell me things. I was kind of hoping Thor would be the exception.""Yeah, give him time. We don't know what the Maximoff kid showed him."

author: Tony Stark and Nick Fury
quote: "I saw them all dead, Nick. I felt it. The whole world, too. Because of me. I wasn't ready. I didn't do all I could.""Maximoff girl, she's working you, Stark. Playing on your fear.""I wasn't tricked, I was shown. Wasn't a nightmare, it was my legacy. The end of the path I started us on."

author: Ultron and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "You're wondering why you can't look inside my head.""Sometimes it's hard, but sooner or later every man shows himself."

author: Scarlet Witch to Ultron
quote: "We wait for two days for Tony Stark to kill us."

author: Ulysses Klaue and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "I’m afraid that I’m not that afraid.""Everybody’s afraid of something."

author: Pietro Maximoff and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "I’m gonna kill him. I’ll be right back.""No. I’m over it. I want… I want to finish the plan. I want the big one."

author: Wanda Maximoff and Ultron
quote: "You said we would destroy the Avengers. Make a better world.""It will be better.""When everyone is dead?"

author: Ultron and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "Please. Don't do this.""What choice do we have?"

author: Wanda Maximoff and Bruce Banner
quote: "I know you're angry.""No, we're way past that. I could choke the life out of you and never change a shade."

author: Wanda Maximoff and Vision
quote: "I looked in your head and saw annihilation.""Look again."

author: Scarlet Witch and Hawkeye
quote: "H-How could I let this happen?! This is all our fault!""Hey, look at me. It’s your fault, it’s everyone’s fault, who cares. Are you up for this?"

author: Hawkeye and Scarlet Witch
quote: "What about the core?""I'll protect it. It's my job."

author: Scarlet Witch and Quicksilver
quote: "Get the people on the boats.""I'm not going to leave you.""I can handle these. Come back for me when everyone else is off, not before. You understand?""You know, I'm 12 minutes older than you.""Go."

author: Ultron and Scarlet Witch
quote: "Wanda. If you stay here, you'll die.""I just did. Do you know how it felt? It felt like that..."

author: Scarlet Witch
quote: "You guys know I can move things with my mind, right?"

author: Scarlet Witch to Hawkeye
quote: "You were pulling your punches."

author: Steve Rogers and Tony Stark
quote: "Wanda? What about Wanda?""She's fine. She's confined in a compound currently. Vision's keeping her company.""Oh God, Tony! Every time. Every time I think you're seeing things the right way...""It's a 100 acres with a lap pool. It's got a screening room. There's worse way to protect people. She's not a U.S. Citizen and they don't grant visas to Weapons of Mass Destruction.""Protection? Is that how you see this? This is protection? It's internment, Tony. Come on, she's a kid!"

author: Vision and Hawkeye
quote: "Clint, You can't overpower me.""I know I can't. But she can."

author: Vision and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "Wanda.""Hmm?""No one dislikes you, Wanda.""...Thanks.""Oh, you're welcome. No. It's a... involuntary response in their amygdala they can't help but be afraid of you.""Are you?""My amygdala is synthetic, so...""I used to think of myself one way. But, after this. I am something else. And still me, I think. But... that's not what everyone else sees."

author: Scarlet Witch and Hawkeye
quote: "Oh my god. What are you doing here?""Disappointing my kids. I'm suppose to go water skiing."

author: Vision and Scarlet Witch
quote: "If you do this, they will never stop being afraid of you.""I can't control their fear, only my own."

author: Steve Rogers and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "Thanks for having my back.""It was time to get off my ass."

author: Iron Man and Scarlet Witch
quote: "Wanda, I think you hurt Vision's feelings.""You locked me in my room.""Okay. First, that's an exaggeration. Second, I did it to protect you."

author: Okoye
quote: "Why was she up there all this time?"

author: Proxima Midnight and Black Widow
quote: "He'll die alone. As will you.""She's not alone."

author: Vision to Scarlet Witch
quote: "It's alright. I love you."

author: Wanda Maximoff and Vision
quote: "Vis? Is it the stone again?""It's as if it's speaking to me.""What does it say?""I don't... I don't know. Something... Tell me what you feel.""I just feel you."

author: Vision and Scarlet Witch
quote: "Wanda, it's time.""No.""They can't stop him, Wanda, but we can. Look at me. You have the power to destroy the stone.""Don't.""You must do it. Wanda, please... We are out of time.""I can't.""Yes, you can. You can. If he gets this stone, half the universe dies. It's not fair. It shouldn't be you, but it is. It's all right. You could never hurt me... I just feel you."

author: Thanos and Scarlet Witch
quote: "I understand, my child. Better than anyone.""You could never.""Today, I lost more than you can know. But now is no time to mourn. Now... is no time at all."

author: Wanda makes it personal with Thanos during the Battle of Earth
quote: "You took everything from me.""I don't even know who you are.""You will."

author: Spider-Man gets acquainted with Captain Marvel while Scarlet Witch and Okoye assure him she has assistance getting the Nano Gauntlet to Luis' Van
quote: "Hi. I'm Peter Parker.""Hey, Peter Parker. You got something for me?""I don't know how you're gonna get it through all that.""Don't worry.""She's got help."

author: Wanda assures Clint that Natasha knows the Avengers beat Thanos
quote: "I just wish there was a way to let her know. To tell her that we won. That we did it.""She knows. They both do."

author: List
quote: "No one has made it past this stage of our experiments with alien enhancement. Well, no one other than the twins, of course."

movie: Avengers: Age of Ultron Prelude - This Scepter'd Isle
author: Pietro Maximoff to Wanda Maximoff
quote: "Be strong, sister. It won't be long before we have the power we need to fight."

author: Chan Ho Yin
quote: "我祖父常说每个人都是谜。有些人怀有美丽的秘密。另一些则隐藏深色的。他认为, 了解一个人真正本性的唯一方法就是刺穿他的外壳, 凝视内在。[1]"

author: Melinda May, Quan Chen, Phil Coulson, Jemma Simmons and Grant Ward
quote: "Everyone, this is Agent Quan, Chan Ho Yin's case agent. What can you tell us?""Not much, I'm afraid. Chan is a magician, so at first, I thought he'd made himself disappear.""File said you caught him violating his Index agreement before.""On two separate occasions. Claimed we were "hampering his artistic expression". But late last night, he was taken by professionals. The only thing they left behind was this scrap of aluminized material.""Fireproof clothing.""So whoever took him knew about his power.""Yes, and we think we know why. Over the last few days, Tech division discovered a crack into our data stream. It's the same cyber punks who hacked us before. Somehow, they got in again. It's the Rising Tide. Hello? It got real quiet. You guys still there?"

author: Debbie and Raina
quote: "I'm surprised you got him to cooperate.""He has dreams. I told him they'd come true.""You gave him a name, didn't you?"

author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
quote: "His file didn't say anything about him being psychotic, did it?""No. It just said he was kind of a tool."

author: Phil Coulson
quote: "Mr. Yin, we don't want to hurt you... but we have to."

author: Raina and Chan Ho Yin
quote: "I apologize for last night. It was important I bring you in under the radar.""Ah, S.H.I.E.L.D.. Tell Agent Quan I don't need to be read the power protocols again. It was just a street performance. It's not like I set anyone on fire.""I don't work for S.H.I.E.L.D.. I come as a friend.""English isn't my first language; but that word means something different than you think."

author: Scorch and Raina
