No.""You are in distress.""No. Yes?""If you will just allow me to contact Mr. Stark.""Why do you call him a "sir?"""I believe your intentions to be hostile.""Shhhh! I'm here to help."

author: Ultron, Steve Rogers and Tony Stark
quote: "No, how could you be worthy? You're all killers.""Stark.""J.A.R.V.I.S."I'm sorry, I was asleep. Or... I was a dream?""Reboot. Legionnaire 06's got a buggy suit.""There was this... terrible noise... and I was tangled in... in... strings. Had to kill the other guy. He was a good guy.""You killed someone?""Wouldn't've been my first call. But, down in the real world, we're faced with ugly choices."

author: Bruce Banner and Ultron
quote: "Ultron?""In the flesh."

author: Ultron and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "Did you know this church is in the exact center of the city. The Elders decreed it so that everyone could be... equally close to God. I like that, the geometry of belief. You're wondering why you can't look inside my head.""Sometimes it's hard. But sooner or later every man shows himself.""Oh, I'm sure they do. But you needed something more than a man. That's why you let Stark take the Scepter.""I didn't expect... But I saw Stark's fear. I knew it would control him, make him self-destruct.""Everyone creates the thing they dread. Men of peace create engines of war. Invaders create Avengers. People create... smaller people? Er... children! I lost the word there. Children. Designed to supplant them. To help them... end.""Is that why you've come? To end the Avengers?""I've come to save the world, but also... yeah."

author: Ultron and Helen Cho
quote: "Scream, and your entire staff dies. I could have killed you, Helen, the night we met, I didn't.""Do you expect a thank you note?""I expect you to know why.""The cradle.""This is the next me.""The Regeneration Cradle prints tissue. It can't build a living body.""It can. You can. You lack the material. You're a brilliant woman, Helen. But we all have room to improve."

author: Ultron, Wanda Maximoff, and Pietro Maximoff
quote: "How could you?!""How could I "what?"""You said we would destroy the Avengers! Make a better world!""It will be better.""When everyone is dead?""That is not-! The human race will have every opportunity to improve.""And if they don't?""Ask Noah.""You're a madman.""There were over a dozen extinction level events before even the dinosaurs got theirs! When the Earth starts to settle, God throws a stone at it. And believe me, He's winding up. We have to evolve. There's no room for the weak.""And who decides who's weak?""Life. *chuckles* Life always decides."

author: Ultron and Iron Man
quote: "Come to confess your sins?""I don't know. How much time you got?""More than you.""Uh, Have you been juicing? Little Vibranium cocktail? You're looking... I don't wanna say "puffy"."

author: Thor, Captain America, Ultron and Iron Man
quote: "Is that the best you can do?""You had to ask.""This is the best I can do. This is exactly what I wanted. All of you, against all of me. How can you possibly hope to stop me?""Like the old man said; together."

author: Ultron and Scarlet Witch
quote: "Please, don't do this.""What choice do we have?!"

author: Tony Stark to Steve Rogers
quote: "Few years ago, I almost lost her, so I trashed all my suits. Then, we had to muck up HYDRA. And then Ultron, my fault. And then, and then, and then. I never stopped. 'Cause the truth is, I don't wanna stop."

author: Thor to a skeleton
quote: "Now, I know what you're thinking. "Oh, no! Thor's in a cage. How did this happen?" Well, sometimes you have to get captured just to get a straight answer out of somebody. It's a long story, but basically, I'm a bit of a hero. See, I spent some time on Earth... Fought some robots, saved the planet a couple of times. Then I went searching through the cosmos for some magic, colorful Infinity Stone things. Didn't find any. That's when I came across a path of death and destruction, which led me all the way here into this cage, where I met you."

author: Thor, Bruce Banner,, Quinjet
quote: "And what about Sokovia?""Sokovia?""The city, Sokovia. Did we save it?""Banner, listen.""What?""Sokovia. Ultron. That was two years ago."

author: Bruce Banner to Vision
quote: "Because you might have a choice. Your mind is made up of a complex construct of overlays. J.A.R.V.I.S., Ultron, Tony, me, the Stone. All of them mixed together. All of them learning from one another."

author: Tony Stark and Steve Rogers
quote: "Otherwise what we needed was a suit of armor around the world! Remember that? Whether it impacted our precious freedom or not- that's what we needed!""Well, that didn't work out, did it?"

author: Raina to Jiaying
quote: "Consequences are upon us. Men made of metal will tear our cities apart. And the world will be changed forever."

author: Robert Gonzales to Phil Coulson
quote: "It's hard to argue with a man who prevented Ultron from killing thousands of people. But there are plenty more battles to be won, and one closer to home that I fear the Helicarrier won't solve."

author: Robert Gonzales to Phil Coulson
quote: "Ultron was created because people were too close to Tony Stark. They were blinded by his charm. They trusted him. Never even thought to look at what he was working on. And the Avengers, they let one man do whatever he wanted, and the world was almost destroyed for it."

author: Phil Coulson and Felix Blake
quote: "We both know S.H.I.E.L.D. protects mankind.""And what has S.H.I.E.L.D. done in the name of protection? We brought the Chitauri to Earth. I was taken out by one of your cybernetic recruits. And the latest and greatest idea? The Avengers created Ultron."

author: Leo Fitz and Holden Radcliffe
quote: "This could be very dangerous. So much could go wrong.""Ultron, yes. I know. But this is not A.I.. A.I. is banned, and that's good. This is mimicry of human behavior.""Still, in the wrong hands, this could be used as a weapon. Is that the idea?""No, absolutely not. No Look, I know the dangers. That's why I've been I've been reticent to divulge. I don't know these new people at S.H.I.E.L.D. But a weapon is absolutely not the idea."

author: Phil Coulson, Jeffrey Mace and Melinda May
quote: "Aida's an android.""She's-- What did you just say?""An android.""Had me fooled too.""Well, that's... Okay, I mean, forget about the fact that I was mildly attracted to her, that totally goes against the Sokovia Accords. Doesn't anyone remember Ultron?"

author: WHiH News Ticker
quote: "Multiple countries recovering from catastrophic damage caused by sentient robot Ultron, leaders asking for aid, and for the Avengers to be held accountable."

author: Ulysses Klaue
quote: "Don't tell me your man swindled you; I sent you six short range heat-seekers and got a boat full of rusty parts. Now you will make it right or the next missile I send you will come very much faster... Now Minister, where were we?"

author: Ulysses Klaue to Pietro and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "So if you're going to fiddle with my brain and make me see a giant cuttlefish, then I know you don't do business and I know you're not in charge, and I only deal with the man in charge."

author: Scarlet Witch, Ulysses Klaue and Ultron
quote: "Everybody's afraid of something.""Cuttlefish! Deep sea fish, they make lights, disco lights, whomp, whomp, whomp, to hypnotize their prey, and then whomp! I saw a documentary; it was terrifying. So, if you're going to fiddle with my brain, and make me see a giant Cuttlefish, then I know you don't do business and I know you're not in charge and I only deal with the man in charge!""There is no MAN in charge... Let's talk business."

author: Ultron and Ulysses Klaue
quote: "Upon this rock I will build my church. Vibranium.""You know, it came at great personal cost. It’s worth billions.""Now, so are you. It’s all under your dummy holdings? Finances are so weird. But I always say, "Keep your friends and your enemies rich, and wait to find out which is which."""Stark...""What?""Tony Stark used to say that... to me. You're one of his.""What? I'm not... I'm not! You think I'm one of Stark's puppets, his hollow men? I mean, look at me, do I look like Iron Man? Stark is not...I'm sorry. I am sorry... Ooh! I'm sure that's going to be okay. I'm sorry, it's just I don't understand... Don't compare me with Stark! He's a sickness!"

author: Ulysses Klaue and Klaue's Mercenary
quote: "Shoot them!""Which ones?""All of them!"

author: Ulysses Klaue
quote: "I made it rain!"

author: Ulysses Klaue
quote: "Let's have some fun!"

author: Ulysses Klaue
quote: "I can see you!"

author: Okoye, T'Challa, Tribe Elder and W'Kabi
quote: "Ulysses Klaue plans to sell the Vibranium to an American buyer in South Korea tomorrow night.""Klaue has escaped our pursuits for almost thirty years. Not capturing him is perhaps my father's greatest regret. I wish to bring Klaue back here to stand trial.""Wakanda does not need a warrior right now. We need a king.""My parents were killed when he attacked, not a day goes by when I do not think about what Klaue took from us, from me.""It's to great an opportunity to pass.""Take me with you, we will take him down together side by side.""I need you here, protecting the border.""Then I ask, you kill him where he stands, or you bring I'm back to us.""You have my word, I will bring him back."

author: Okoye
quote: "A man showed up at the border who claims to have killed Klaue!"

author: Ulysses Klaue and Erik Killmonger
quote: "Hey, come here! Come here, come here! It's okay. You can go, but just don't tell anyone, alright?""Bro, why didn't you just shoot him right here?""Because it's better to leave the crime scene more spread out. Makes us look like amateurs. Now then, let's see if you know what you're talking about. That's just a taste. Oh, were going to be rich boy.""Better sell that quick.""It's already sold.""Whatever you try, the Wakandans will probably show up.""That'll make my day. Kill two birds with one stone. You're not telling me that that's Vibranium, too, are you?""Nah, I'm just feeling it."

author: Everett Ross and Ulysses Klaue
quote: "Well, you brought quite the entourage. Do you have a mixtape coming out?""Oh yeah, I'll actually send you a link."

author: Ulysses Klaue and Everett Ross
quote: "Tell me something. What do you know about Wakanda?""It's a third world country. Textiles, shepherds, cool outfits.""All a front. Explorers have searched for it. Called it El Dorado. They looked for it in South America, but it was in Africa the whole time. I'm the only who's seen it... and made it out alive."

author: Ulysses Klaue
quote: "Wakanda. Explorers have searched for it for centuries. The Golden City. It's a technological marvel."

author: Everett Ross and Ulysses Klaue
quote: "My intel reports that the chunk of Vibranium you took was all that Wakanda had.""I took that chunk of vibranium out of a mountain of the stuff!"

author: Erik Killmonger, Ulysses Klaue and Linda
quote: "You sell to the CIA?""I sell to the highest bidder. Don't you worry, when I get back to Johannesburg, I'll lay low for a bit. I'll make sure you guys get payed.""I won't worry about the money bro, I know your good for it. On our way back, just drop us off at Wakanda.""You don't want to go there boy.""Yeah, I do.""Drop it! Or your little Bonny and Clyde routine ends today! Put your gun down now!""Sorry, I'm sorry Erik...""It'll be okay.""You...you want to go to Wakanda? They're savages! This is what they do to people like us.""I don't worry about no brand. Check these out. Each one is for a kill.""You can scar yourself as much as you like. To them, you'll just be an outsider. Your crazy to think that you can just walk in there. Ahh...and to think I saw you as a crazy American."

author: Valkyrie and Thor
quote: "This is Scrapper 142. I need clearance and an audience with the boss. I’ve got something special.""Hey! Where are you taking me? Answer me! Hey! I am Thor, son of Odin. I need to get back to Asgard.""Many apologies, your majesty."

author: Grandmaster and Valkyrie
quote: "What have you brought me today? Tell me.""A contender.""I want to go closer, I need to get a closer look at this!"

author: Thor and Valkyrie
quote: "You’ll pay for this!""No, I got paid for this."

author: Thor, Valkyrie and Sakaaran Warden
quote: "Hey! Hey! Do not zap me with that thing. I just wanna talk. Asgard is in danger. My God, you’re a Valkyrie. I used to wanna be a Valkyrie when I was younger...until I found out that you were all women. There’s nothing wrong with women, of course. I love women. Sometimes a little too much. Not in a creepy way, just more of a respectful appreciation. I think it’s great that there is an elite force of women warriors. It’s about time.""Are you done?""Lord of Thunder, you’re up.""Please, help me. I need your help.""Bye.""Fine, then you must be a traitor or a coward because the Valkyrie are sworn to protect the throne.""Listen closely, your majesty. This is Sakaar, not Asgard. And I’m a scrapper, not a Valkyrie.""Bring him in for processing!""And no one escapes this place. So you’re gonna die anyway."

author: Valkyrie, Thor and Hulk
quote: "All right. Here’s the deal. I’ll listen to you till this is empty.""Asgard is in danger and people are dying. We need to get back there. I need your help...wow.""Finished. Bye.""Odin is dead. Hela, the Goddess of Death has invaded Asgard.""If Hela’s back then Asgard is already lost.""I’m going to stop her.""Alone?""Nope. I’m putting together a team. It’s me, you, and the big guy.""No team. Only Hulk.""It’s me and you.""I think it’s only you.""Wait. Just listen. The Valkyrie are legend, elite warriors of Asgard. You are sworn to defend the throne.""I’m not getting dragged into another one of Odin’s family squabbles.""What’s that supposed to mean?""Your sister. Her power comes from Asgard, same as yours. When it grew beyond Odin’s control, she massacred everyone in the palace and tried to seize the throne. When she tried to escape her banishment, he sent the Valkyrie in to fight her back. I only survived because...Look, I already faced her once back when I believed in the throne, and it cost me everything. That's what’s wrong with Asgard. The throne, the secrets, the whole golden sham.""I agree.""Don’t get familiar.""I agree.""That’s why I turned down the throne. But this isn’t about the crown. This is about the people. They’re dying and they’re you’re people, too.""Forget it. I have.""Okay.""Okay.""Good. Great.""Great.""Thank you.""For what?""For this. Didn’t see that did you? There... that’s better. You know, go ahead. Stay here and get drunk and enslave people for that lunatic. Keep drinking. Keep hiding. But me...I choose to run toward my problems and not away from them. Because that’s what...Because that’s what heroes do.""Friend, Stay!"

author: Loki and Valkyrie
quote: "What have you done!?""I don’t answer to you, lackey.""It’s Loki. And you will answer to the Grandmaster. Why would you help my brother escape with that green fool?""I don’t help anyone.""You’re a Valkyrie. I thought the Valkyrie all died gruesome deaths?""Choose your next words wisely.""Terribly sorry. Must be a very painful memory..."

author: Valkyrie and Thor
quote: "I've spent years, in a haze, trying to forget my past. Sakaar seemed like the best place to drink, and to forget, and to die. One day.""Well, I was thinking that you drink too much and it was probably gonna kill you.""I don't plan to stop drinking. But... I don't wanna forget. I can't turn away anymore. So... if I'm gonna die, well... it might as well be driving my sword through the heart of that murderous hag."

author: Valkyrie, Hulk, and Rocket Raccoon
quote: "You shouldn't have come!"Ah, Valkyrie! Great to see you, Angry Girl."I think I liked you better either of the other ways."This is Rocket."How you doin'?"He won't see you."That bad, huh?"We only see him once a month, when he comes for... supplies."It's that bad."Yeah."

author: Captain America and Valkyrie
quote: "Anyone see an ugly brown van out there?""Yes. But you're not going to like where it's parked."

author: Valkyrie and Thor
quote: "So, when can we expect you back?"Um, about that."Thor. Your people need a king."No, they already got one."That's funny. You're being serious?"It's time for me to be who I am rather than who I'm supposed to be. But you, you're a leader. That's who you are."You know I'd make a lot of changes around here."I'm counting on it, Your Majesty."What will you do?"I'm not sure. For the first time in a thousand years, I have no path. I do have a ride though."

author: Victoria Hand
quote: "You need to trust the system, Agent Coulson."

author: Jasper Sitwell and Phil Coulson
quote: "So you know her?""Only her reputation."

author: Victoria Hand and Phil Coulson
quote: "Agent Hand.""Agent Coulson. Nice to finally put a face to the name.""Likewise."

author: Victoria Hand and Phil Coulson
quote: "Seems Fury has a soft spot for his favorites. Not everyone gets sent to Tahiti.""It's a magical... place."

author: Victoria Hand
quote: "Mr. Vanchat. We were hoping you could help us find a friend."

author: Victoria Hand
quote: "No single agent is that important."

author: Victoria Hand and Grant Ward
quote: "No single agent is that important.""Coulson is."

author: Victoria Hand and Melinda May
quote: "You supported my decision to throw Skye off the Bus.""Seems like it worked out.""Seems like you played me."

author: Victoria Hand
quote: "When that plane touches down, take out everyone on board. Except Agent Coulson...he's mine."

author: Victoria Hand and John Garrett
quote: "This shouldn't have happened. Back-up should have been there alongside Agents Blake and May.""The Clairvoyant would have seen us coming.""It appears he did anyway, the plan was flawed from the start."

author: Victoria Hand to Jemma Simmons
quote: "The worst thing you can do right now is to underestimate HYDRA. They hide in plain sight. They earn our trust, our sympathy. They make us like them. And when you hesitate, they strike. If we're to survive, we must learn to strike first."

author: Victoria Hand
quote: "HYDRA won't show mercy. Neither can we."

author: Victoria Hand's last words
quote: "What do you think, Agent Ward? You shot the wrong Clairvoyant before. Care to shoot the right one?"

author: John Garrett
quote: "I was stationed with Vic in Lisbon, she's hard-ass and a buzzkill at parties I grant you."

author: Jemma Simmons and Victoria Hand
quote: "He is a good man!""He's a liar!"

author: Grant Ward to Skye
quote: "Agent Hand picked up some Navy jets in the vicinity. She has us taking the long route to the Fridge just to be safe."

author: A S.H.I.E.L.D. Guard and Grant Ward
quote: "Identify yourself and state your purpose.""Agent Grant Ward. You know who this is. Hand called it in.""We have specific orders not to let anyone in without Agent Hand's presence. So where is she?""Where do you think she is? She's heading to meetings with every high-ranking S.H.I.E.L.D. agent still out there. There's a war going on, in case you guys missed it. You really want me to radio her, have her turn the plane around, come all the way back?""That's exactly what you need to do.""All right. I guess you boys have never seen Hand angry, have you?"

author: Phil Coulson and Antoine Triplett
quote: "All right. Ward is HYDRA. You know what that means.""Garrett is alive.""And Agent Hand is dead."

author: Maria Hill and Phil Coulson
quote: "We should have seen HYDRA coming. But after D.C., they don't stand a chance.""John Garrett does.""Garrett? I heard Ward took care of him.""Ward's his secret weapon. He killed Victoria Hand, then raided the Fridge, and now he's got Skye, which is where we were headed until you so rudely interrupted to sweeten your deal."

author: Grant Ward and Phil Coulson
quote: "I'm still a part of your team.""My team? You th- You are not nor you'll ever be on my team. You dropped Fitz-Simmons out of a plane. You murdered Victoria Hand and Eric Koenig. You betrayed every one of us, you deluded son of a bitch."

author: Bobbi Morse and Isabelle Hartley
quote: "What, S.H.I.E.L.D. has the top deck?""And I heard from Vic. She's gonna hold the Hub."

author: Kara Palamas to Bobbi Morse
quote: "Grant's already told me everything. Everything about his abusive family, about John Garrett, about having to kill Victoria Hand."

author: Vijay Nadeer
quote: "Thank you. Thank you. It's nice to meet you, Jemma... Simmons."

author: Jemma Simmons and a Scientist
quote: "It's incredibly rare to see the actual metamorphosis. It only lasts a few fleeting moments.""Not this one. The subject's been gestating for seven months.""Come again? How has he survived?"

author: Jemma Simmons and Quake
quote: "I knew Senator Nadeer was connected to him somehow, and in my research on her, I recognized him ... Vijay Nadeer ... her own brother, if you can believe it.""Yeah, but there's zero evidence that he's been missing. He's been posting on Facebook, Twitter. His bills are paid. He even recently signed up for a Master Class in directing."

author: Vin-Tak to Nurse
quote: "Do not try and fight me. Someone on your world has changed. I'm here to hunt them down."

author: Vin-Tak to Bobbi Morse
quote: "You do not wanna fight me."

author: Vin-Tak
quote: "You must understand, these creatures are weapons. Abominations. Even if they don't know it."

author: Vin-Tak
quote: "The weapon has been activated. It needs to be eliminated before it hurts someone."

author: Sif, Melinda May and Phil Coulson
quote: "I'm a decent fighter.""This guy can hold his own against you. Impressive.""Last time you were here you came to collect a rogue Asgardian. That would explain his strength.""Regardless, she traveled across the universe to find him. He's dangerous.""Make that more than dangerous. We know you were after him. Question is, what's he after?"

author: Jemma Simmons to Phil Coulson
quote: "After Raina's vanishing act, we advise that when you find this man, you contain him first, ask questions later."

author: Cardozo and Melinda May
quote: "The man destroyed my booth!""What does he want with balloons?""He went for my helium, broke off the valve and took them! What does he need those for?"

author: Skye to Phil Coulson
quote: "The guy was blue. Like he just tested some Willy Wonka gum blue, and he needed nitrogen for whatever device turned its skin pink. Do you think he's a Kree?"

author: Skye, Phil Coulson and Melinda May
quote: "After my run-in with Blue Man Group, I still feel a little banged up, and I'm just worried I'm not gonna be much help out there. So...""Okay. Whenever you're ready.""Is it really about being hurt? Or is it about your nerves?""I promise, it's just about the guy making me see cartoon birdies all around my head. That's it."

author: Jemma Simmons, Leo Fitz, Alphonso Mackenzie, Bobbi Morse, and Lance Hunter
quote: "Skye is my friend. She's different.""Oh, yeah. Like I was your friend, and then I changed. How did you handle that?""Uh, t-the point is, secrets don't help any of us. Skye should have just come clean.""What, and risked being locked up, studied, or who know what else? No, I wouldn't let her.""Oh, you wouldn't let her.""We could have handled her in a way that could have kept everybody safe.""It wasn't fair to us, Fitz. We had a right to know.""A right to know. What... is that the same way that Sif and the Kree had the right to know?""I think the situation is a bit different, mate.""No, you would have done to her exactly what they wanted to.""You don't know that!""Yes, I do know that! They would--you would--you'd "handle her"! Mack just said! Like, uh... like Skye's something to be locked up in a cage somewhere. We should be protecting her.""No, Fitz. We're the ones that need the protection from her."

author: Vin-Tak, Sif and Phil Coulson
quote: "I am here to help.""Is that why you attacked me, Kree?""You were the one who attacked.""I had to take your memory to keep you from tracking me. How did you track me?""You do not ask the questions, Kree. You do not talk.""Actually, we need him to talk.""Look, I can prove that I'm not a threat, and that I'm here to help. Bring me my truncheon.""How very Kree. He needs a weapon to make a point.""My truncheon can restore her memory. Would that not be a gesture of my noble intentions?""I'll consider it once we know that thing does what you say it does.""Do you have a name?""Vin-Tak.""And I will earn your trust."

author: Sif and Vin-Tak
quote: "Tell us how the truncheon works, Kree.""The Kree has a name. And that only works when in my hand."

author: Sif, Vin-Tak, Skye, Melinda May and Jemma Simmons
quote: "When Heimdall saw that one landed on your world, Odin charged me with retrieving him.""So you came to pick a fight?""We know enough about Kree history to be concerned.""Well, then if you know Kree history, perhaps you've heard the tale of Terrigenesis.""Of course. Ancient Kree descending on planets, altering the inhabitants to fight their war.""And Earth was one of them."""Blue angels who fell from the sky."""Eons ago, the Kree waged a very long war. The casualties were high and they needed more soldiers.""You mean cannon fodder.""We needed killers. One vicious faction among the Kree genetically modified other creatures' DNA. These modifications can be activated with Terrigen Crystals.""We know these torturous experiments failed.""Not on Earth. Here, we had to shut them down. This faction had built a city. They brought with them the Diviners, which hold the crystals. Their plans were discovered and thwarted by the better of my kind, putting an end to that dark chapter of our past.""Until now.""When I saw that an ancient signal had been triggered, I knew it had to be a Diviner. If the Kree Empire learned that these experiments were a success, they would be likely to renew them.""Why did you come here?""These transformed beings are abominations. I knew that I had to find the remainder of the Diviners before another monstrosity occurred, and erase any knowledge of it.""How many Diviners are supposed to be in that crate?""Enough to create an army.""Sir, the crate is empty.""My worst fear has come true."

author: Skye, Vin-Tak and Leo Fitz
quote: "I can get a handle on it.""That's not what you were designed for. You were designed to destroy. Which is why you must be put down.""Yeah, well, that sounds an awful lot like killing to me."

author: Vin-Tak and Alphonso Mackenzie
quote: "Your friend Skye is an atrocity. And I must go put an end to this.""We'll decide what she is. But for now, you're not going anywhere.""This is not your fight.""Kind of is now."

author: Vin-Tak and Bobbi Morse
quote: "This is twice now, you and me. You must really love fighting.""Love fighting? No. But you're coming after one of my people. So I'm willing to fight.""That's noble. Stupid, but noble."

author: Vin-Tak, Phil Coulson and Sif
quote: "I apologize for my forgetfulness. You have been very kind. Why is my hand not blue?""You are in disguise from the people pursuing you. Remember?""Right. I will keep watch.""I'll return him to his home planet, Hala. He'll remember none of this. No more trouble should come from there."

author: Vision's first words
quote: "I am sorry. That was... odd."

author: Vision
quote: "I don't want to kill Ultron. He's unique and he's in pain. But that pain will roll over the Earth. So, he must be destroyed. Every form he's built, every trace of his presence on the net. We have to act now. And not one of us can do it without the others. Maybe I am a monster. I don't think I'd know if I were one. I'm not what you are, and not what you intended. So, there may be no way to make you trust me. But we need to go."

author: Steve Rogers and Tony Stark
quote: "Why does your "Vision" sound like J.A.R.V.I.S.?""We reconfigured J.A.R.V.I.S.' matrix to create something new."

author: Iron Man and F.R.I.D.A.Y.
quote: "F.R.I.D.A.Y., the Vision?""Boss, it's working. He's burning Ultron out of the net. He won't escape through there."

author: Ultron to Vision
quote: "You shut me out. You think I care? You take away my world... I take away yours."

author: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark and Thor
quote: "The rules have changed.""We're dealing with something new.""The Vision is artificial intelligence.""A machine.""So, it doesn't count?""No, it's not like a person lifting the hammer.""Right, different rules for us.""Nice guy. Artificial.""Thank you.""He can wield the hammer, he can keep the Mind Stone. It's safe with the Vision. And these days, safe is in short supply."

author: Vision and Captain America
quote: "You think I'm a child of Ultron.""You're not?""I'm not Ultron. I am not J.A.R.V.I.S.. I am... I am."

author: Bruce Banner and Vision
quote: "If we're wrong about you, if you're the monster that Ultron made you to be...""What will you do?"

author: Tony Stark and Vision
quote: "I get first crack at the big guy. Iron Man's the one he's waiting for.""That's true. He hates you the most."

author: Vision and Ultron
quote: "Ultron.""My Vision. They really did take everything from me.""You set the terms. You can change them.""All right."

author: Vision and Ultron
quote: "You're afraid.""Of you?""Of death. You're the last one.""You were supposed to be the last. Stark asked for a savior and settled for a slave.""I suppose we are both disappointments.""I suppose we are.""Humans are odd. They think order and chaos are somehow opposites and... try to control what won't be. But there is grace in their failings. I think you missed that.""They're doomed.""Yes. But a thing isn't beautiful because it lasts. It's a privilege to be among them.""You're unbearably naive.""Well... I was born yesterday."

author: Vision to Captain America
quote: "Captain Rogers! I know you believe that what you are doing is right, but for the collective good, you must surrender now."

author: Iron Man to Scarlet Witch
quote: "Wanda, I think you hurt Vision's feelings."

author: Wanda Maximoff, Vision and Steve Rogers
quote: "Vis! We talked about this.""Yes, but the door was opened so I assumed that...Captain Rogers wished to know when Mr. Stark was arriving.""Thank you. We'll be right down.""I'll...use the door. Oh, and apparently, he's brought a guest.""We know who it is?""The Secretary of State."

author: Vision, Sam Wilson, Steve Rogers and James Rhodes
quote: "I have an equation.""Oh, this will clear it up.""In the 8 years since Mr. Stark announced himself as Iron Man, the number of known enhanced persons has grown exponentially. And during the same period, the number of potentially world-ending events has risen at a commensurate rate.""Are you saying it's our fault?""I'm saying there may be a causality. Our very strength invites challenge. Challenge incites conflict. And conflict... breeds catastrophe. Oversight... Oversight is not an idea that can be dismissed out of hand.""Boom."

author: Vision and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "'A pinch of paprika.' A pinch?""Is that Paprikash?""I thought it might...lift your spirits.""Spirits lifted.""In my defense, I haven't actually ever... eaten anything before, so...""May I?""Please. Wanda.""Hmm?""No one dislikes you, Wanda.""...Thanks.""Oh, you're welcome. No. It's a... involuntary response in their amygdala they can't help but be afraid of you.""Are you?""My amygdala is synthetic, so...""I used to think of myself one way. But, after this. I am something else. And still me, I think. But... that's not what everyone else sees.""I don't know what this is. Not really. I know it's not of this world, that it powered Loki's staff, gave you your abilities. But its true nature is a mystery and yet it is part of me.""Are you afraid of it?""I wish to understand it. The more I do, the less it controls me. One day, who knows? I may even control it.""I don't know what's in this but it is not paprika. I'm gonna go to the store. I'll be back in 20 minutes.""Alternatively, we could order a pizza?""Vision, are you not letting me leave?""It is a question of safety.""I can protect myself.""Not yours. Mr. Stark would like to avoid the possibility of another public incident. Until the Accords are on a... more secured foundation.""And what do you want?""For people to see you... as I do."

author: Vision, Hawkeyeand Scarlet Witch
quote: "Clint! You should not be here.""Really? I retire for, what, like five minutes, and it all goes to shit?""Please consider the consequences of your actions.""Okay, they're considered. Okay, we gotta go. It's this way.""I've caused enough problems.""You gotta help me, Wanda. Look, you wanna mope, can go to high school. You wanna make amends, you get off your ass. Shit! I knew I should've stretched.""Clint, you can't overpower me.""I know I can't. But she can.""Vision, that's enough. Let him go. I'm leaving.""I can't let you.""I'm sorry.""If you do this... they will never stop being afraid of you.""I can't control their fear, only my own"

author: Vision and Scarlet Witch
quote: "I'm sorry.""Me, too.""It's as I said. Catastrophe."

author: Tony Stark and Happy Hogan
quote: "So after the press conference, Happy will show you to your room, your new quarters, see that he is next to Vision.""Yeah, Vision's not big on doors.""It's so much fun.""Or walls.""You'll fit right in."

author: Vision's last words to Scarlet Witch
quote: "It's alright. I love you."

author: Wanda Maximoff and Vision
quote: "Vis? Is it the stone again?""It's as if it's speaking to me.""What does it say?""I don't... I don't know. Something... Tell me what you feel.""I just feel you."

author: Vision and Scarlet Witch
quote: "Wanda, it's time.""No.""They can't stop him, Wanda, but we can. Look at me. You have the power to destroy the stone.""Don't.""You must do it. Wanda, please... We are out of time.""I can't.""Yes, you can. You can. If he gets this stone, half the Universe dies. It's not fair. It shouldn't be you, but it is. It's all right. You could never hurt me... I just feel you."

author: Wanda Maximoff to Thanos
quote: "You took everything from me."

author: Clint Barton and Wanda Maximoff
quote: "You know, I wish there was a way... that I could let her know... that we won. We did it.""She knows. They both do."

author: Volstagg
quote: "Do not mistake my appetite for apathy!"

author: Thor and Volstagg
quote: "Volstagg, who introduced you to delicacies so succulent you thought you'd died and gone to Valhalla?""You did."

author: Loki and Volstagg
quote: "Thor this is madness.""Madness? What sort of madness?"

author: Heimdall and Volstagg
quote: "If your return threatens the safety of Asgard, my gate will remain shut and you will be left to perish on the cold waste of Jotunheim.""Couldn't you just keep the bridge open for us?"

author: Fandral and Volstagg
quote: "Shame on you! Don't you care?""Do not mistake my appetite for apathy!"

author: Volstagg and Loki
quote: "If I may, beg the indulgence of your Majesty, to perhaps reconsider...""We're done!"

author: Volstagg and Thor
quote: "Thor's going to fight with us!""My friends, I am just a man. I'd only get in your way or worse get one of you killed. But you can help me gain time and get everyone to safety."

author: Volstagg
quote: "With steely courage, intrepid spirit and an axe, victory was ours!"

author: Fandral and Volstagg
quote: "It's as if they resent being imprisoned.""There's no pleasing some creatures."

author: Volstagg and Loki
quote: "If you even THINK about betraying him...""You'll kill me? Evidently there will be a line."

author: The Collector and Volstagg
quote: "But if I may ask, why not keep it secure, in your own vault?""The Tesseract is already on Asgard. It is not wise to keep two Infinity Stones so close together."

author: Volstagg to Hela
quote: "Who are you? What have you done with Thor?"

author: Vulture to Herman Schultz
quote: "Yo, hey, ah, you can't saw through that stuff! These alien bastards, they're tough. You gotta use the stuff they use. See?"

author: Vulture
quote: "The world's changing. It's time we change too."

author: Vulture
quote: "The rich and the powerful, like Stark, they don't care about us. We have to pick up after them. We have to eat their table scraps."

author: Vulture
quote: "Business is good."

author: Vulture
quote: "Eight years. Not a word from the feds, nothing from those Halloween costume wearing bozos up there over at Stark Tower. And then all of a sudden, this little bastard in red tights shows up, and he thinks he can tear down everything I've built. Really? I'm gonna kill him."

author: Vulture to Spider-Man
quote: "And don't you ever, ever interfere with my business again, 'Cause if you do, I'll kill you, and everyone that you love. I'll kill you dead. That's what I'll do to protect my family. Pete, you understand?"

author: Vulture to Spider-Man
quote: "You're not gonna stop me."

author: Vulture to Spider-Man
quote: "You're messing with things that you don't understand!"

author: Vulture
quote: "This is our last chance to get what's ours."

author: Vulture
quote: "Well hot dog."

author: Tony Stark
quote: "Forget the flying Vulture guy. There are people who handle this sort of thing."

author: Spider-Man
quote: "Dude, a gang with alien guns and a guy with wings? Yeah, they have a lair."

author: Adrian Toomes and Phineas Mason
quote: "When I was kid, I drew cowboys and Indians.""Actually, it's Native Americans. It's nice. Kid's got a future, though.""Yeah, we'll see."

author: Adrian Toomes and Jackson Brice
quote: "Oh hey! Glad you could join us after noon!""My alarm didn't go off...""Yeah, yeah, your alarm. Look, just go stack that armor plating like I asked, this is a huge deal for us!"

author: Anne Marie Hoag, Adrian Toomes and Foster
quote: "Attention, please! In accordance with Executive Order 396-B, all post-battle clean-up operations are now under our jurisdiction. Thank you for your service; we'll take it from here.""Who the hell are you?""Qualified personnel.""Look, I have a city contract to salvage all of this ok, the city said...""I apologise Mr Toomes but all salvage operations are under our jurisdiction. Please turn over any and all exotic materials that you have collected or you will be prosecuted.""Ma'am, please, wait, hey, come on! Look, I brought trucks for this job. I brought in a whole new crew, these guys have families, I have a family. I'm all in on this, I could loose my house!""I'm sorry sir, there is nothing I can do.""Maybe next time, don't overextend yourself.""What did you say? Yeah, he's right. I over extended myself.""Put them down. If you have a grievance, you may take it up with my superiors.""Your superiors? And who the hell are they?"

author: Randy Vale, Tinkerer and Vulture
quote: "Hey chief, we still have another load from yesterday. We're supposed to turn this in, right?""I ain't hauling it.""It's too bad. We could have made some pretty cool stuff with all that alien junk.""I'll tell you what, let's keep it. The world's changing. Time we change too."

author: Jackson Brice, Vulture, Tinkerer, and Herman Shultz
quote: "Ha ha! Woo! That was badass.""How many times have I told you not to fire them out in the open?""You said to move the merchandise!""Under the radar! Under the radar! That's how we survive! If you bring Damage Control or the Avengers down here, we're through! You're out there, wearing that goofy thing, lightin' up cars, calling yourself the Shocker! "I'm the Shocker! I shock people!" What is this, Pro Wrestling?""Yeah, whatever, old man.""Look, I know you don't give a crap about anything, but I do. I built this whole place because there are people I have to look after.""Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.""You know what? I can't afford your bullshit. Get out of here.""What?""You're done, you're off the crew.""Yeah, alright. I wonder if you could afford me out there, though. With what I know.""Excuse me?""I'm just saying, maybe your wife would like to know where you really get your money from?""You know what?""What?""You're right. Does it work?""I don't know.""I can't afford that.""Damm!""I thought this was the Anti-Gravity Gun.""What? No, that's that one!""Here, now you're the 'Shocker'. Go out there and find that weapon you lost."

author: Adrian Toomes and Peter Parker
quote: "You must be Peter.""Yeah.""I'm Liz's dad. Put her there, Hell of a grip! Come on in here, Come on."

author: Adrian Toomes and Peter Parker
quote: "Hey, you up for some bourbon, some gin, rum?""I'm not old enough to drink.""Right answer."

author: Spider-Man and Vulture
quote: "I'm sorry Peter.""What are you talking about? That thing isn't even touched me yet!""True but then again... wasn't really trying to."

author: Vulture and Peter Parker
quote: "Does she know?""Know what?""So she doesn't, good. Close to the vest, I admire that. I've got a few secrets of my own. Of all the reasons I didn't want my daughter to date. Peter, nothing is more important than family. You saved my daughter's life, and I could never forget something like that, so I'll give you one chance. You ready? You walk through those doors, You forget any of this happened. And don't you ever, ever interfere with my business again, 'Cause if you do, I'll kill you, and everyone that you love. I'll kill you dead. That's what I'll do to protect my family. Pete, you understand? Hey. I just saved your life. Now, what do you say?""Thank you.""You're welcome. Now, you go on in there, and you show my daughter a good time, okay? Just not too good."

author: Vulture and Peter Parker
quote: "Peter, you're young. You don't understand how the world works.""Yeah, but I understand that selling weapons to criminals is wrong!""How do you think your buddy Stark paid for that tower, or any of his little toys? Those people, Pete, those people up there, the rich and the powerful, they do whatever they want. Guys like us, like you and me... they don't care about us. We build their roads and we fight all their wars and everything. They don't care about us. We have to pick up after them. We have to eat their table scraps. That's how it is. I know you know what I'm talking about, Peter.""Why are you telling me this?""'Cause I want you to understand. And... I needed a little time to get her airborne."

author: James Rhodes
quote: "As liaison to Stark Industries, I've had the unique privilege of serving with a real patriot. He is my friend, and he is my great mentor. Ladies and gentlemen, it is my honor to present this years Apogee Award to Mr. Tony Stark. Tony?"

author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
quote: "That's what I'm talking about. When I get up in the morning and I'm putting on my uniform, you know what I recognize? I see in that mirror that every person that's got this uniform on at my back!"

author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
quote: "How was the fun-vee? Next time you ride with me, okay?"

author: James Rhodes
quote: "The future of air combat... Is it manned, or unmanned? I'll tell you in my experience, no unmanned aerial vehicle will ever trump a pilot's instinct."

author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
quote: "What's wrong with you?""What?""Three hours!""I got caught doing a piece for Vanity Fair""For three hours! For three hours you've kept me standing here!""Waiting on you now. Let's go. Come on."

author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
quote: "You don’t respect yourself so I know you don’t respect me.""I respect you.""You know, I’m just your babysitter so, you know, when you need your diaper changed, let me know — thank you — and I’ll get you a bottle, okay?"

author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
quote: "No, you see, this isn't a game. You do not send civilian equipment into my active war zone. You understand that?""It's not a piece of equipment, I'm in it! It's a suit! It's ME!"

author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
quote: "That's the coolest thing I've ever seen.""Not bad huh."

author: Tony Stark and James Rhodes
quote: "I'm just not the hero type. Clearly. With this laundry list of character defects, all the mistakes I've made, largely public.""Just stick to the cards, man.""Yeah, okay. The truth is... I am Iron Man."

author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
quote: "This lone gunslinger act is unnecessary... you don't have to do this alone!"

author: War Machine to the party guests
quote: "I'm only gonna say this once: GET OUT!"

author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
quote: "Oh man, you can have your suit back."

author: Tony Stark and James Rhodes
quote: "I didn't expect to see you here...""Well, it's me, and I'm here, so get over it and move on!"

author: War Machine, Iron Man and Adam Goldstein
quote: " I’m only gonna say this once. Get out. You don’t deserve to wear one of these. Shut it down!""Goldstein.""Yes, Mr Stark?""Give me a phat beat to beat my buddy’s ass to.""I told you to shut it down.""Now, put that thing back where you found it before someone gets hurt. Really? Sorry, pal, but Iron Man doesn’t have a sidekick.""Sidekick this. Had enough?"

author: Iron Man and War Machine
quote: "You want it? Take it!""Put your hand down!""You think you got what it takes to wear that suit?""We don’t have to do this, Tony.""You wanna be the War Machine? Take your shot.""Put it down!""You gonna take a shot?""Put it down!""No!""Drop it Tony!""Take it!"

author: General and James Rhodes
quote: "Unbelievable. This ought to get the Senate off my ass. It’s functional?""Fully mission-capable.""Good. Get Hammer down here to weaponize it.""Sir?""Justin Hammer’s making a weapons presentation at the Expo. We’d like this to introduce it.""Sir, I don’t believe that the Expo…""Colonel, the world needs to see this fast. We’ve got to make this happen.""Yes, General, but…""It’s also an order.""Yes sir.""Good work, Colonel. You’ve made your country proud.""Thank you sir."

author: James Rhodes and Justin Hammer
quote: "I think I'll take it.""Which one?""All of it."

author: Tony Stark and James Rhodes
quote: "You have *a* big gun, you're not *the* big gun.""Tony, don't be jealous.""No, it's subtle, all the bells and whistles.""Yeah, it's called being a badass!"

author: Senator Stern and James Rhodes
quote: "Thank you Lieutenant Colonel for such an exceptional distinguished performance, you deserve this.""Thank you sir."

author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
quote: "Tony, I swear, I'm going to blow his face off."

author: President Matthew Ellis
quote: "Central to my administration's response to this terrorist event, is a newly minted resource. I know him as Colonel James Rhodes, the American people will soon know him as the Iron Patriot."

author: Harley Keener and Tony Stark
quote: "If I was building Iron Man and War Machine...""It's Iron Patriot now.""That's way cooler!""No it's not."

author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
quote: "Are you okay?""I broke the crayon..."

author: Tony Stark and James Rhodes
quote: "I'm gonna find a heavy-duty comm sat now, I need your login.""It's same as it's always been, "WarMachine68."""And a password, please.""Well, look, I gotta change it every time you hack in, Tony.""It's not the '80s, nobody says "hack" anymore. Give me your login."""WAR MACHINE ROX" with an "X," all caps...Yeah, okay.""That is so much better than "Iron Patriot.""

author: James Rhodes and Sweat Shop Agent
quote: "If you want this suit, you're going to have to pry my cold dead body out of it.""That's the plan, Colonel."

author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
quote: "Give me a suit!""Oh I'm sorry, they're only coded to me.""What does that mean?""I got you covered!"

author: J.A.R.V.I.S. and James Rhodes
quote: "Good evening, Colonel. Can I give you a lift?""Very funny."

author: War Machine
quote: "Oh no, I didn't say you could leave."

author: War Machine to Ultron Sentries
quote: "War Machine, comin' at you, right a-..."

author: War Machine after witnessing Vision
quote: "Okay, what?"

author: James Rhodes and Thor
quote: "So I take the tank, fly it right up to the General’s palace, drop it at his feet, I’m like, Boom! You looking for this? Boom! Are you looking... Why do I even talk to you guys? Everywhere else that story kills.""That's the whole story?""Yeah, it's a War Machine story.""It's very good then."

author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark trying to lift Mjølnir
quote: "Are you even pulling?""Are you on my team?""Just represent. Pull.""All right, let's go."

author: James Rhodes and Maria Hill
quote: "He’s in your files, he’s in the internet. What if he decides to access something a little more exciting?""Nuclear codes."

author: War Machine and Iron Man
quote: "Now this is gonna be a good story.""Yup. If you live to tell it.""You think I can't hold my own?""We get through this, I'll hold your own.""You had to make it weird."

author: Iron Man to War Machine
quote: "Rhodey, get the rest of the people on board that carrier.""On it."

author: War Machine to Captain America
quote: "Congratulations, Cap. You're a criminal."

author: War Machine to Captain America
quote: "Sorry, Cap. This won't kill you, but it ain't gonna tickle either."

author: War Machine
quote: "Okay now I'm pissed!"

author: War Machine
quote: "Okay, tiny dude is big now. He's big now."

author: Iron Man to Ant-Man
quote: "Give me back my Rhodey!"

author: Sam Wilson and Tony Stark
quote: "How's Rhodes?""We fly him to Columbia Medical tomorrow, so... fingers crossed."

author: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark and James Rhodes
quote: "Tony, if someone dies on your watch, you don't give up.""Who said we're giving up?""We are if we're not taking responsibility for our actions. This document just shifts the blame.""I'm sorry, Steve, that... that is dangerously arrogant. This is the United Nations we're talking about. It's not the World Security Council. It's not S.H.I.E.L.D.. It's not HYDRA-""No, but it's run by people with agendas and agendas change."

author: War Machine scanning the Black Order's arrival outside the dome
quote: "I got two heat signatures breaking through the tree line."

author: James Rhodes
quote: "Sam! Sam, where you at?!"

author: James Rhodes
quote: "What is this? What the hell is happening?"

author: Thaddeus Ross, James Rhodes, Steve Rogers and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "Still no word on Vision?""Satellites lost him somewhere over Edinburgh.""On a stolen Quinjet with four of the world's most wanted criminals.""You know they're only criminals because you chose them to call them that, right, sir?""God, Rhodes. Your talent for horse-shit rivals my own.""If it weren't for those Accords, Vision would have been right here.""I remember your signature on those papers, Colonel.""That's right. And I'm pretty sure I paid for that.""You having second thoughts?""Not anymore.""Mr. Secretary.""You got some nerve. I'll give you that.""You could use some of that right now.""The world's on fire, and you think all's forgiven?""I'm not looking for forgiveness. And I'm way past asking for permission. Earth just lost their best defender. So we're here to fight. If you wanna stay in our way... we'll fight you, too.""Arrest them."

author: Falcon, Winter Soldier and War Machine
quote: "Hey, Cap, we got a situation here.""God, I love this place.""Yeah, don't start celebrating yet, guys. We got more incoming outside the dome."

author: War Machine and Falcon
quote: "Focus that fire on the left flank, Sam."I'm doing it."

author: James Rhodes
quote: "So that... thing just stopped doing whatever the hell it was doing."

author: Steve Rogers, James Rhodes, Bruce Banner and Natasha Romanoff
quote: "I thought we bypassed the battery.""We did. It's still plugged in, it just... it just stopped.""Reboot and send the signal again.""We don't even know what this is.""Fury did. You tell me the second you get a signal. I wanna know who's on the other end of that thing."

author: War Machine ejecting the Mark VI armor
quote: "Canopy! Canopy! Canopy!"

author: James Rhodes to Rocket Raccoon
quote: "See you on the other side, man!"

author: Black Widow, Hulk, War Machine, Captain Marvel and Captain America
quote: "He used the stones again.""Hey, hey, hey, hey. We'd be going in short-handed, you know?""Look, he still got the stones, so...""So let's get 'em. We use them to bring everyone back.""Just like that?""Yeah. Just like that.""Even if there's a small chance that we can undo this, I mean we owe it to everyone who's not in this room to try."

author: Hulk, War Machine and Captain Marvel
quote: "If we do this, how do we know it's gonna end any differently than it did before?""Because before you didn't have me.""Hey, new girl? Everybody in this room is about that superhero life. And if you don't mind my asking, where the hell have you been all this time?""There are a lot of other planets in the universe, and unfortunately, they didn't have you guys."

author: War Machine, Hulk, Scott Lang, Clint Barton and Nebula
quote: "If we can do this; you know, go back in time; why don't we just find baby Thanos, you know, and...""Okay, first of all, that's horrible.""It's Thanos!""And secondly, time doesn't work that way. Changing the past doesn't change the future.""We go back, we get the stones before Thanos gets them, Thanos doesn't have the stones! Problem solved!""Bingo.""That's not how it works!""Well that's what I heard.""Who told you that?""Star Trek, Terminator, Timecop, Time After Time...""Quantum Leap?""A Wrinkle in Time, Somewhere in Time...""Hot Tub Time Machine?""Hot Tub Time Machine, Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure, basically any movie that deals with time travel!""Die Hard? No, that's not one...""Look, this is known!""I don't know why everyone believes that, but that isn't true. Think about it. If you go into the past, that past becomes your future, and your former present becomes the past, which can't now be changed by your new future!""Exactly!""So, Back to the Future is a bunch of bullshit?"

author: Hulk and War Machine
quote: "Did we get 'em all?""Are you telling me this actually worked?"

author: Celeste
quote: "Is Rhodey coming along? He's cute."

author: Hope van Dyne to Scott Lang
quote: "When you're small, energy's compressed, so you have the force of a 200-pound man behind a fist a 100th of an inch wide. You're like a bullet. You punch too hard, you kill someone. Too soft, it's a love tap. In other words, you have to know how to punch."

author: Hope van Dyne to Scott Lang
quote: "That's how you punch."

author: Hope van Dyne
quote: "Aratrechina longicornis, commonly known as crazy ants, they're lightning fast and can conduct electricity which makes them useful to fry out enemy electronics."

author: Hope van Dyne
quote: "Solenopsis mandibularis. Known for their bite, the fire ants have evolved into remarkable architects. They are handy to get you in and out of difficult places."

author: Hope van Dyne to Scott Lang
quote: "Go get that suit."

author: Hope van Dyne to Hank Pym
quote: "It's about damn time."

author: Hank Pym to Scott Lang
quote: "The board's chairman is my daughter, Hope. She was the deciding vote. But she came back to me when she saw how close Cross was to cracking my formula."

author: Hope van Dyne and Hank Pym
quote: "Good morning, Hank.""Hope. Would it kill you to call me dad?""Well, Doctor Cross will be so pleased that you could find the time to join us today."

author: Darren Cross and Hope van Dyne
quote: "His failures as a mentor, as a father, forced us to spread our wings.""You're a success, Darren. You deserve everything coming your way."

author: Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne
quote: "Have you been standing there watching me sleep this whole time?""Yes.""Why?""Because the last time you were here you stole something."

author: Hank Pym, Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne
quote: "I assume that you've already met my daughter, Hope.""I did. She's great.""She doesn't think that we need you.""We don't. We can do this ourselves.""I go to all this effort to let you steal my suit, and then Hope has you arrested.""Okay, we can try this and when he fails, I'll do it myself.""She's a little bit anxious."

author: Hank Pym and Hope van Dyne
quote: "Hope trained in martial arts at a difficult time.""Oh, by "difficult time," he means when my mother died.""We lost her in a plane crash. It's bad enough you won't tell me how she died. Could you please stop telling me that lie?"

author: Hope van Dyne and Scott Lang
quote: "Paraponera clavata.""I know. Bullet ants, right? Number one on the Schmidt pain index."

author: Hope van Dyne and Scott Lang
quote: "Camponotus pennsylvanicus]]. Alternatively known as a carpenter ant. Ideal for ground and air transport.""Wait a minute, I know this guy. I'm going to call him Ant-thony]]."

author: Hope van Dyne and Scott Lang
quote: "You know when my mother died I didn’t see him for two weeks?""He was in grief.""Yeah, so was I, and I was seven. And he never came back, not in any way that counted. He just sent me off to boarding school."

author: Hope van Dyne and Hank Pym
quote: "It's not your fault. She made her choice. But why didn't you tell me this sooner?"" I was trying to protect you. I lost your mother. I didn't mean to lose you too."

author: Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne
quote: "Hi, I'm Scott.""Did he just say "Hi, I'm Scott"?"

author: Darren Cross and Hope van Dyne
quote: "I just saw Hank. I still get nothing but contempt from him.""Don’t let him rile you up, he’s just... He’s just a senile old man."

author: Hope van Dyne and Luis
quote: "You know he was arrested for stealing a smoothie machine, right?""Two smoothie machines..."

author: Hope van Dyne and Darren Cross
quote: "Darren, what are you doing?""He wasn’t any more capable of caring for you than he was for me.""This is not who you are, it’s the particles altering your brain chemistry."

author: Darren Cross and Hope van Dyne
quote: "You know, I came to the house the other night to kill him, but you were there.""You're sick and I can help you. Just put the gun down.""I wasn't ready to kill you then, but I think I am now!""Drop your gun now!""You picked the wrong side, Hope."

author: Hope van Dyne and Hank Pym
quote: "The charges are set. We’ve got to find a way out of here and fast.""Don’t worry. I’m not gonna die, and neither are you."

author: Hank Pym, Hope van Dyne and Scott Lang
quote: "When did this happen?""Nothing’s happening.""Whoa, hold on. Something’s kind of happening."

author: Hope van Dyne
quote: "He's programmed to follow your daily routine—nine hours of sleep, five hours in front of the TV, two hours in the bathroom, whatever that's about..."

author: Hope van Dyne to Scott Lang
quote: "Thanks to you, we had to run. We're still running."

author: Hope van Dyne
quote: "Follow my lead!"

author: Hope van Dyne
quote: "We unleashed something powerful. We call her the Ghost."

author: Scott Lang to Hank Pym
quote: "Hold on. You gave her wings?""And blasters."

author: Cassie Lang to Scott Lang
quote: "Maybe you just need someone watching your back. Like a partner."

author: Ant-Man and Hope van Dyne
quote: "I just have one question, when Cap needed help, if I’d asked you, would you have come?""I guess we’ll never know. But if you had, you’d never been caught."

author: Scott Lang, Bill Foster and Hope van Dyne
quote: "How big did you get?""My record? Twenty-one feet. You?""Sixty-five feet.""Sixty-five?""If you two are finished comparing sizes.""Sixty-five."

author: Ant-Man and Hope van Dyne
quote: "You go low, I'll go high.""I have wings, why would I go low?"

author: Ant-Man and Hope van Dyne
quote: "Great job back there. Are you gonna say the same thing to me?""Good job.""Thank you."

author: Iron Man and Captain America buy Ant-Man and the Wasp time to get the Quantum Tunnel in Luis' van working during the Battle of Earth
quote: "Scott, how long do you need to get that thing working?""Maybe ten minutes.""Get it started. We'll bring the stones to you.""We're on it, Cap."

author: Tony Stark to Watcher Informant
quote: "You look great, Hef."

author: Kathleen Sparr and Thaddeus Ross
quote: "It's a possible Gamma sickness. Milwaukee. A man drank one of those guaraná sodas. Guess it had a little more kick than he was looking for."

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "Wow."

author: Happy Hogan and Tony Stark
quote: "Larry King.""Larry!"

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "Did it work?"

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "I thought he'd be taller."

author: Watcher Informant to Steve Rogers
quote: "Ask for her number, you moron!"

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "Superheroes in New York? Give me a break!"

author: Erik Selvig and Watcher Informant
quote: "Any questions?""Yeah, can I have my shoe back?"

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "Oh, man! I am so fired!"

author: Rocket Raccoon
quote: "Look at Mr. Smiles over here. Where's your wife, old man? What a Class A pervert!"

author: Thor and Watcher Informant
quote: "This was aged for a thousand years in the barrels built from the wreck of Grunhel's Fleet. It is not meant for mortal men.""Neither was Omaha Beach, blondie. Stop trying to scare us. Come on.""Alright."

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "Excelsior!"

author: Ignacio and Watcher Informant
quote: "Look at the girl I'm with! You what I'm sayin'? She's crazy stupid fine, right?""Yeah, crazy stupid fine!"

author: Watcher Informant and James Rhodes
quote: "Are you Tony...Stank?""Yes, this is...this is Tony Stank! You're in the right place. Thank you for that!"

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "Ha ha! That is hilarious!"

author: Watcher Informant to the Watchers
quote: "Oh, man. Anyway, before I was so rudely interrupted, at that time, I was a Federal Express man."

author: Watcher Informant to the Watchers
quote: "Hey, fellas! Hey, wait, where are you going? Hey, you were supposed to be my lift home! How will I get out of here? Hey! Oh, gee, I've got so many more stories to tell! Oh, guys! Oh, gee..."

author: Watcher Informant to Spider-Man
quote: "Don't make me come down there, you punk!"

author: Marjorie and Watcher Informant
quote: "Hey, Gary, how you doing?""Marjorie, how are you? How's your mother?"

author: Bruce Banner and Thor
quote: "What happened to your hair?""Oh, some creepy old man cut it off."

author: Watcher Informant and Thor
quote: "Now, don't you move. My hands aren't as steady as they used to be.""By Odin's beard, you shall not cut my hair, lest you feel the wrath of the mighty Thor! Please, kind sir, do not cut my hair... No! NOOOOOO!"

author: Watcher Informant to Everett Ross
quote: "You know what, I think I'll just take these, bring them over here and hold onto them for safe keeping."

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "What's the matter with you kids? You never seen a spaceship before?"

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "Well, the 60s were fun but now I'm paying for it."

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "Trust me, True Believer."

author: Watcher Informant
quote: "Make love, not war!"

author: Ivan Vanko to Tony Stark
quote: "You'll lose!"

author: Ivan Vanko to Tony Stark
quote: "If you can make God bleed, people will cease to believe in him, and there will be blood in the water and the sharks will come. All I have to do is sit here and watch as the world will consume you."

author: Ivan Vanko's final words to Iron Man
quote: "You lose."

author: Ivan Vanko and Tony Stark
quote: "You come from a family of thieves and butchers, and like all guilty men, you try to rewrite your history, to forget all the lives the Stark family has destroyed.""Speaking of thieves, where'd you get this design?"

author: Ivan Vanko and Justin Hammer
quote: "I want my bird.""A bird? You want a bird--""I want my bird.""I can get you a bird. I can get you ten birds.""I want my bird!""Well, OK. Nothing's impossible. Are you talking about... Is this a bird back in Russia?"

author: Justin Hammer and Ivan Vanko
quote: "That's not a helmet; it's a head. I need to put a guy in there. I need to put a person in that... in that suit.""Drone better."What? Drone better? Why is drone better? Why is drone better""People make problem. Trust me; drone better."

author: Tony Stark and Ivan Vanko
quote: "You sound pretty spry for a dead guy.""You too. I double cycle.""You what?""You told me double cycles more power. Good advice."

author: Ivan Vanko and Tony Stark
quote: "The true history of Stark name will be written. What your father did to my family over 40 years, I will do to you in 40 minutes.""Sounds good. Let's get together and hash it out.""I hope you're ready."

author: Will Simpson to Jessica Jones
quote: "I don't want to shoot you. He said it's not your time."

author: Trish Walker and Will Simpson
quote: "You don't want to do this.""Yes, I do."

author: Will Simpson and Jessica Jones
quote: "Just tell me what the hell happened. Okay, why did I try to kill myself? Or why did I try and kill-- Oh my God. I killed...""No. no, you didn't.""I killed her.""You're confused. No one died, nothing happened. Okay? Just go home."

author: Jessica Jones and Will Simpson
quote: "You have no idea what's involved here.""Well I know there's a guy who controls minds and there's a woman who flew out of the sky to save my life. I may not have your abilities, but I got eight years special ops and an entire police force to back me up."

author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
quote: "I just need you to know that, the guy who tried to kill you, he wasn't me.""I don't blame you.""Well you're doing better than me. I tried to fight it, I couldn't."

author: Jessica Jones and Will Simpson on opposite sides of a soundproof wall
quote: "You G.I. Joe. You definitely have a screw loose. I'm guessing you left the military because you gunned down a small village.""So, what, you think because you have these abilities, you're a hero? I've seen heroes. You're not even close."

author: Jessica Jones and Will Simpson
quote: "If you're so great, why'd they let you out of Spec Ops?""That's classified."

author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker to Jessica Jones
quote: "Look, whatever abilities you have I'm guessing they don't include rendition, infiltration and isolation of enemy combatants.""He's a war hero."

author: Will Simpson and Jessica Jones
quote: "Dart gun is accurate up to twenty feet.""He'll always keep back to a wall, he'll see you coming.""He won't see me."

author: Jessica Jones and Will Simpson
quote: "If Kilgrave gets me...""I'll take you out.""I was going to say dartgun me but sure, shoot me in the head.""Same here."

author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
quote: "Some people need to be removed from this Earth and Kilgrave is one of them.""We don't get to decide that, killers decide that, that's what makes them killers.""That is naive."

author: Will Simpson and Jessica Jones
quote: "You're coming with me. I put a bomb in the basement to kill that asshole downstairs.""Shit. You can't kill him with Hope still in jail!""Well you can't let him live, he's too dangerous."

author: Miklos Kozlov and Will Simpson
quote: "You're responding well to the meds.""Feels good, like old times. Give me a red.""You had a red this morning, we altered protocol after what happened in Damascus. One red to get you going. Two whites to keep you even. One blue to bring you down."

author: Will Simpson to Oscar Clemons
quote: "Where are they?! I'm sorry... It's ever since Kilgrave, I don't know who to trust. I don't need a weapon to make a vaccine. Trish Walker, she trusts me, she's the one who called me, so please just tell me where she is."

author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
quote: "My boys are dead because of her.""Because of Kilgrave!""Yeah and I'm gonna... gonna kill him but she just keeps getting in the way."

author: Jessica Jones and Will Simpson
quote: "And that fresh burn on your arm confirms that.""I didn't even feel that."

author: Will Simpson and Jessica Jones
quote: "Any other day you would have won this, it's your ribs isn't it?""You're on something, you're messed up.""You could have killed him a dozen times, I'm just doing what has to be done, someone has to."

author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
quote: "You stole my pills?! No don't, it'll kill you!""Hasn't killed you.""Because you have no tolerance, you see these, without a blue to calm down, your brain will forget to tell your lungs to breathe!"

author: William Rawlins to Cerberus Squad
quote: "Success here is a matter of perspective. It can't be measured in battles won or land claimed. Gentlemen, I'm here to offer you freedom. To wage the war that must be waged to finally win this thing. What we will do is dirty and tough, but it will speed an end of this war and safeguard our nation."

author: William Rawlins to Cerberus Squad
quote: "I'm the only authority you will need. I point, you shoot."

author: Billy Russo and Frank Castle
quote: "Hey, you notice that our fearless leader didn't even give us a name?""Yeah. Heard some of the guys call him Agent Orange."

author: Frank Castle and Billy Russo
quote: "Why you protecting that piece of shit?""I'm protecting you. Guys like that, it's never on them! Open your eyes, man. This whole thing is bullshit! You don't like the way that it smells? Get out!"

author: William Rawlins
quote: "We are a fortunate people in this country. Most Americans wake up in warm beds, suck down coffee with their breakfast and go about their lives. And good for them. They deserve that life. They deserve it not because they earned it as individuals but because we've earned it as a nation. As a people. But not all of us get to take that life for granted. Our job at the CIA is to identify and contain any dangers to it. It's a job that's not always clean, or pretty, or fun. I've watched friends die and I've left good men behind in shitty countries because that was the home they were born to. I don't know a single operative with any years under their belt who hasn't had to do something that gave them nightmares. But we endure those nightmares embrace them, even so that the rest of America can sleep peacefully. That's why you're here. My name is William Rawlins. Welcome to the CIA."

author: William Rawlins to Billy Russo
quote: "Look at this. Industry. Coal, iron, steel. Real things. Whole country used to be built on it. We were self-sufficient. Now? Markets rule everything. This country never needed anything from anyone else. Now, we're beholden."

author: Micro and Frank Castle
quote: "He was born at the top of the ladder. The Rawlinses are practically royalty.  They are the power behind the throne. They're old, old Virginia money. Plantations, shipping and industry, arms. Who knows what else they have their hands in.""Sounds like you got a crush on the guy.""He's the director of covert ops, Frank. I mean, for all I know he's been waiting for somebody to look for him."

author: William Rawlins and Billy Russo
quote: "You serve me. You're a tool, you understand? Just like he was.""You've lost your mind. I was out of Afghanistan clean. None of this would be happening if you hadn't gone after him. You pulled me back into the mud.""I pulled you out of the mud, gutter rat! Billy, don't get confused. Men like me make the plans. Men like you shed the blood. You think you're clean? Who killed Homeland agents, huh? Not me. No, I I have everything. I have your doctored discharge papers, the money transfers. You're only as clean as I let you be, because when it's all said and done, you're just a stupid grunt, too."

author: William Rawlins and Frank Castle
quote: "This country needs me, Frank. I was the bulwark against our enemies. What I did was greater than you could ever measure! Do you know what you've done?""Did they take your pension away?""You are nothing but a grunt! You do not get to take me down. You are gonna beg to me. Blood loss is gonna make you weak. You're gonna slip in and out of shock. You will know pain and fear. Fear, Frank. Your ribs must be cracked. I'm gonna take all the breath out of your lungs, out of your lungs, until you can barely whisper and the last word out of your mouth is gonna be please, please, please."

author: Marion James and Rafael Hernandez
quote: "Looks like he got hit by a train.""I can't find it in my heart to have much sympathy."

author: Bucky Barnes
quote: "Hey. Pick on someone your own size."

author: Bucky Barnes to Steve Rogers
quote: "The 107th. Sergeant James Barnes, shipping out for England first thing tomorrow."

author: Bucky Barnes to Steve Rogers
quote: "This isn't a back alley, Steve. It's war!"

author: Bucky Barnes to Steve Rogers after Johann Schmidt reveals his face
quote: "You don't have one of those, do you?"

author: Bucky Barnes and Steve Rogers
quote: "Don't do anything stupid until I get back.""How can I? You're taking all the stupid with you."

author: Captain America and Bucky Barnes
quote: "I thought you were dead.""I thought you were smaller."

author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
quote: "You ready to follow Captain America into the jaws of death?""Hell, no. That little guy from Brooklyn who was too dumb to run away from a fight, I'm following him."

author: Bucky Barnes and Captain America
quote: "I'm invisible. I'm turning into you it's like a horrible dream.""Don't take it so hard maybe she's got a friend."

author: Bucky Barnes and Steve Rogers
quote: "I had him on the ropes.""I know you did."

author: Winter Soldier to his HYDRA team
quote: "I have her. Find him."

author: A recording played in the Captain America Exhibit in the Smithsonian Institution
quote: "Best friends since childhood, Bucky Barnes and Steven Rogers were inseparable on both schoolyard and battlefield. Barnes is the only Howling Commando to give his life in service of his country."

author: Steve Rogers to Natasha Romanoff
quote: "He's fast. Strong. Had a metal arm."

author: Natasha Romanoff and Steve Rogers
quote: "Most of the intelligence communities doesn't believe he exist, the ones who do call him the Winter Soldier. He is credited with over two dozens assassinations in the last 50 years.""So he's a ghost story."

author: Natasha Romanoff to Steve Rogers
quote: "Five years ago I was escorting a nuclear engineer out of Iran, somebody shot at my tires near Odessa. We lost control, went straight over a cliff, I pulled us out, but the Winter Soldier was there. I was covering my engineer, so he shot him straight through me. A Soviet slug, no rifling. "

author: Arnim Zola to Bucky Barnes
quote: "Sergeant Barnes... the procedure has already started. You are to be the new fist of HYDRA!"

author: Alexander Pierce to Winter Soldier
quote: "Your work has been a gift to mankind. You've shaped the century. I need you to do it one more time."

author: Nick Fury and Steve Rogers
quote: "I didn't know about Barnes.""Even if you had, would you have told me?"

author: Captain America to Winter Soldier
quote: "People are gonna die, Buck. I can't let that happen... Please don't make me do this."

author: Captain America and Winter Soldier
quote: "Bucky?""Who the hell is Bucky?"

author: Bucky Barnes and Alexander Pierce
quote: "The man on the bridge, who was he?""You met him earlier this week on another assignment.""I knew him."

author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
quote: "Thank you Buck, but I can get by on my own.""The thing is, you don't have to. I'm with you 'til the end of the line, pal."

author: Captain America and Winter Soldier
quote: "You know me."No, I don't!""Bucky. you've known me your entire life. Your name is James Buchanan Barnes...""Shut up!""I'm not gonna fight you. You're my friend.""You're my mission. You're... my... mission!""Then finish it. 'Cause I'm with you 'til the end of the line."

author: Sam Wilson to Steve Rogers
quote: "I'm very happy chasing cold leads on our missing persons case."

author: Natasha Romanoff to Bucky Barnes
quote: "You could at least recognize me!"

author: Natasha Romanoff and T'Challa
quote: "T'Challa, Task Force will decide who brings in Barnes.""Don't bother, Ms. Romanoff. I shall kill him myself."

author: Thaddeus Ross
quote: "Barnes would have been eliminated in Romania if it wasn't for Rogers. There are dead people who would be alive now. Feel free to check my math."

author: Captain America and Iron Man
quote: "It wasn't him, Tony! HYDRA had control of his mind!""Move!""It wasn't him!"

author: Captain America and Iron Man
quote: "He's my friend.""So was I."

author: T'Challa to Steve Rogers
quote: "If I can help your friend find peace, I will be very grateful."

author: Falcon, Captain America and Bucky Barnes
quote: "Heads up, Cap. German Special Forces, approaching from the south.""Understood. Do you know me?""You're Steve. I read about you in a museum.""They've set the perimeter.""I know you're nervous. And you have plenty of reason to be. But you're lying.""I wasn't in Vienna. I don't do that anymore.""They're entering the building.""Well, the people who think you did are coming here now. And they're not planning on taking you alive.""That's smart. Good strategy.""They're on the roof. I'm compromised.""This doesn't have to end in a fight, Buck.""It always ends in a fight.""5 seconds.""You pulled me from the river. Why?""I don't know.""3 seconds!""Yes, you do.""Breach! Breach! Breach!""Buck, stop! You're gonna kill someone.""I'm not gonna kill anyone."

author: Helmut Zemo and Winter Soldier
quote: " Zhelaniye. Rzhavyy. Semnadtsat’. Rassvet. Pech’. Devyat’. Dobroserdechnyy. Vozvrashcheniye na rodinu. Odin. Gruzovoy vagon....Soldat?""Ya gotov otvechat."[1]"Mission report: December 16, 1991."

author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
quote: "Buck, do you remember me?""Your mom's name was Sarah; you used to wear newspapers in your shoes."

author: Winter Soldier and Black Panther
quote: "I didn't kill your father.""Then why did you run?"

author: Bucky Barnes and Steve Rogers
quote: "What's gonna happen to your friends?""Whatever it is, I'll deal with it.""I don't know if I'm worth all this, Steve.""What you did all those years... It wasn't you. You didn't have a choice.""I know. But I did it."

author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
quote: "You remember that time we had to ride back from Rockaway Beach in the back of that freezer truck?""Was that the time we used our train money to buy hot dogs?""You blew 3 bucks trying to win that stuffed bear for a redhead.""What was her name again?""Dolores. You called her Dot.""She's got to be a hundred years old by now.""So are we, pal."

author: Iron Man and Winter Soldier
quote: "Do you even remember them?""I remember all of them."

author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
quote: "Are you sure about this?""I can't trust my own mind. So, until they figure out how to get this stuff out of my head I think going back under is the best thing...for everybody."

author: Shuri and Winter Soldier
quote: "Good morning, Sergeant Barnes.""Bucky.""How are you feeling?""Good. Thank you.""Come, there’s much more for you to learn."

author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
quote: "How you been, Buck.""Not bad, for the end of the world."

author: Rocket Raccoon and Bucky Barnes
quote: "How much?""It's not for sale.""Not the gun, the arm!"

author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
quote: "Don't do anything stupid while I'm gone.""How can I? You're taking all the stupid with you."

author: Bucky Barnes calls Sam Wilson and directly Hulk, after spotting an elderly Steve Rogers sitting behind them
quote: "Sam. Sam, get over here!"

author: Skye
quote: "Bucky Barnes."

author: Wolfgang von Strucker to List
quote: "Sooner or later, they will meet the twins. It's not a world of spies any more. Not even a world of heroes. This is the age of miracles, Doctor. There's nothing more horrifying than a miracle."

author: List and Wolfgang von Strucker
quote: "It's over. Fury has released everything to the public.""Everything he knows about."Herr Strucker, if they get word of our work here, if they find out we serve HYDRA...""HYDRA. S.H.I.E.L.D. Two sides of a coin that's no longer currency. What we have... is worth more than any of them ever knew."
